fullContentHtml:
E400 Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine: Industrial-Grade Pallet Stabilization

The E400 Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine is engineered for B2B manufacturing, distribution, and logistics centers requiring reliable, high-throughput pallet unitization. Its robust design ensures consistent load containment, reducing product damage and securing goods for transport or storage.

Professional Installation & Site Requirements

For optimal performance and longevity, the E400 must be installed on a level, hardened concrete floor with a load-bearing capacity exceeding 1 ton/m². This ensures machine stability during high-cycle operation and prevents misalignment.

Core Wrapping Station Capabilities

  • Precision Wrapping Mechanism: A heavy-duty ring with dual friction wheels delivers stable, secure wraps while minimizing film usage and energy consumption.
  • Fully Adjustable Operation: Precisely control friction between drive wheels and the ring, wrapping speed via inverter, and film overlap from 10% to 90% for optimal load containment.
  • Enhanced Film Management: Adjustable packing material tension and a versatile material frame accommodate a wide range of stretch film types and widths.
  • Safety & Control: Features include soft start/stop, wrapping position reset, and full perimeter safety guardrails for protected operation.

Integrated Conveyor System

  • Product Surface Protection: Conveyors utilize soft-connect technology to prevent damage to pallets and products during entry and exit.
  • Automated Flow: Synchronized automatic entrance and exit conveyor systems enable seamless integration into automated packaging lines.
  • Robust Drive & Control: Motor-driven gearboxes provide reliable power, while inverter-controlled speeds allow precise synchronization with upstream and downstream processes. Conveyor height and positioning are adjustable for various pallet profiles.

Automated Control & Integration

The E400 is managed by a central Programmable Logic Controller (PLC), providing reliable, repeatable operation. This system allows for easy integration with warehouse management systems (WMS) and facilitates quick changeovers for different pallet specifications, maximizing line efficiency and uptime.

The E300 is an industrial-grade, automatic horizontal orbital stretch wrapper engineered to secure and protect long, horizontal-shaped products for storage and transit. It delivers consistent, high-quality bundling for materials including metal pipes, aluminum profiles, construction sheets, door panels, and floor boards, ensuring packages are tightly sealed, protected, and organized.

Core Features & Benefits

Automated In-Line Packaging

Integrate the E300 directly into your production or packing line for hands-free, automatic wrapping, maximizing throughput and reducing labor costs.

Superior Bundle Stability

The ring and double-rub wheel drive system provides safe, stable, and powerful rotation, preventing load shift and ensuring a tight, secure wrap every time.

Precision Process Control

Gain complete control over packaging quality with adjustable ring speed, film tension, and overlap (10%-90%) to match your specific product requirements.

Operational Safety & Efficiency

Built with a full protective guardrail and features like soft start/stop and position reset for safe, smooth, and efficient operation in demanding industrial settings.

Installation: For optimal performance and longevity, the E300 must be installed on a flat, hard surface with a load-bearing capacity exceeding 1 ton/m².

Conveyor System: The machine is designed to work with a compatible conveyor system for automated product handling and feeding into the wrapping station.

fullContentHtml:
E500 Series Orbital Horizontal Stretch Wrapping System

Streamline the packaging of long, bulky, or irregularly shaped products with the industrial-grade E500 Series Orbital Horizontal Stretch Wrapper. This integrated system combines protective bubble film covering with secure stretch film wrapping in a single, automated process, designed for demanding B2B manufacturing, warehouse, and distribution environments.

Core System Overview

The complete E500 system is engineered for turnkey operation, comprising:

  • Dual-Conveyor Infeed/Outfeed System for continuous material handling.
  • Integrated Bubble Film Covering Machine to apply a layer of protective cushioning.
  • Dedicated Orbital Horizontal Wrapping Station for final film encapsulation and sealing.

Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Station Features

The main wrapping station is built for precision, reliability, and operator safety:

  • 360-Degree Ring-Type Wrapper: Ensures complete, uniform film coverage around the entire product circumference.
  • Fully Automated Film Application: Reduces labor and ensures consistent wrap tension and overlap.
  • CE-Standard Safety Design: Incorporates guarded mechanical systems for compliant operation.
  • Adjustable Drive Friction: Fine-tune the contact between driving wheels and the ring for optimal performance across different loads.
  • Inverter-Controlled Ring Speed: Precisely adjust rotation speed to match product profile and throughput requirements.
  • Soft Start & Jog Functions: Protect product integrity during setup and allow for precise manual positioning.

Control & Automation

The centralized Human-Machine Interface (HMI) Control Panel allows for intuitive management of all packaging parameters. Easily input and set wrap cycles, control packing speed, and manage system diagnostics, ensuring repeatable results and simplified operation for your team.

Application & Industries

Ideal for securing and protecting long, slender, or hard-to-handle items such as:

  • Furniture Components (e.g., tabletops, wooden boards, legs)
  • Building Materials (extrusions, pipes, profiles)
  • Fabricated Metal Parts
  • Plastic & Composite Panels

Proven in robust applications, including contract packaging for major retailers requiring high-quality, damage-free shipment of components like wooden boards.

fullContentHtml:
E200 Horizontal Spiral Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineered for industrial efficiency, the E200 Horizontal Spiral Stretch Wrapper automates the secure packaging of elongated, palletized, or hard-to-handle loads. Its robust rotating ring design delivers reliable, high-speed spiral wrapping for superior load containment and stability in warehouse, distribution, and manufacturing operations.

Core Machine Advantages

Durable Wrapping Station

  • Robust Construction: Heavy-duty ring and frame built for continuous operation and long-term reliability.
  • Smooth Operation: Specialized drive wheels ensure consistent, vibration-free ring rotation.
  • Precision Control: Wrapping speed is finely adjustable from 10 to 120 RPM to match load requirements.
  • Cycle Protection: Soft start/stop functionality prevents load toppling and film breakage.

Intelligent Performance Features

  • Automated Reset: Wrapping position automatically resets for uninterrupted sequential wrapping.
  • Adaptive Tension: Maintains optimal force for both dense and lightweight loads.
  • Material Flexibility: Engineered to perform with a broad spectrum of industrial stretch films.
  • Configurable Wrap: Film overlap is precisely adjustable from 10% to 90% for optimal cost and stability.

Integrated Conveyor System

The integrated conveyor system is designed for seamless material handling and product protection.

  • Surface Protection: Gentle handling preserves the integrity of sensitive product surfaces.
  • Automated Flow: Includes synchronized automatic infeed and outfeed conveyor systems.
  • Adjustable Design: Conveyor alignment and positioning are easily adjustable for different load dimensions.
  • Reliable Drive: Conveyors are powered by a motor and gearbox system for consistent, dependable performance.

Safety & Compliance

Operator safety is paramount. The E200 is fully enclosed with electro-welded mesh safety guards, providing complete protection during operation. All moving parts are shielded to meet rigorous workplace safety standards, ensuring secure daily use in fast-paced industrial settings.

fullContentHtml:
E600 Horizontal Spiral Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineered for high-volume logistics and distribution centers, the E600 Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine delivers robust, automated pallet stabilization. Its spiral ring technology ensures maximum load protection while significantly reducing film usage and transportation costs due to load failure.

Core Benefits for Your Operation

  • Reduce Total Cost of Ownership: Minimize film waste and prevent costly load collapses in transit with precise, consistent wrapping.
  • Enhance Supply Chain Visibility: Optional integrated weighing scales capture critical data, enabling seamless ERP integration for automated inventory and shipping documentation.
  • Maximize Production Line Uptime: Built with a heavy-duty structure and adjustable components for reliable, high-speed performance that adapts to changing pallet sizes and throughput demands.
  • Improve Workplace Safety: The stable, enclosed ring design and programmable soft-start/stop functions create a safer operating environment compared to manual wrapping.

Technical Overview: Wrapping Station

The E600's wrapping station is designed for precision and durability in demanding shift operations.

  • Spiral Ring Film Delivery: A rotating ring applies stretch film in a consistent spiral pattern for 360-degree load stability.
  • High-Stability Rotation System: Engineered for smooth, high-speed operation with minimal vibration, supported by a reinforced steel frame.
  • Advanced Control Mainboard: A high-level industrial PLC provides reliable control over all machine functions and settings.
  • Precision Drive Adjustment: Friction between drive wheels and the ring is user-adjustable for optimal film carriage movement and longevity.
  • Variable Speed Control: Ring rotation speed is fully adjustable via inverter drives to match specific load and film requirements.
  • Soft Motion Control: Programmed soft start and stop sequences protect both the load and the machine's mechanical systems.
  • Automated Positioning Sensor: Ensures the wrap cycle begins at the correct point on the load for complete coverage and film efficiency.

The E600 is the strategic solution for businesses seeking to automate their pallet wrapping process, enhance load integrity, and integrate packaging data into their digital logistics ecosystem.

fullContentHtml:
E1800 Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapper

An automated, industrial-grade horizontal stretch wrapping machine engineered for high-volume packaging of flat, panel-type products. It delivers secure, consistent, and professional packaging for streamlined logistics and enhanced product protection.

Core Function & Industrial Application

The E1800 is specialized for the automated horizontal wrapping of large, flat items such as architectural doors, flooring panels, composite boards, and building sheets. It replaces inefficient manual wrapping, ensuring every unit is uniformly sealed and protected against dust, moisture, and handling damage. The machine is designed for direct connection to conveyor lines, creating a continuous, systematic packaging cell that boosts throughput and reduces labor costs.

Technical Features & Operational Advantages

  • Heavy-Duty Drive System: Features a robust double-ring chassis with four independent wheel groups, providing the torque and stability required for large-diameter wrapping of heavy panels.
  • Precision Adjustability: Both the friction of the drive wheels and their contact position on the ring are adjustable, allowing fine-tuning for different film types and load requirements.
  • Variable Speed Control: Separate inverters for the orbital ring and the base conveyor roller allow precise control over wrapping speed and film overlap, optimizing cycle time and material usage.
  • Cycle Consistency: Soft start/stop functions and automatic position reset ensure gentle handling of products and identical wrap patterns for every cycle.
  • Efficient Material Use: Pre-set tension control and compatibility with wide, high-performance LLDPE film minimize film waste and ensure optimal load containment force.
  • Safety-First Design: A full protective guardrail encloses the operational area, ensuring compliance with workplace safety regulations during automated operation.

Installation & Site Requirements

For stable and reliable operation, the E1800 must be installed on a firm, level concrete floor. The installation site must provide a load-bearing capacity exceeding 1 ton per square meter to support the machine and its maximum product load during operation.

fullContentHtml:
Engineered for Industrial Packaging Efficiency

The E1400 Automatic Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine is a robust industrial solution designed to automate and secure the packaging of large, flat products such as construction panels, doors, flooring, and sheet materials. With a maximum package width of 1400mm, it delivers consistent, high-tension wraps that stabilize loads for safe storage and transportation while minimizing material use.

Core Technology & Performance

At the heart of the E1400 is a dual-ring, dual-drive wheel system engineered for powerful, stable rotation. This design ensures consistent torque and eliminates slippage, even under high tension. Critical operational parameters—including film tension, ring speed via inverter control, and drive wheel friction—are fully adjustable, allowing precise calibration for different load types and film specifications.

Operational Flexibility & Integration

This machine is built for versatile deployment within your facility. It operates efficiently both as an inline station integrated into a conveyorized production line and as a standalone offline unit for staging areas. This flexibility supports continuous workflow and maximizes packaging throughput.

Safety & Durability Design

Operator safety and machine longevity are paramount. All moving parts are housed within a closed structure, and the work area is protected by sturdy guardrails. This design ensures safe, unattended operation and protects the machine's mechanics in demanding industrial environments.

Key Features for B2B ROI

  • Automated High-Speed Wrapping: Significantly increases packaging throughput versus manual methods.
  • Precision Tension Control: Creates secure, unitized loads while reducing film waste and cost.
  • Universal Film Carriage: Accommodates a broad range of stretch film types for supply chain flexibility.
  • Advanced Control Features: Includes soft start/stop for smooth operation and automatic wrapping position reset for consistent cycles.
  • Robust Construction: Industrial-grade components ensure reliability and reduce downtime for maintenance.

Business Impact: The E1400 transforms large-format product packaging from a manual bottleneck into a streamlined, efficient process. By automating wrapping, it reduces labor costs, improves load integrity for reduced damage, and optimizes film usage for direct material savings—delivering a clear return on investment for high-volume operations.

fullContentHtml:
E2400 Heavy-Duty Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine

Automate and secure your large, horizontal product packaging with the industrial-grade E2400 orbital stretch wrapper. Engineered for stability and efficiency, this machine delivers consistent, high-performance wrapping for bulky items, integrating seamlessly into your production or logistics line.

Machine Overview & Capabilities

The E2400 is a robust, automatic orbital wrapping system specifically designed for securing horizontal-shaped loads. It excels at handling challenging items such as wood sheet bundles, panel stacks, furniture, floor boards, and standard palletized loads with an outer diameter of up to 2000mm. Our team provides customized solutions to tailor the machine to your specific packaging goals, ensuring your products are well-protected, securely sealed, and presented in a neat, professional appearance.

Featuring a PLC program control system, the E2400 is built for automation, capable of connecting with upstream and downstream equipment for a fully integrated packaging line operation.

Key Installation Requirements

  • Foundation: Requires a flat and hard ground with a load-bearing capacity of at least 500 kg per square meter.
  • Note: No special poured foundation or anchoring is typically required, simplifying setup and potential relocation.

Load Wrapping Station Design

Robust Structural Frame

Constructed with a strong, heavy-duty structure to support the large rotating ring, ensuring minimal vibration and maximum durability under continuous operation.

Dual-Ring Drive System

Equipped with a double-ring and double-PU wheel drive powered by reliable motor devices. This design guarantees safer, more stable, and energetic rotation of heavy loads, preventing slippage and ensuring consistent film tension.

Precise Adjustability

Both the position of the wheels and the wrapping ring itself are adjustable, providing flexibility to accommodate various load sizes and optimize film application.

Variable Speed Control

The rotational speed of the wrapping ring is fully adjustable via an inverter application, with a maximum of 30 revolutions per minute. This allows operators to fine-tune cycle times and wrap force based on the load's characteristics.

Smooth Operation

Incorporates a soft-start function to gradually accelerate the ring, reducing mechanical stress on the machine and the load for smoother operation.

Engineered for industrial packaging efficiency, the Fhope-F Series horizontal orbital stretch wrapper automates the secure bundling of long, rigid products like steel rods, copper bars, and extruded profiles. Core Features & Operational Benefits

Profile Horizontal Orbital Wrapping Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale efficiency, our Horizontal Orbital Wrapping Machine delivers automated, high-speed spiral wrapping for profiles and extrusions. This robust system integrates seamlessly into B2B production lines to enhance throughput, ensure load integrity, and optimize packaging material usage.

Core Technology & Operational Advantages

Intelligent Automation

The central PLC-controlled system with an intuitive HMI touchscreen allows for fully programmable wrapping cycles. Store parameters for different profile dimensions and bundle configurations to enable quick changeovers and consistent, repeatable results with minimal operator intervention.

Precision Wrapping Performance

Achieve optimal load containment with adjustable packaging tension and programmable overlap control. The specialized tension breaker and controller work in unison to apply the correct force for small or large profiles, preventing deformation while ensuring stability for transport and storage.

Designed for Productivity

Maximize uptime with features built for speed. The heavy-duty film carriage enables film reloading in under 5 seconds, while inverter-controlled rotation speeds allow you to fine-tune cycle times. The precision mechanical cutter ensures a clean, flat film incision every time.

Flexible & Safe Operation

Switch between automatic and manual modes to suit production needs. The system's operator-focused design incorporates safety features and simplified controls, reducing training requirements and fostering a safer packaging environment for high-volume operations.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Your Packaging Line with Automated Horizontal Stretch Wrapping

Our industrial-grade horizontal stretch wrapping machine is engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers seeking to enhance efficiency and load integrity. This system delivers robust, 6-sided protection for palletized loads, bales, and panels, securing them against shifting, moisture, and dust throughout the supply chain.

Core Operational Advantages

The machine utilizes a precision turntable to rotate the load a full 360 degrees, ensuring the film head and tail are securely wrapped and sealed. This method guarantees uniform tension and complete coverage, transforming your packaging process into a consistent, reliable operation that reduces film waste and improves load stability.

Seamless System Integration for Scalable Throughput

Built for integration, this wrapper is the keystone of an automated packaging line. It is compatible with a range of conveyors—including PVC belt systems for soft bales and chain conveyors for heavy pallets—and is designed to connect effortlessly with upstream bundling or downstream shrinking and stacking equipment. This modularity provides a future-proof solution that grows with your operational demands.

Technical Specifications & Customization

Engineered for global industrial use, the machine offers key customizable parameters to meet specific facility requirements and load profiles, ensuring optimal performance in your unique environment.

Spiral Orbital Stretch Wrapper: Automated Pallet Unitization

Engineered for industrial logistics, our Spiral Orbital Stretch Wrapper delivers superior load stability and protection for palletized goods in transit. This system automates the unitization process, ensuring consistent, high-tension wrapping that minimizes load shifting and product damage.

Core System Advantages

Optimized Conveyor Integration

  • Protected Product Surfaces: Belt motor conveyors gently handle loads without surface abrasion.
  • Seamless Material Flow: Automatic infeed and outlet conveyor systems integrate with production or warehouse lines.
  • Precise Speed Control: Inverter-adjustable conveyor speed allows synchronization with upstream/downstream processes.
  • Intelligent Activation: Auto-sensors detect pallet presence to initiate the wrapping cycle efficiently.

Precision Control & Monitoring (Optional)

  • Programmable Wrapping Cycles: PLC system automates wrapping patterns (number of wraps, top/bottom layers) for specific load types.
  • Accurate Positioning: Sensors ensure consistent film application start/end points for optimal containment.
  • Operational Diagnostics: Visual and auditory indicator alarms alert operators to maintenance needs or operational faults.
  • Simplified Maintenance: Separate, clearly labeled panel box provides easy access for control, troubleshooting, and daily checks.

Enhanced Automation Package (Optional)

  • Automatic Film Cut & Clamp: Mechanical hand severs and secures film tail, completing the cycle without operator intervention.
  • Sensor-Driven Logic: Integrated auto-sensors and PLC programming enable fully autonomous operation.
  • Unmanned Operation: This device facilitates lights-out manufacturing or warehouse workflows, significantly reducing labor requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Your Supply Chain with Automated Pallet Wrapping

The A200 Automated Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is engineered to replace inconsistent, labor-intensive manual packing with a secure, efficient, and repeatable automated process. By uniformly applying stretch film to palletized loads, it ensures product integrity during transportation and storage, preventing shifting, tipping, and damage.

Core Benefits for Industrial Operations

  • Enhanced Load Stability & Protection: Film application provides critical supplemental support, securing products against transit hazards and minimizing losses.
  • Improved Warehouse Safety & Efficiency: Automates a physically demanding task, reducing worker strain and injury risk while accelerating packaging lines.
  • Supply Chain Visibility: Creates a uniform, identifiable load profile for easier inventory management, sorting, and distribution.
  • Cross-Industry Application: A versatile solution for sectors including chemicals, electronics, building materials, appliances, paper, food, and beverage.

Precision Control & Operational Intelligence

The A200 is built around a reliable PLC control system, offering superior command over all wrapping parameters. Key operational features include:

  • Pre-Stretch Controller: Maximizes film yield and reduces material costs by optimally elongating film before application.
  • Programmable Wrap Protocols: Customize overwrap, overlap, and re-wrap functions to match specific load dimensions and stability requirements.
  • Comprehensive Data Tracking: Independent counters for top, middle, and bottom wraps, plus total and resettable cycle counters, provide essential data for production analysis and batch reporting.
  • Operator-Focused Design: Features a dedicated interface with clear displays and controls, centered around an immediate-access red mushroom head emergency stop for maximum safety.

The A200 transforms stretch wrapping from a manual bottleneck into a integrated, data-point generating segment of your automated material handling system, driving down costs and boosting reliability.

fullContentHtml:
B200 Series Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale logistics, the B200 Series Automatic Stretch Wrapping Machine delivers secure, consistent pallet unitization to protect goods and streamline your supply chain operations.

Core Business Benefits

The B200 Series is designed to meet the highest demands for throughput and reliability in warehouse, distribution, and manufacturing environments. By automating the pallet wrapping process, it significantly reduces labor costs, minimizes film waste, and ensures uniform load integrity for safe transportation and storage.

  • Maximize Load Security: Apply consistent film tension and wrap patterns to prevent shifting, damage, and product loss in transit.
  • Boost Operational Efficiency: Achieve higher throughput with automated cycles, allowing personnel to focus on value-added tasks.
  • Adapt to Diverse Requirements: Customizable wrapping programs (layers, zones, top sheeting) cater to specific industry needs, from stable chemical drums to fragile electronics.
  • Ensure Cost-Effective Operation: Robust construction and easy maintenance design minimize downtime and total cost of ownership.

Technical Specifications & Control

Control & Automation

  • Industrial PLC Control: Features a reliable OMRON PLC system with an intuitive push-button interface for precise operation and programming.
  • Automatic Height Sensing: Integrated sensor eliminates manual input by automatically detecting pallet height for optimal film usage.
  • Programmable Wrapping Patterns: Fully adjustable wrap cycles, including layer count, zone wrapping, and film overlap, for precise load containment.

Performance & Drive

  • Variable Turntable Speed: Adjustable rotation (3-12 RPM) accommodates various load types and stability requirements.
  • Full Motor-Driven System: All movements—turntable, film carriage, and pre-stretch—are motor-controlled for smooth, consistent performance.
  • Rapid Film Changeover: Patented film carriage system allows for film roll replacement in approximately 10 seconds, reducing downtime.

Ideal for Industrial Applications

The B200 Series is a versatile solution trusted across multiple sectors to secure unit loads, improve warehouse safety, and support just-in-time delivery schedules.

  • Chemical & Pharmaceutical
  • Food & Beverage
  • Electronics & Appliances
  • Building Materials & Paper

The RAS200 Rotary Arm Stretch Wrapping Machine is engineered for B2B operations requiring reliable, high-volume pallet stabilization. This system automates the application of stretch film, providing critical load containment for safe transportation and storage of palletized goods in demanding industrial environments.

Core Operational Advantages

Engineered for continuous duty, the RAS200 ensures consistent, secure wraps that reduce product damage and load failure risks. Its robust design withstands challenging conditions, making it a dependable partner for warehouses, manufacturing plants, and distribution centers.

Intelligent Control & Automation

At the heart of the RAS200 is an advanced PLC control system with a user-friendly touch screen interface. This allows for precise management of all wrapping parameters and seamless integration into automated packaging lines.

  • Automated Film Handling: System automatically feeds, tensions, and cuts the film at cycle completion.
  • Smart Load Sensing: Integrated sensors automatically detect load height and presence, optimizing film use and initiating cycles without operator intervention.
  • Customizable Wrapping Programs: Set specific film layers, wrap patterns (e.g., top/middle zones), and tension levels for different load types.

Precision Specifications for Workflow Integration

  • Turntable Speed: Adjustable from 3 to 12 RPM to balance throughput with wrap integrity.
  • Film Carriage: Motorized vertical movement ensures consistent film application from base to top.
  • Cycle Break Function: Enables synchronization with conveyor systems for uninterrupted material flow.
  • Operator Controls: Dedicated buttons for single start, reset, emergency stop, turntable jog, and wrapping position reset provide full operational command.

Built for Demanding Industrial Sectors

The RAS200 is ideal for securing loads in food & beverage, chemical, steel, construction materials, and heavy manufacturing. Its reliable performance ensures products arrive intact, reducing waste and liability while improving shipping efficiency.

S300 Semiautomatic Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineered for B2B and industrial packaging lines, the S300 horizontal orbital stretch wrapper delivers secure, consistent, and professional packaging for long, horizontal goods. It streamlines the protection of pipes, tubes, bars, and profiles with a sealed, tidy finish that enhances product integrity for storage and shipment.

Core Engineering & Performance

The machine's lightweight yet robust aluminum alloy ring ensures durable operation with minimal inertia. The precision rotating mechanism, driven by a specialized PU wheel system with adjustable traction, guarantees high-speed, stable wrapping and consistent film tension control.

Operational efficiency is paramount. The S300 simplifies the loading process and features a quick-release, lockable film carriage for rapid roll changes, minimizing downtime. Installation is streamlined, requiring only standard power and pneumatic air connections to become operational.

Intelligent Control & Safety

Equipped with an advanced PLC and user-friendly Human-Machine Interface (HMI), the S300 offers precise control and monitoring. Photoelectric sensors accurately detect product position for automated operation. A built-in safety system includes a friction wheel device for stability and an automatic alarm that triggers in the event of an indicator failure, protecting your line and product.

Customizable Packaging & Maintenance

Tailor the wrap to your specific product requirements with easily adjustable film overlap rate and packing tension controls. The integrated support and roller system securely fixes products in place during wrapping. Designed for industrial environments, the S300 emphasizes ease of routine maintenance to ensure long-term reliability and low total cost of ownership.

fullContentHtml:
R300 Semi-Automatic Rotary Arm Pallet Wrapping Machine

Engineered for B2B industrial applications, the R300 Rotary Arm Stretch Wrapper is the strategic solution for securing heavy, unstable, or high-center-of-gravity pallets that challenge conventional turntable wrappers. Its innovative design prioritizes load integrity, operator safety, and long-term equipment durability.

Core Technology & Operational Advantage

Unlike turntable models, the R300 features a rotating film carriage that orbits a stationary load. This method is critical for preventing product shift or collapse common with rotating pallets, making it indispensable for packaging light goods, irregular shapes, or loads exceeding 5,000 pounds. The unit is permanently anchored to the facility floor, minimizing vibration and wear for unmatched service life in continuous operation environments.

Strategic Considerations for Facility Integration

The rotary arm mechanism requires a dedicated operational footprint with clear space for the arm's rotation path. This design trade-off delivers superior performance for specific load types. For operations with sufficient floor space where load stability is a paramount concern—such as in aerospace, automotive parts, or fragile goods distribution—the R300 provides a reliable, high-performance wrapping process.

Ideal B2B Application Scenarios

  • Warehousing & Distribution Centers handling diverse, unstable pallets
  • Manufacturing facilities with heavy industrial components
  • Industries with strict shipping integrity requirements (e.g., pharmaceuticals, electronics)
  • Operations seeking a durable, low-maintenance alternative to turntable wrappers for heavy loads

Selecting the correct stretch wrap technology is a critical logistics decision. The R300 Rotary Arm Wrapper represents a specialized investment in securing your most challenging shipments, reducing product damage, and optimizing your stretch film expenditure.

R200 Semiautomatic Rotary Arm Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineer superior load stability and reduce packaging costs for your heavy or challenging pallets. The R200 Rotary Arm Stretch Wrapper is a robust B2B solution designed for industries where load integrity and efficiency are non-negotiable.

Strategic Advantages for Your Operation

Unlike conventional turntable wrappers, the R200 utilizes an innovative rotary arm system that revolves the film carriage around a stationary load. This method is the optimal choice for securing pallets that are too tall, heavy, or unstable for a rotating turntable, preventing potential load shift or damage during the wrapping process.

This technology is widely adopted to enhance supply chain security across critical sectors including chemical processing, building materials, manufacturing, and bulk distribution, ensuring products arrive intact and damage-free.

Core Technical Features & Business Benefits

Maximized Load Security

Handles extreme pallet profiles with precision. The fixed-load design eliminates the risks associated with spinning heavy or top-heavy loads, providing superior containment force and stability for long-distance shipping.

Precision Control & Consistency

At its core, the advanced OMRON PLC system guarantees operational reliability. Coupled with a photo-eye sensor and customizable wrap parameters, it delivers consistent, repeatable results shift after shift, minimizing film waste and human variance.

Reduced Total Cost of Operation

The efficient pre-stretch mechanism significantly lowers film consumption. Combined with durable construction that withstands demanding environments, the R200 offers a rapid ROI through material savings and reduced downtime.

Streamlined Workflow Integration

Engineered for seamless integration into existing loading bay workflows. The easy-to-operate design allows for quick training and efficient handling of constant pallet flow, maintaining throughput without compromising on wrap quality.

fullContentHtml:
RAS100 Automatic Rotary Arm Stretch Wrapper: Engineered for Industrial Efficiency

The RAS100 is a fully automated pallet wrapping solution designed to integrate seamlessly into high-volume B2B logistics, warehouse distribution, and manufacturing operations. It eliminates manual labor, ensures consistent load integrity, and optimizes material usage for superior ROI.

Automated Operational Sequence

  1. Automatic Pallet In-Feed: The integrated conveyor transports the palletized load to the precise wrapping station.
  2. Top Cover Application: An automated device descends, applies, and cuts a protective top sheet for complete load coverage.
  3. Load Stabilization: A stabilizer plate contacts the load's upper surface to prevent shifting during the wrap cycle.
  4. Film Initiation & Wrapping: The system automatically clamps the film tail. The heavy-duty rotary arm rotates around the stationary load while the film carriage moves vertically, applying a secure, consistent spiral wrap.
  5. Cycle Completion: The film is cut and secured, the arm stops, and the wrapped pallet is conveyed out, ready for the next load.

Core Technology & Design

At the heart of the RAS100 is an industrial-grade PLC control system, managing all functions from the main engine and rotary arm to the film carriage and conveyor. This centralized control ensures reliability, allows for custom wrap pattern programming, and facilitates easy integration with Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and other automation equipment. The robust construction of the rotary arm and carriage system is built for 24/7 operation, minimizing downtime and maintenance costs.

B2B Applications & Benefits

  • Distribution Centers: Achieve uniform, shipment-ready pallets that reduce in-transit damage and claims.
  • Manufacturing Facilities: Secure finished goods for safe storage and onward logistics directly from the production line.
  • Third-Party Logistics (3PL): Handle diverse client loads with easily adjustable settings for different pallet profiles.
  • Beverage & Food: Maintain hygiene and stability with optional top cover and consistent tension control.

Integration Ready: The RAS100 is designed as a modular station for your automated material handling line. Contact our engineering team to discuss custom configurations for load dimensions, throughput requirements, and system connectivity.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Your Pallet Handling Workflow

The B100 Series Automatic Pallet Wrapping Machine is engineered for B2B environments requiring reliable, high-volume stretch wrapping. It automates the end-of-line packaging process, integrating directly with conveyor systems to form a continuous flow from production to dispatch, eliminating bottlenecks and manual handling.

Streamlined Operational Process

  1. Automatic Infeed: Pallets are transferred via forklift to the optional infeed conveyor, initiating the automated sequence.
  2. Precise Positioning: The motorized conveyor indexes the pallet to the exact wrapping position within the machine frame.
  3. Consistent Wrapping Cycle: The automatic turntable rotates the load while the advanced film carriage applies stretch film (LLDPE) with programmed tension and overlap.
  4. Efficient Discharge: The secured pallet is discharged via the optional outfeed conveyor, ready for forklift removal and final transport.

Note: Infeed and outfeed conveyors are optional, allowing customization to your facility's specific layout and material flow requirements.

Engineered for Efficiency & Cost Savings

This system is designed to deliver a rapid ROI through operational efficiencies. The fully automated process requires no manual intervention during the wrapping cycle, freeing staff for higher-value tasks. The integrated motorized pre-stretch system precisely controls film elongation, reducing film consumption by up to 30% compared to manual methods, directly lowering ongoing material costs. Built for durability in industrial settings, the B100 enhances line speed, improves load consistency for safer shipping, and reduces product damage.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Rotary Ring Stretch Wrapper for Industrial Palletizing

Engineered to meet the rigorous demands of modern logistics, our Automatic Rotary Ring Stretch Wrapper is a high-performance, in-line packaging solution designed to secure palletized goods for storage and transportation with exceptional efficiency and reliability.

Core Technology & Operational Benefits

This system utilizes a rotating ring mechanism to apply stretch film uniformly around a stationary pallet, enabling non-stop operation for maximum throughput. Controlled by an advanced PLC and intuitive HMI, it ensures consistent wrap force, film tension, and pattern selection—critical for load integrity and reducing material waste.

Its primary strength lies in seamless integration. As a true in-line machine, it can be installed directly into your existing conveyor line, automating the final packaging stage without manual intervention or significant floor space reconfiguration.

Engineered for Superior Load Protection & Stability

The wrapper creates a secure, five-face sealed package that unitizes the load, preventing shifting and product damage during handling and transit. The optional integrated top sheet dispenser adds a layer of waterproof or dust-proof protection, making it ideal for sensitive or export-bound goods.

This method of containment surpasses traditional wrapping by providing all-around compression and stability, significantly reducing the risk of load failure and associated losses in the supply chain.

Technical Specifications & Build Quality

  • Control System: Industrial-grade PLC with user-friendly Touchscreen Human-Machine Interface (HMI) for easy programming and monitoring.
  • Wrapping Efficiency: High-speed rotary ring design capable of meeting fast-paced production line requirements.
  • Film Handling: Equipped with a power pre-stretch device for optimal film yield, an automatic clipping and cutting device, and consistent tension control.
  • Safety & Durability: Built with a robust steel frame and features comprehensive perimeter safety protection devices, including guards and light curtains, ensuring safe operation in busy industrial settings.
  • Deployment: Designed as a modular system for straightforward integration into new or existing automated material handling lines.

B2B Application & ROI

This rotary ring stretch wrapper is a strategic investment for businesses in manufacturing, distribution, and third-party logistics (3PL) seeking to automate packaging, reduce labor costs, minimize film usage, and enhance load safety. Its reliability and programmability ensure a rapid return on investment through increased line efficiency and reduced product damage.

Ideal for: High-volume palletizing operations, cold storage environments, export packaging, and industries with stringent hygiene or stability requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Your Palletizing Station with the R100 Semiautomatic Wrapper

The R100 semiautomatic rotary arm stretch wrapping machine is engineered for B2B and industrial logistics environments requiring a balance of high throughput and operational simplicity. Its robust, wall-mounted design provides a permanent, space-efficient solution at your final packing station, integrating seamlessly into existing material handling workflows.

Governed by a reliable PLC system, the machine automates the wrapping cycle—ensuring consistent, secure loads—while allowing for quick operator initiation and film cutoff. This combination maximizes pallet throughput while minimizing labor time and film waste, delivering a rapid return on investment for distribution centers, manufacturing facilities, and warehouses.

Core Features for Industrial Efficiency

  • Space-Smart Design: Wall-mounted construction frees up valuable floor space and provides a stable platform for consistent operation.
  • Intelligent PLC Control: Ensures precise, repeatable wrap cycles every time, reducing operator error and material variance.
  • Automated Rotary Arm: The motorized arm rotates smoothly around the stationary load, applying film evenly for superior load integrity during transit and storage.
  • Streamlined Operation: Forklift places the pallet, the operator secures the film tail and presses start. The machine handles the wrap, after which the film is manually cut and the pallet is removed.
  • Robust Construction: Built from heavy-duty components for durability in demanding shift operations.

Technical Specifications

Working ModeSemiautomatic
Throughput CapacityUp to 35 pallets per hour
Rotating Speed10-14 RPM, adjustable via inverter
Maximum Load Size (L x W x H)1300mm x 1300mm x 2300mm
Wrapping Programmability0-99 layers configurable for bottom, middle, and top sections
Film Carriage CompatibilityLLDPE Stretch Film Rolls: 500mm Width, 250mm OD, 76mm ID Core
Film Tension SystemPrecision Force-Control (Model V)

Film Carriage & Tension System

The R100 is equipped with a heavy-duty film carriage designed for high-performance LLDPE stretch film rolls up to 500mm wide. The integrated Model V force-control system provides precise, adjustable tension throughout the wrap cycle. This ensures optimal film stretch and containment force without risk of damaging fragile loads, directly contributing to reduced film consumption and lower operating costs.

A300 Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineered for high-volume logistics, distribution centers, and manufacturing operations, the Fhope A300 automatic pallet wrapper is designed to maximize efficiency and minimize material costs. Its core innovation lies in a proprietary pre-stretch system that dramatically reduces film consumption while improving load stability.

Core Technology Advantage

Manufactured by Fhope, the A300 incorporates precision engineering and advanced electronics. The system's pre-stretch technology is engineered to exceed standard film performance, reliably achieving over 50% reduction in film usage compared to conventional methods. This delivers a rapid ROI through material savings and enhances sustainability initiatives by reducing plastic waste.

Technical Specifications & Controls

Control System

  • Controller: Industrial PLC system for reliable, repeatable operation.
  • Tension Control: Advanced pre-stretch controller for optimal film force application.
  • Operator Interface: Separate tactile buttons and a clear digital display for straightforward setup and monitoring.

Wrap Programming & Data

  • Wrap Settings: Fully adjustable overwrap and overlap, plus a re-wrap function for process flexibility.
  • Wrap Counters: Independent programmable counters for top, middle, and bottom wrap layers.
  • Cycle Counters: Total machine cycle counter and a resettable counter for shift or daily production tracking.

Safety & Compliance

The A300 is built to industrial safety standards, featuring a prominently located red emergency stop button for immediate machine halting, ensuring a safer work environment for your operators.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapper with Timber Feeding

Streamline your end-of-line packaging for long, straight products with our fully automatic horizontal orbital stretch wrapping system. This integrated solution is engineered for B2B manufacturing environments, combining robust wrapping technology with a dedicated timber feeding device to create secure, palletized bundles ready for storage and shipment.

Core System Overview

This automated profile packing line is specialized for high-volume handling of materials such as aluminum profiles, metal bars, PVC extrusions, and sheet goods. The complete system integrates a film covering device, sealer, timber feeding device, and orbital wrapping machinery into one efficient unit. It is designed for direct connection to your existing production line, enhancing workflow continuity and playing a key role in modern, automated industrial packaging procedures.

Key Operational Advantages

  • Automated Bundle Protection: Produces a tightly wrapped, sealed package that safeguards product integrity, prevents shifting, and presents a professional, tidy appearance for B2B clients.
  • Enhanced Productivity: Automates the bundling, packing, and stacking process, reducing manual labor and increasing throughput for long product lines.
  • Engineered for Industry: Built with a compact, heavy-duty steel frame for lasting performance in demanding plant conditions. Features like sub-one-minute film changeover minimize downtime.
  • Precision Handling: Profiles are smoothly drawn through the machine via a series of powered rollers, ensuring consistent alignment and wrap quality for every bundle.

Technical Specifications & Requirements

Packing Requirements

  • Primary Object: Aluminum Profile (and similar long-form materials)
  • Packing Goal: Complete Bundling, Packing, and Stacking solution.

Machine Parameters

  • Bundle Capacity (Space): Minimum: 300mm x 300mm x 6500mm | Maximum: 500mm x 500mm x 6500mm
  • Pneumatic Supply: 6-8 bar air pressure required.
  • Operational Staffing: Typically requires 2 personnel for managing the infeed of aluminum profiles.

Ideal B2B Applications

This machine is a strategic asset for manufacturers and distributors in the metals, building materials, and extrusion industries. It is specifically popular for packaging:

  • Aluminum and steel window/door profiles
  • Structural bars and tubing
  • PVC and composite trim boards
  • Sheet metal and paneling
  • Any long, straight product requiring unitized, palletized shipment.

Invest in packaging automation that protects your product and optimizes your logistics. Contact our engineering team to discuss integrating this horizontal orbital stretch wrapper into your production facility.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Mold Tilter & Upender for Automated Production

Engineered for precision and reliability in high-volume manufacturing environments, our Industrial Mold Tilter automates the critical process of mold rotation and transfer. This system is designed to integrate directly into your production line, eliminating manual handling bottlenecks and enhancing operational safety.

Core Technology & Design

Our mold upender utilizes a robust double-chain drive system, powered by a helical gear and worm reducer, ensuring smooth, controlled rotation of heavy molds and tooling. The four contact rollers are specifically wrapped with a polyamide adhesive to prevent surface damage to valuable molds during the tiling process.

Built with integration in mind, the unit readily connects to automated conveyor systems, enabling a fully automated workflow for loading and unloading—a key advantage for lean manufacturing and Industry 4.0 initiatives.

Engineered for Safety & Control

  • Position Locking Function: Prevents uncontrolled rotation, securing the mold in the desired orientation.
  • Dual Displacement Current Limiters: Provide an additional layer of operational safety by monitoring system performance.
  • Emergency Stop (E-stop): Ensures immediate machine halt for operator safety and asset protection.

Customizable B2B Solutions

We specialize in adapting our mold tilting technology to your unique production requirements. From specific load capacities and dimensions to specialized control system interfaces, our engineering team collaborates with you to deliver a solution that delivers maximum ROI and process efficiency.

Value-Driven Partnership

We focus on delivering superior value through durable design, advanced safety features, and seamless line integration. Our commitment is to provide machinery that enhances your production reliability, reduces downtime, and protects your capital investment in precision molds and tooling.

fullContentHtml:
FPCT Series Industrial Coil Upender & Tilter

FHOPE delivers engineered material handling solutions beyond packaging machinery. Our FPCT Series Coil Upender is a precision-engineered system designed to safely and efficiently reorient heavy coils, moulds, and rolls, optimizing your operational workflow and enhancing workplace safety.

Strategic Application for Core Industries

This robust upending solution is critical for material positioning in demanding production environments, including:

  • Steel Coil Processing & Distribution
  • Aluminum & Copper Coil Handling
  • Wire & Cable Manufacturing
  • Foundry and Mould Management
  • Roll and Spool Positioning
  • Heavy Fabrication and Stamping

Engineered for Performance & Reliability

The FPCT Series is built to integrate seamlessly into your process line, providing dependable performance that reduces downtime and manual labor risks.

  • High-Torque Drive System: A special double-chain drive, combined with an oblique gear and worm speed reducer, delivers the power and durability needed for continuous heavy-duty cycles.
  • Surface Protection: The four-roller bed is wrapped with a polyamide adhesive, ensuring a non-marking, protective grip that preserves the integrity of valuable coils and materials.
  • Precision Control: Inverter-based controls allow for adjustable rotation speeds, enabling fast, stable, and precise positioning tailored to specific load requirements.
  • Safety-First Design: Two independent mechanical displacement restrictors are employed to guarantee safe operation by preventing over-rotation and securing the load throughout the cycle.

Your Partner in Process Optimization

FHOPE is more than a supplier; we are a solutions partner. We assist in analyzing your material handling goals to identify the right upending solution that enhances safety, throughput, and ROI for your specific operation. Contact our engineering team to discuss your application requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Coil Upender Tilter

Engineered for precision and safety in heavy-duty B2B material handling, our Industrial Coil Upender Tilter automates the critical process of rotating and positioning large coils and modules. This system is designed to integrate seamlessly into metallurgical, manufacturing, and processing lines, replacing inefficient and hazardous manual methods.

Core Applications & Industries

This robust tilter is primarily deployed in the metallurgical sector for the safe reversal of steel and aluminum coils. Its versatile design also supports operations in module handling, suspension systems, and roller conveyor integrations, providing a unified solution for diverse material positioning challenges.

Key Operational Advantages

  • Custom Engineering: Each upender can be tailored to specific load capacities, floor space, and integration points within your existing workflow.
  • Adaptable Drive System: The power drive is configured based on your precise loading parameters, ensuring optimal performance and energy efficiency.
  • Gear Motor Reliability: Utilizes a dependable gear motor to deliver consistent power for smooth, controlled tilting motions.
  • Priority on Safety: The design fundamentally prioritizes operator safety by distancing personnel from the point of rotation, significantly reducing workplace risk.
  • Durable Construction: Features a mechanically reinforced strut with specialized banding and body treatments to withstand continuous industrial use.

Technical Features

  1. Advanced Structural Design: Incorporates reliable helical gears paired with a high-quality worm reducer for unmatched operational integrity.
  2. Heavy-Duty Roller Support: A four-roll device provides stable and balanced support throughout the entire tilt cycle.
  3. Precision Speed Control: An inverter-based system allows for full control over rotation speed, accommodating delicate or varied materials.
  4. Safe Operation Protocol: Engineered controls and layout ensure safe operation, protecting both your investment and your team.

Optimize your material handling efficiency and safety. Contact our engineering team to discuss custom specifications and integration for your coil upending requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Coil Upender with Integrated Conveyor System

Engineered for high-throughput production environments, this automatic coil upender streamlines material flow by integrating a robust turnover mechanism with a synchronized conveyor platform. It is designed to enhance productivity, ensure operator safety, and protect valuable coil stock.

Core Operational Advantages

This system automates the critical task of coil reorientation, turning heavy coils 90 degrees in approximately 50 seconds. The integrated roller conveyor on the platform ensures smooth receipt and dispatch of materials, creating a continuous, efficient link in your automated factory line.

Operational control is managed by an automated system driven by motor power and guided by photo-eye sensors. The remote control desk, positioned away from the working zone, provides a safer and more ergonomic environment for personnel.

Engineering for Durability & Product Integrity

To maximize machine service life and minimize coil damage, key contact points are fitted with protective nylon panels. Strategic design includes reserved cutouts to secure pallets and dedicated clearance spaces, developed from direct customer feedback, to facilitate C-hook hoist operation and prevent device-to-machine collisions.

Key Industrial Features

  • Fully Automated Turnover: PLC-controlled system with platform conveyor for hands-free, line-synchronized operation.
  • Heavy-Duty Load Capacity: Robust design and components built to handle demanding industrial loads continuously.
  • Comprehensive Safety Protocol: Features emergency stop functions and a mechanical position lock to prevent unintended rotation.
  • Enhanced Product Protection: Nylon-lined V-saddle and collision-avoidance design protect coil finish and quality.
  • Optimized for Integration: Pre-engineered compatibility with standard pallets and overhead hoist systems for simplified plant integration.

  • Operational Flexibility: Features adjustable rotation speed and multiple control options (pendant/remote) to adapt to various material types and production line layouts.

fullContentHtml:
Fully Automated Horizontal Steel Coil Packaging Line

FHOPE's engineered packaging line delivers a complete, automated solution for high-volume B2B operations, seamlessly integrating with your existing slitting line to package slit strip, steel, copper, and stainless steel coils with precision and speed.

Streamlined End-to-End Packaging Process

Our turnkey system is designed for maximum throughput and operational continuity. The line begins with an auto turnstile and coil car integration at the slitting line exit, ensuring a smooth material handoff. It then automates the entire packaging sequence: up-ending, precision strapping, protective wrapping, powered conveyance, stacking, and final pallet wrapping—all without manual intervention.

Engineered for Unmanned Efficiency & Custom Workflows

This solution eliminates production gaps, enabling true unmanned operations. We collaborate closely with your team to understand your specific coil dimensions, output targets, and logistical requirements. Every FHOPE Slit Coils Packing Line is customized, with functions and specifications built to match your unique operational needs. Detailed engineering drawings are provided for review and planning.

Your Optimized Packaging Solution

Contact the FHOPE team for a comprehensive consultation. We analyze your packaging list and workflow to recommend and provide the optimal, high-performance packaging solution that guarantees reliability, speed, and a strong return on investment for your facility.

Optimize Coil Handling with Precision Engineered Transfer Solutions

Our Industrial Coil Transfer Car is a cornerstone of modern metallurgical and steel processing facilities, designed to automate and secure the movement of coils between critical stages like slitting, handling, packaging, and stacking. This system eliminates reliance on crane handling, enhancing throughput and floor space utilization.

Core Applications for Process Integration

This transfer car is engineered for seamless integration into your production line. It effectively connects to coil cars on slitting lines, coil turnstiles, and coil upenders/downenders, creating a continuous, efficient, and safer material flow that replaces intermittent crane operations.

Engineered for Performance & Safety

The unit combines a special structural design for stable coil lifting and rotation with a heavy-duty ground transportation drive built for durability. Operational safety is paramount, managed through a system that combines manual oversight with automated control limits, emergency stop functions, and secure position locking.

Advanced Control & Operational Flexibility

Control is provided via a manual pendant or remote control, paired with a speed-regulating inverter for smooth acceleration and precise positioning. The semi-automatic work mode ensures optimal balance between operator oversight and automated efficiency, featuring automatic positioning at load/unload points.

fullContentHtml:
FPCT Series 180-Degree Hydraulic Load Inverter

Engineered for precision and durability in demanding industrial environments, the Fhope FPCT Series Load Inverter delivers reliable 180-degree rotation to optimize material handling workflows, enhance worker safety, and protect valuable products from damage during processing.

Core Industrial Applications

  • Steel Coil Industry: Safely invert and reposition heavy coils for processing, storage, and transportation.
  • Aluminum & Copper Coil Industry: Handle sensitive non-ferrous coils with a clamping system designed to prevent surface defects.
  • Wire Coil Industry: Efficiently manage spools and wire coils for continuous production lines.
  • Mould & Die Industry: Precisely rotate heavy molds and dies for maintenance, cleaning, and machining operations.
  • Palletized Loads: Securely invert palletized goods for quality control, packaging, or process requirements.
  • Wheel & Spool Handling: Manage large tires, reels, and cylindrical products with stable, controlled rotation.

Operational Advantages

The FPCT Series features a robust C-type frame that facilitates straightforward integration with existing forklifts and material handling equipment. The optional base rotating drive system is a key efficiency upgrade, enabling loading and unloading from the same side. This innovation eliminates unnecessary forklift movement, reduces cycle times, and maximizes floor space utilization within your facility.

Engineered for Safety & Reliability

At the heart of the FPCT Series is a powerful hydraulic system that ensures smooth, controlled rotation while the integrated hydraulic clamping device firmly secures the load. This combination guarantees operational safety for personnel and absolute protection for your products, preventing scratches, dents, and other handling-related damage that can impact quality and increase costs.

Customization Available: Fhope specializes in tailoring load inverter solutions to meet unique capacity, dimension, and automation requirements. Contact our engineering team to discuss a configuration designed for your specific application.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Upender & Tilter Systems

Fhope is a leading manufacturer of industrial tilting solutions, specializing in robust upender systems designed for material handling and production line integration. Our equipment facilitates precise product rotation for manufacturing, packaging, and assembly processes.

Drive System Options

Engineered for reliability, our upenders are available in two primary drive configurations to suit different operational environments and power requirements:

  • Hydraulic Upender: Powered by an industrial-grade oil pump, this system delivers consistent, stable strength for smooth and controlled rotation. Ideal for heavy-load applications requiring precise movement within a 90-degree or 180-degree arc.
  • Mechanical Upender: A robust alternative for applications where mechanical drive is preferred, offering durability and straightforward maintenance.

Engineering & Quality Commitment

All Fhope upenders are constructed using high-quality materials and components selected for longevity and performance. Our manufacturing process includes stringent quality checks at critical stages. Prior to dispatch, each hydraulic unit undergoes a comprehensive inspection of its manufacturing process and components to identify and rectify any potential safety concerns.

Compliance & Global Standards

Our hydraulic tilter systems are certified to CE and ISO standards. This certification ensures the machinery meets essential health, safety, and environmental protection requirements, facilitating convenient and rapid entry into the European market and other regulated regions worldwide.

fullContentHtml:
Precision Engineered for Industrial Spool & Coil Handling

Our Heavy-Duty Spool & Coil Tilter is a robust material handling solution designed for B2B operations in cable manufacturing, metal processing, and heavy fabrication. It performs controlled rotation, subversion, and precise positioning of large, heavy loads such as wire spools, steel coils, aluminum coils, and industrial modules, enhancing workflow efficiency and operator safety.

Core Applications

  • Wire & Cable Industry: Safe turnover of cable drums and spools for winding, unwinding, and inspection points.
  • Metal Processing: Rotation and handling of steel coils, aluminum coils, and other metal rolls.
  • Module & Component Handling: Controlled subversion and rotation of large electrical modules, transformer coils, and fabricated assemblies.

Technical Advantages

Built for reliability in demanding environments, this tilter combines robust mechanics with intelligent control. The heavy-duty double-chain drive system, paired with a helical gear and worm reducer, delivers consistent high-torque performance. The polyamide-clad rollers protect valuable product finishes, while the Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) ensures smooth, adjustable rotation speeds for process optimization.

Safety & Control Integration

Engineered with a multi-layered safety architecture, including dual limiters and electric switches, to meet stringent industrial safety standards. The emergency stop function incorporates a positive lock to prevent any unintended movement. Choose between a standard control panel or a remote-control system for seamless integration into your existing material handling workflow.

Custom-Built Flexibility

We recognize that no two production lines are identical. This spool tilter is offered as a customizable platform. Key parameters—including the drive system (hydraulic or electric), conveyor interfacing, and table configuration—can be engineered to your specific load dimensions, cycle times, and plant layout requirements. Contact our engineering team to discuss a tailored solution for your operation.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Coil Tilter & Upender for Heavy-Duty Material Handling

Engineered for precision and safety in demanding B2B environments, our coil tilter (also known as a coil upender) is a critical solution for metallurgical, steel service, and manufacturing facilities. It is designed for efficient module handling, coil rotation, and controlled inversion of heavy loads, streamlining production and warehouse workflows.

Core Applications & Industries

This robust machine is essential for handling steel coil, aluminum coil, and large fabricated modules. Its primary application is in sectors requiring safe and efficient reorientation of heavy, cylindrical, or bulky materials, including metal processing, stamping operations, and logistics centers.

Key Engineering Features

  • Durable Drive System: Constructed with a heavy-duty mechanical frame, motor drive, and a combination of helical gear and worm gear reducer for reliable, high-torque operation.
  • Enhanced Roller Design: A redesigned four-roll device provides optimal contact and stability, preventing load slippage during tilting and upending processes.
  • Precision Speed Management: Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) control allows for fully adjustable, smooth acceleration and deceleration, ensuring fast cycle times without compromising safety or load integrity.
  • Comprehensive Safety Protocol: Features dual independent limiters for operational boundaries, a precise stop-and-hold function at any angle, and an emergency stop with a positive rotation lock to secure the load during interventions.

Control & Customization

Operate via a centralized industrial control panel or a flexible remote control for operator convenience and safety. The integrated inverter allows fine-tuned speed adjustment. We offer optional worm gear motors and fully customizable builds tailored to your specific load capacity, footprint, and integration requirements with existing automation or crane systems.

fullContentHtml:
FHOPE Automatic Pipe and Tube Bundling & Strapping Line

An integrated, automated packaging solution engineered for industrial manufacturers and processors of metal pipes and tubes. The FHOPE line standardizes and accelerates the final packaging stage, transforming loose inventory into secure, handled bundles ready for shipment or storage.

System Overview

This complete bundling and strapping system consolidates multiple manual processes into a single, synchronized production line. It is designed for operations handling steel, copper, and stainless steel pipes or tubes, significantly reducing labor costs, improving bundle consistency, and enhancing workplace safety by minimizing manual handling.

The modular design allows configuration to specific material profiles and output requirements, ensuring optimal performance for round, square, rectangular, or custom hexagonal bundle shapes.

Core Technical Features

  • Automated Bundle Formation: A dedicated forming machine precisely arranges tubes into uniform hexagon, square, or round bundles for optimal strapping and stability.
  • Precision Feeding & Handling: Integrated feeding devices ensure consistent presentation of tubes to the wrapping and strapping stations, maintaining line rhythm.
  • Automatic Wrapping & Strapping: The system applies protective wrapping and high-tensile strapping automatically, creating a secure, unitized load that prevents shifting during transit.
  • Continuous Flow Conveyance: Finished bundles are automatically discharged onto a conveyor system, which accumulates them for efficient pickup by forklift or overhead crane, eliminating staging bottlenecks.
  • Robust System Design: Built for industrial environments, ensuring high uptime, durability, and consistent performance in demanding 24/7 operations.

Operational Advantages for B2B Buyers

Increased Throughput

Automate the labor-intensive bundling process to package more material per shift, directly increasing warehouse and shipping output.

Enhanced Bundle Integrity

Machine-applied strapping and consistent bundle formation reduce product damage and claims, improving customer satisfaction.

Reduced Labor Dependency & Cost

Minimize manual lifting, carrying, and strapping, lowering direct labor costs and reducing the risk of repetitive strain injuries.

Optimized Floor Space

A streamlined, in-line system replaces scattered manual stations, creating a more organized and efficient production floor layout.

Available System Options

The FHOPE line can be customized with additional modules to fit specific operational data capture and handling needs.

  • Automatic Counting Device: Provides precise piece counts for each bundle, essential for inventory control and shipping accuracy.
  • Layer Lifter: Facilitates the handling of heavy or multiple layers of tubes during the bundle formation process.
  • Integrated Weighing System: Automatically weighs finished bundles for shipping documentation and logistics planning.
  • Custom Conveyor Lengths & Configurations: Tailored to interface seamlessly with your existing material handling infrastructure.

Ideal For:

Metal service centers, tube mills, pipe distributors, and large-scale fabrication plants seeking to automate the final stage of their production or processing line to improve efficiency, safety, and bundle quality.

fullContentHtml:
A-Series Pallet Inverter: Economical Load Transfer for Industrial Logistics

The Fhope A-Series Pallet Inverter is engineered for B2B operations requiring a cost-effective and reliable solution for pallet exchange and load transfer. This single-clamper system enhances supply chain efficiency by automating a critical yet labor-intensive process.

Operational Workflow

The process is designed for seamless integration into existing warehouse workflows. A forklift places the loaded pallet onto the machine's bottom platform. The clamper securely closes, and the unit performs a stable 180-degree rotation. Once inverted, the original pallet can be withdrawn, leaving the load on a new pallet or platform. This straightforward operation minimizes downtime in shipping, receiving, and product recovery processes.

B2B Applications & Industry Use

This unit is a strategic asset for operations managing packaged goods. It is extensively utilized for:

  • Pallet Standardization: Converting loads from wood to plastic pallets or slip sheets to meet retailer requirements or hygiene standards.
  • Damage Recovery: Salvaging products from compromised bottom pallets, reducing financial loss.
  • Logistics Flexibility: Supporting mixed pallet pool policies and reverse logistics.
  • Sector-Specific Handling: Ideal for food (yogurt, biscuits), beverages (bottled wine, cans), and industrial materials (bagged cement).

Durable Construction for Demanding Environments

Built with a high-capacity structure and concrete reinforcement, the A-Series promises long-term operational integrity. For facilities in corrosive or washdown environments (e.g., food processing), optional stainless steel cladding or galvanized anti-rust paint is available to ensure longevity and compliance with sanitation protocols.

Primary Use Field: Pallet Replacement, Warehouse Logistics, Distribution Center Automation.

fullContentHtml:
Vertical Coil Packaging Line for Industrial Metal Processing

Our automated vertical coil packaging line is engineered for precision, efficiency, and reliability in demanding B2B industrial environments. Designed specifically for handling steel, copper, aluminum, and wire coils, this integrated system streamlines the entire packaging process from loading to palletizing, ensuring optimal product protection and throughput.

Core System Advantages

This turnkey solution eliminates bottlenecks and manual handling errors. The modular architecture allows for seamless integration of additional units like strapping and weighing equipment, tailoring the line to your specific operational and logistical requirements. The robust dual-control system—comprising a centralized electric control cabinet and a manual operation platform—ensures operational flexibility and minimal downtime.

Integrated Line Components & Workflow

  • Coil Turnstile & Car: Automates the loading of slit coils from upstream processes, transporting them precisely into the packaging line.
  • Down Ender: Safely reorients coils from vertical to horizontal positioning for downstream processing on conveyors.
  • Strapping Machine: Applies high-tension straps through the coil's inner diameter (ID) using durable PET, PE, or steel belts to secure the product core.
  • Coil Wrapping Machine: Performs through-eye cross-wrapping with various materials (e.g., stretch film, paper) for superior surface protection and load stability during transit.
  • Coil Stacking & Palletizing Machine: Automatically moves finished, packaged coils onto pallets for efficient storage and shipment, completing the automated cycle.

B2B Applications & Industries

This system is critical infrastructure for metal service centers, mills, and distributors requiring high-volume, consistent packaging.

Steel & Aluminum Coils

Protects against corrosion, edge damage, and deformation during handling and shipping. Essential for automotive, construction, and appliance supply chains.

Copper & Wire Coils

Ensures the integrity of sensitive electrical components and conductive materials. Prevents nicks, oxidation, and tangling, which is vital for electrical manufacturing and cable production.

Invest in a packaging line that enhances operational efficiency, reduces labor costs, and delivers your metal products to customers in pristine condition. Contact our engineering team for a customized throughput analysis and layout proposal.

fullContentHtml:
Complete Automated Packaging Solution for Industrial Hose & Tubing

Our Hose Coil Automated Packaging Line represents a turnkey industrial solution engineered to eliminate bottlenecks and manual handling in your post-extrusion process. This integrated system is designed for manufacturers of plastic hose, tubing, and flexible piping seeking to optimize packaging efficiency, ensure product integrity, and achieve significant labor savings.

System Overview & Integration

The line seamlessly integrates discrete automated processes—from initial coiling to final palletizing—into a synchronized workflow. Core modules include an Automatic Coiling Machine for precise winding, a Motorized Conveyor System for material handling, and downstream Wrapping & Strapping Machines for secure bundling. For complete logistics-ready packaging, optional Automated Coil Stacking and Pallet Wrapping Units can be incorporated, creating a closed-loop system that delivers palletized loads directly to shipping.

Core Component: Automatic Hose Pipe Coiling Machine

The Fhope Automatic Hose Pipe Coiling Machine serves as the intelligent heart of the line. It is engineered for high-volume production of consistent, tight coils from materials like PVC, CPVC, and PEX. The unit automates the entire coiling sequence: automatic feeding from the extrusion line, precise tension control, accurate length measurement, controlled layer winding, clean cutting, and final coil forming. This ensures every coil meets professional packaging standards, ready for the subsequent protective wrapping and securing stages.

Key Business Advantages

  • Maximized Production Efficiency: Continuous operation drastically increases packaging speed and overall line throughput.
  • Reduced Operational Costs: Minimizes reliance on manual labor for coiling, handling, and palletizing, lowering long-term operational expenses.
  • Enhanced Product Protection: Automated, consistent handling and secure packaging reduce the risk of coil damage, tangling, or deformation during transit.
  • Unified System Control: Centralized management of the packaging process simplifies operations, maintenance, and quality control.
  • Future-Proof Flexibility: The modular design allows for reconfiguration or expansion to accommodate new products, materials, or increased capacity demands.

This system is the definitive solution for B2B manufacturers aiming to modernize their packaging operations, improve supply chain reliability, and strengthen their competitive edge through industrial automation.
