Automatic Pipe and Tube Bundling & Strapping Line

FHOPE's automated bundling and strapping line is engineered for industrial-scale efficiency in pipe and tube packaging. This integrated system handles steel, copper, and stainless steel materials, transforming them into secure, uniform bundles ready for storage and shipment.

Streamlined Packaging Process

The line automates the entire post-production packaging workflow. It forms pipes or tubes into dense hexagonal or square bundles, applies consistent strapping for structural integrity, and can include protective wrapping. The completed bundles are conveyed to a designated pickup area, minimizing handling time and optimizing floor space.

Core System Advantages

  • Enhanced Throughput: Automates forming, strapping, and conveying to significantly increase packaging line output.
  • Bundle Uniformity: Creates consistent, stable bundle profiles (hexagon, square, round) for secure stacking and transport.
  • Labor Optimization: Reduces manual handling requirements, reallocating personnel to higher-value tasks.
  • Improved Safety: Minimizes worker interaction with heavy loads and strapping machinery.
  • Logistical Integration: Designed with integrated conveyors for seamless handoff to forklifts or crane systems.

Technical Integration & Flexibility

The system is a cohesive assembly of specialized machinery: a forming machine creates the bundle shape, a feeding device supplies material, and an automatic wrapper applies protection. It supports various levels of automation and can be configured with additional modules like automatic counting devices and layer lifters to suit specific production volumes and material specifications.

Ideal For Industrial Applications

This line is a critical component for metal service centers, pipe and tube manufacturers, and large-scale fabrication plants seeking to standardize packaging, protect product quality during handling, and improve dock-to-storage logistics.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Panel Packaging Line for Industrial Manufacturing

Our fully integrated Automatic Panel Packaging Line is engineered for B2B manufacturers seeking to optimize end-of-line operations for insulated building panels. This turnkey system eliminates bottlenecks by automating the entire process from lifting to palletizing, ensuring your production speed is never compromised.

Complete, Integrated Packaging System

The line comprises a synchronized suite of industrial machinery: a heavy-duty conveyor system, a precision vacuum panel lifter, a high-capacity stacking machine, a robust strapping unit, and either a wrapping or shrinking tunnel, culminating in an automatic palletizer. This cohesive solution is specifically designed for the continuous, online packaging of sandwich panels, EPS panels, and EPP panels.

Engineered for Performance and Efficiency

The line's specification is centered on direct integration. It connects via vacuum lifter to the exit point of your existing panel production line. We provide tailored solutions based on a detailed analysis of your production volume and packaging specifications, guaranteeing a system that secures your target throughput. Achieve maximum packaging velocity with operational efficiency that reduces labor to a single supervising staff member for all packaging stages.

Core Component: Automatic Panel Lifter & Stacking Machine

This critical subsystem automates the panel stacking process. The machine rapidly and effectively stacks insulating EPS, sandwich panels, and other large-format parts, forming uniform, stable bundles ready for the next packaging phase, even when handling substantial panel dimensions.

B2B Value Proposition:

  • Increase Output: Remove manual handling as a production constraint.
  • Reduce Operational Costs: Minimize labor requirements and associated overhead.
  • Enhance Product Integrity: Consistent, automated handling reduces risk of damage.
  • Improve Line Synchronization: Seamless integration ensures a smooth flow from production to shipment.

Automated Aluminum Profile Packing Line for Industrial Manufacturing

FHOPEPACK's automatic aluminum profile packing line is a custom-engineered, turnkey system designed to integrate seamlessly with your extrusion production. It automates the final packaging stage, transforming loose profiles into secure, uniform bundles ready for storage and shipment, enhancing throughput and protecting product integrity.

Complete In-Line Packaging Solution

Our system provides a comprehensive packaging workflow, including automatic profile banding, high-tensile aluminum strapping, protective stretch wrapping, and programmed bundle formation. This end-to-end automation eliminates manual handling bottlenecks and ensures consistent, reliable bundle quality.

Core System Components

1. Aluminum Bundle Strapping Machine

Applies high-strength steel or plastic strapping around aluminum profile bundles, ensuring tight compression and stability for safe transport and handling.

2. Aluminum Wrapping Machine

Provides a robust stretch film wrapping solution, delivering a protective layer against dust, moisture, and abrasion for finished profile bundles.

3. Aluminum Bundling Machine

The central forming unit integrates forks, lifting systems, and roller conveyors. It automatically assembles profiles into dense, layered bundles according to programmable settings, optimizing bundle density and shape for logistical efficiency.

This integrated packing line is engineered to meet specific plant layouts and output targets, providing a scalable, reliable conclusion to your aluminum extrusion process. Contact FHOPEPACK to discuss a tailored solution for your production requirements.

Automatic Steel Tube Strapping Machine

Engineered for precision and durability in heavy-duty industrial bundling applications, our automatic strapping machine streamlines the consolidation of steel tube bundles, enhancing warehouse efficiency and shipping security.

Optimized Bundling Process

The system automates the strapping process, significantly reducing manual labor while maintaining the option for manual operation when required. It intelligently performs straps at multiple positions dictated by the bundle length, ensuring uniform load restraint.

Designed for seamless integration, the machine is stationed at a fixed point within your workflow. Bundles are transported to the machine, where they are automatically indexed to receive each strapping application, facilitating a continuous and efficient production line.

Core Features & Benefits

  • Uninterrupted Operation: High-reliability design ensures consistent performance, maximizing uptime and return on investment.
  • Adaptive Strapping: Programmable logic adjusts the strapping pattern for different bundle lengths, guaranteeing optimal security.
  • Robust Sealing: Notching seal type creates a permanent, high-strength joint on the steel strap.
  • Heavy-Duty Performance: Capable of handling steel straps up to 32mm wide and 1.0mm thick, with tension forces up to 18,000N.

Industrial Automatic Pipe Strapping & Bundling Line

Engineered for manufacturing facilities, this fully automatic system streamlines the final packaging stage for PPR and PVC pipes. It replaces manual, inconsistent bundling with a high-speed, reliable process that secures pipe bundles for shipment and storage, enhancing your production line's efficiency and end-product presentation.

Core System Advantages for Your Operation

This system is not an off-the-shelf solution. Its design is driven by your specific production metrics, pipe profiles, and logistical requirements. We focus on delivering a machine that integrates smoothly into your workflow, addressing the critical B2B needs of maximizing uptime, ensuring bundle integrity, and controlling operational costs.

Engineered for Maximum Production Uptime

Reliability is the cornerstone of our design. Through strategic component selection and robust system architecture, this packing line is built to perform consistently in a 24/7 manufacturing environment. The intelligent monitoring software provides real-time operational data and can pinpoint fault locations, enabling your maintenance team to conduct swift, targeted repairs and minimize line stoppages.

Simplified Maintenance & Service Protocols

We reduce complexity for your technical staff. The system employs a standardized design philosophy with a comprehensive spare parts list, ensuring clarity in inventory management and procurement. Continuous software improvements empower the system to conduct self-diagnostics, transforming maintenance from reactive to predictive and planned.

Technical Integration & Workflow

The automatic line typically interfaces directly with your pipe extrusion or handling conveyor. Pipes are automatically collated into predefined bundles, precisely strapped with polymer or steel straps, and discharged as secure, uniform packages ready for palletizing. This closed-loop process eliminates bottlenecks, reduces labor dependency, and guarantees a professional, shipment-ready bundle every time.

Contact our engineering team to discuss your pipe specifications, required throughput, and integration points for a detailed system proposal.

Automated Industrial Pipe Bagging System

Engineered to meet the specific packaging demands of pipe and tube manufacturers, this automated bagging system eliminates manual handling for single-unit packaging. Developed in response to direct industry feedback, it provides a reliable, stand-alone solution to automatically insert disposable piping into protective bags, enhancing line efficiency and product presentation.

System Overview & Capabilities

This machine is primarily deployed for the automatic bagging of individual plastic pipes (including PVC and PPR), steel tubes, copper pipes, rods, and various profiles. It performs the complete sequence of bag filling, sealing, and cutting without operator intervention, ensuring a consistent and professional package ready for storage or shipment.

Core System Features

  • Integrated Automatic Feeder: Supplied complete with a pipe collector for consistent and orderly product intake.
  • Precision Cutting Unit: Features an electronic controller to guarantee millimetric cutting accuracy for every bag.
  • Automatic Film Feeding: Ensures a continuous and reliable supply of packaging film to the sealing station.
  • High-Performance Sealing Unit: Creates durable, secure seals to protect pipes from dust, moisture, and handling damage.
  • Automatic Cutting & Discharge: Completes the cycle by neatly severing the sealed bag and preparing for the next product.

Designed for Manufacturing Efficiency

Born from extensive experience serving the global plastic and steel industries, this Pipe Packaging System addresses the critical need for automated, single-piece bagging. It is a direct solution to streamline packaging operations, reduce labor costs, and improve the final product quality for distributors and fabricators.

fullContentHtml:
Fhope Automatic PPR/PVC Pipe Bagging Line

Streamline your plastic and metal pipe packaging operations with the Fhope Automatic Bagging Line. Engineered for industrial-scale reliability, this system delivers consistent, secure packaging for PPR, PVC, and stainless steel pipes, enhancing product protection and production line efficiency.

Engineered for Industrial Performance

Fhope provides robust packaging automation solutions designed to solve critical B2B production challenges. We address issues like loose, irregular packaging and manual handling bottlenecks with innovative, cost-effective systems. Our integrated team—spanning sales, engineering, equipment service, and customer support—partners with you to design and implement the optimal protective packaging system for your specific application and throughput requirements.

Core System Advantages

  • High Reliability: Built for continuous operation in demanding industrial environments, minimizing downtime and maintenance costs.
  • Operational Flexibility: Easily configure the system to bag single pipes or bundled pipes, with adjustments for varying pipe diameters and shapes.
  • Material Efficiency: Utilizes welded PE or PP film to create durable bags on-demand, reducing material waste and storage space.
  • Seamless Integration: Our engineering department ensures the bagging line integrates optimally with your existing production and material handling systems.

Automated Working Cycle

The system operates on a precise, fully automated cycle designed for maximum throughput:

  1. Automatic Feeding: The pipe bundle is fed into the line automatically, ensuring consistent positioning for packaging.
  2. Conveyance & Positioning: The bundle is conveyed into the integrated film welding and bag filling station.
  3. Automatic Bag Making: The system forms and seals a bag from a roll of PE or PP film at high speed.
  4. Automatic Insertion: The equipment precisely pushes the pipe bundle into the newly formed bag, completing the packaging process.

Technical Specifications

  • Primary Applications: PPR pipes, PVC pipes, stainless steel pipes, garden hoses, steel tubes
  • Packaging Material: Welded Polyethylene (PE) or Polypropylene (PP) film
  • Process Type: Fully automated bag forming, filling, and sealing
  • Packaging Mode: Configurable for single pipes or custom pipe bundles
  • Key Benefit: Replaces manual, inconsistent packaging with a high-speed, uniform automated solution.

To learn more about how the Fhope PVC pipe bag packing machine can optimize your packaging line for garden hoses, PVE pipes, or steel tubes, contact our engineering and sales departments for detailed information and a system design consultation.

Automated Aluminum Profile Packing Line for Industrial Manufacturing

Our automatic aluminum profile packing line is a custom-engineered system designed to automate and optimize the final stage of your extrusion process. We move beyond standard equipment to deliver a integrated solution that aligns precisely with your production output, profile specifications, and logistical requirements.

Core System Advantages

This line transforms loose extrusions into secure, uniform bundles ready for shipment. By automating bundling, strapping, and wrapping, you achieve significant gains in packing speed, material consistency, and labor allocation. The result is a direct improvement in dock-to-dock efficiency and a reduction in product damage during transit.

Modular Components for a Complete Line

The system can be configured with the following industrial-grade machines to create your ideal workflow:

  • Aluminum Bundle Strapping Machine: Applies high-tension steel or polymer straps at multiple points to create a rigid, transport-ready bundle. Configurable for various bundle sizes and strap patterns.
  • Aluminum Profile Wrapping Machine: Encases the strapped bundle in a tight layer of stretch film. This provides protection against dust, moisture, and abrasion, ensuring profiles arrive at the customer's site in pristine condition. The film stretch capability ensures efficient material use and a tight seal.

Each component is built for seamless integration, ensuring reliable material transfer and synchronized operation for continuous, high-volume packing.

Request a Custom Packing Line Proposal

Maximize the return on your extrusion output. Contact our engineering team to discuss your profile dimensions, daily volume, and automation goals. We will provide a detailed layout and specification for a packing line built to meet your specific operational and financial targets.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Coil Packing Machine: Automated Protection for Metal Coils

Streamline your coil handling and shipping operations with a high-performance industrial coil packing machine. Engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, this automated system delivers consistent, secure packaging to safeguard valuable metal coils during transit and storage.

Optimize Your Packaging Line for Efficiency & Protection

Our advanced ring-type coil packer automates the wrapping process, significantly increasing packaging rates while reducing reliance on manual labor. The adjustable speed of the rotating ring and rollers, controlled by precision inverters, allows for seamless accommodation of various coil dimensions and weights, ensuring a perfect pack every time.

Superior Surface Protection for Product Integrity

The machine applies a tight, contiguous layer of protective film, paper, or fabric with controllable overlap. This process creates a robust barrier that actively eliminates air pockets and minimizes ingress of dust, moisture, and environmental contaminants. The result is a significant reduction in the risk of corrosion, water spots, and surface rust, preserving the quality and value of your coiled products from production line to end user.

Engineered for Industrial Demands

Designed to meet the rigorous demands of modern supply chains, this coil wrapping machine is the proven solution for businesses seeking to enhance operational efficiency. It achieves higher packaging throughput, requires minimal floor space, and lowers total cost of ownership by cutting material waste and labor expenses. Its market-proven reliability and performance make it a solid investment for securing your coil packaging process.

fullContentHtml:
FPT-200 Automated Tyre Stretch Wrapping System

Engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, the FPT-200 is a robust automated solution designed to streamline the packaging of motorcycle and lightweight tyres. This system eliminates manual labor, standardizes packaging quality, and secures loads for safe transport and storage, directly impacting your operational efficiency and bottom line.

Strategic Advantages for Your Business

Transitioning from manual tyre packaging to the FPT-200 automated wrapper delivers measurable ROI through significant labor cost reduction, elimination of packaging inconsistencies, and enhanced line throughput. The machine ensures each tyre or bundle is uniformly wrapped, improving both in-facility handling and shipment stability to reduce damage claims.

Core Technology & Integration

At the heart of the FPT-200 is a durable, fixed-ring carriage system driven by industrial-grade inverters and a programmable logic controller (PLC). This allows for seamless integration into existing conveyor lines or standalone station use. The precision speed control guarantees gentle handling of products while maintaining high cycle rates, and the quick-adjust tooling minimizes changeover time between different tyre specifications, maximizing asset utilization.

Operational Workflow

The workflow is optimized for minimal operator intervention: position the tyre bundle, select the program, and initiate the cycle. The machine automatically applies the stretch film with the preset tension and overlap, completes the wrap, cuts, and secures the film, and resets for the next load. This repeatable process ensures every unit meets your exact packaging standards.

Built for Industrial Durability

Constructed with heavy-duty components for continuous operation in demanding industrial environments, the FPT-200 is designed for longevity and low maintenance. Its comprehensive safety guarding meets industry standards, protecting personnel and ensuring reliable, uninterrupted production.

FPS Series Automated Steel Coil Wrapping System

FHOPEPACK's FPS Series represents a high-efficiency, automated solution for industrial coil packaging. Engineered for precision and reliability, our systems are designed to streamline your packaging line, significantly reduce operational costs, and ensure superior protection for valuable metal coils during storage and shipment.

Engineered for Industrial Packaging Efficiency

Our automated wrapping machines utilize advanced through-eye (cross-wrapping) technology. This method creates a firm, uniform package that provides exceptional dustproof and waterproof sealing, safeguarding coil integrity against environmental and handling damage.

Customizable Packaging Solutions

We understand that packaging requirements vary. The FPS Series is not a one-size-fits-all product. Our engineering team provides modified solutions tailored to your specific coil data (ID, OD, width, weight), chosen packing material, required speed, and material handling logistics. We develop optimized solutions for:

  • Steel Coils & Strips
  • Aluminum Coils
  • Copper Coils
  • Slit Coils

Specifications & Quotation Requirements

To provide a precise system recommendation and quotation, please provide the following operational parameters:

  • • Coil Dimensions: ID, OD, Width, Weight
  • • Packing Material: Specify film/paper type
  • • Packing Speed: Required cycles per hour
  • • Material Handling: Loading/Unloading method

Core Benefits for Your Operation

Cost Reduction

Automate your packaging line to minimize labor dependency and optimize material usage, delivering a rapid ROI.

Enhanced Protection

The through-eye wrapping technique ensures a tight, protective seal that prevents corrosion and damage.

Operational Flexibility

Systems are configurable to integrate seamlessly with your existing production and handling processes.

Reliable Performance

Built for continuous industrial use, ensuring consistent packaging quality and uptime for your facility.

Automated Strapping Process

The FCL Series streamlines coil packaging with a fully automated cycle. Once the coil is in position, the machine dispenses polypropylene strapping, applies precise and adjustable tension, and completes the process with a secure heat weld. This automated sequence ensures uniform strap application, reduces labor costs, and minimizes the risk of operator injury.

  • Programmable Logic Control: Enables fully automatic strapping cycles for seamless integration into production lines.

Industrial Applications

The FCL Series is ideal for metal service centers, rolling mills, and manufacturers requiring secure, automated packaging for finished coils. By automating the strapping process, businesses can achieve higher throughput, consistent package quality, and improved workplace safety, ensuring products arrive at their destination in perfect condition.

fullContentHtml:
FPT-300 Industrial Tyre Packing Machine

Engineered for B2B manufacturing and logistics, the FPT-300 Tyre Packing Machine automates the bundling process to enhance throughput, ensure load stability, and reduce material costs in high-volume operations.

Machine Overview & Design

The FPT-300 is built around a robust, heavy-duty steel frame designed for continuous operation in industrial environments. Its core mechanism is a motorized rotating ring that spirals packaging material around the tyre stack. The system utilizes an opening rotary ring design for efficient eye-to-eye cross-wrapping, ensuring complete surface coverage for superior load integrity and a professional, shipment-ready appearance that meets stringent customer and carrier standards.

Key Features for Operational Excellence

  • Multi-Material Compatibility: Achieve high packing efficiency with a variety of stretch films and wrapping materials to match specific durability and cost requirements.
  • Automated Position Reset: The machine automatically resets to the home position after each cycle, streamlining operations and preparing for the next tyre stack with zero delay.
  • Dual Operational Modes: Switch between fully automatic sequencing and manual control for flexibility during maintenance, testing, or handling non-standard loads.
  • Precision Speed Control: An integrated inverter allows fine-tuned adjustment of the rotary ring and feed roller speeds, optimizing cycle times for different tyre profiles.
  • Configurable Film Overlap: Adjust the overlap percentage of the packing tape to meet exact containment force and material usage specifications, reducing waste.
  • Automatic Cut & Seal: At the end of the wrap cycle, the film is automatically cut and sealed, ensuring a secure finish without operator intervention.
  • Comprehensive Safety System: Features full guardrails enclosing all moving parts, combined with soft-start and soft-stop ring control to ensure a safe working environment.
  • Height-Adjustable Ring: The wrapping ring's height is easily adjustable to accommodate a wide spectrum of tyre sizes, from passenger car to large commercial/OTR tyres.
  • Adjustable Packaging Tension: Precisely control the applied tension during wrapping to achieve optimal load stability while preventing film breakage.

FPW-300 Industrial Wire Coil Wrapping Machine

The FPW-300 is an advanced, automated packaging solution engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers. It utilizes a precision ring-style wrapping mechanism to encapsulate steel wire coils, providing superior protection and enhancing handling efficiency for industrial supply chains.

Core Advantages for Your Operation

This machine transforms coil packaging from a manual, variable process into a consistent, automated operation. By creating a tight, protective barrier against dust, moisture, and air, it preserves product integrity from production through to the end-user, reducing claims and waste.

Automated & Programmable Workflow

All packaging parameters are centrally managed through an intuitive control system. Operators input specific coil data—including dimensions, weight, and required film layers—enabling the FPW-300 to execute a perfectly tailored wrap cycle every time, ensuring consistency and traceability.

Standardized Packaging Process:

  1. Loading: The wire coil is rolled onto the machine's wrapping station.
  2. Material Initiation: The packing film is securely affixed to the start of the coil.
  3. Automated Wrapping: The cycle is initiated via the control panel, with the rotating ring applying the film precisely according to pre-set parameters.
  4. Completion & Ejection: The film is cut and sealed, and the uniformly wrapped coil is ready for labeling and shipment.

Technical Specifications & Integration

The FPW-300 is designed for seamless integration. Its flexible design allows for customization to fit specific spatial and logistical constraints within your facility, supporting a more streamlined material flow from production to dispatch.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Wire Coil Packing System for Industrial Manufacturing

FHOPE delivers high-performance, automated wire coil packing systems engineered to optimize downstream packaging operations in metal processing and wire production facilities. We integrate your operational requirements with our industrial packaging expertise to provide custom-built machinery that addresses your specific throughput, precision, and integration needs.

Streamlined, Automated Packaging Process

Our system transforms manual coil handling into a precise, automated workflow. Key coil data is inputted once via the user-friendly control panel, enabling the machine to execute the complete wrapping cycle autonomously. This automation significantly boosts your line's capacity, reduces labor costs, and ensures consistent packaging quality.

Configurable Coil Data Parameters:

  • Outer Diameter (OD): For determining wrap path and film usage.
  • Inner Diameter (ID): For precise mandrel or arm positioning.
  • Coil Width: Sets the vertical travel range for even coverage.
  • Coil Weight: Informs tension control for optimal load stability.
  • Wrapping Speed: Adjustable to balance cycle time with packaging security.
  • Wrapping Layers: Configurable for desired protection level (e.g., weather resistance, handling).
  • Customer ID: Enables batch tracking and process customization for different orders.

Advanced Industrial Control & Monitoring

The core of the system is a robust Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) paired with a Human-Machine Interface (HMI) touch screen. This industrial-grade control suite allows operators to:

  • Easily enter and modify all coil specification data.
  • View real-time machine status and operational figures.
  • Monitor cycle counts and production data.
  • Access diagnostic information for simplified maintenance.

The intuitive interface ensures quick operator training and reliable, error-reduced control over the packaging process.

Adaptable Packaging Methodology

The FHOPE wire coil packing system provides a fully adjustable method for securing coils. The combination of customizable mechanical settings and programmable logic allows the machine to be precisely tuned for different coil dimensions, weights, and packaging material requirements, ensuring optimal load containment and protection for shipping and storage.

fullContentHtml:
FPC Series Industrial Copper Coil Stretch Wrapping Machine

The FPC Series is a high-performance, automated stretch wrapping system engineered for the secure and efficient packaging of copper wire coils, copper coils, cable coils, and steel coils. This machine is designed to integrate seamlessly into industrial production lines, delivering superior load stability, significant labor savings, and enhanced operational throughput to strengthen your competitive edge in the market.

Core Technology & Integration

Driven by an advanced PLC and intuitive HMI control system, the FPC Series ensures reliable, repeatable performance. Its capability for full production line association allows for a continuous, automated workflow from manufacturing to final packaging, eliminating bottlenecks and maximizing facility output.

Engineered for Operational Excellence

Beyond basic wrapping, this system incorporates innovative methods for conveying, lifting, and tilting coils, significantly reducing handling time and the potential for product damage. The intelligent design focuses on drastically lowering the defective packaging rate, ensuring your coils are market-ready and protected for storage or shipment.

Key Specifications

  • Model Series: FPC Series
  • Primary Application: Copper wire coils, copper coils, cable coils, steel coils
  • Control System: Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) with Human-Machine Interface (HMI)
  • Operation Modes: Automatic, Manual
  • Speed Control: Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) Adjustable
  • Safety Features: Safety Guardrails, Soft-Start/Stop Functions
  • Wrapping Method: Central Perforation (Mandrel) Wrapping
  • Special Functions: Automatic Film Cutting, Customizable Overlap, Film Breaker Detection System

Business Benefits

Investing in the FPC Series Copper Coil Wrapping Machine translates to direct business advantages:

  • Reduce Labor Dependency: Automate the packaging process to reallocate skilled labor to higher-value tasks.
  • Enhance Packaging Consistency: Achieve a professional, uniform appearance that improves brand perception and customer confidence.
  • Minimize Material Waste: Precise control over film overlap and breakage detection ensures optimal material usage.
  • Improve Workplace Safety: Built-in safety protocols protect personnel and equipment during operation.
  • Increase Line Throughput: Reliable automation and quick changeover features keep your production flow moving efficiently.

Fhope Corporation is committed to providing intelligent packaging solutions that address the complex needs of modern industrial manufacturing. The FPC Series embodies this commitment, offering a robust, reliable, and innovative system designed to optimize your coil packaging operation.

fullContentHtml:
FPC-300 Industrial Copper Coil Wrapping Machine

Engineered for precision and protection in industrial supply chains, the FPC-300 Copper Coil Wrapper delivers reliable, automated packaging for copper coils ranging from 50mm to 300mm in width. This system is critical for manufacturers, processors, and distributors seeking to eliminate oxidation (rust), contamination, and physical damage during storage and logistics.

Core Operational Advantage

The FPC-300 creates a tightly controlled overlap, eliminating air pockets, dust, and moisture—the primary causes of corrosion and quality degradation in metal coils. This results in a superior protective barrier, preserving the integrity and value of your copper inventory from production to end-user.

Technical Features & Benefits

Automation & Control

  • PLC & Optional HMI: Enables programmable wrapping cycles, recipe storage, and user-friendly operation for consistent, repeatable results.
  • Diagnostic Alarms & Indicators: Minimizes machine downtime with immediate visual and system-generated fault identification on the control panel.
  • Precision Tension System: Proprietary control ensures optimal film stretch and security without risk of coil deformation.

Durability & Adaptability

  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Industrial horizontal frame design built for stability and longevity in high-throughput environments.
  • Quick-Change Adaptability: Automatically or manually adjust the wrapping ring height to suit different coil dimensions, maximizing operational flexibility.
  • Surface Protection: Critical contact points like friction wheels and rollers utilize polyurethane and耐磨 rubber to prevent marking or scratching sensitive copper surfaces.

Technical Specifications

Target MaterialCopper Coils
Coil Width Capacity50 mm – 300 mm
Core Control SystemProgrammable Logic Controller (PLC)
Operator InterfaceStandard Control Panel / Optional HMI Touch Screen
Wrapping Ring AdjustmentAutomatic or Manual for Coil OD Variance
Key Wear ComponentsPolyurethane,耐磨 Rubber, Monolithic Mould Structure
Primary Packaging OutcomeAirtight, Dust-Free, Protective Layer

B2B Application Summary

The FPC-300 is a strategic investment for businesses focused on supply chain integrity and product quality preservation. By automating the creation of a secure, contaminant-free barrier around copper coils, it directly addresses the risks of corrosion and damage, reducing waste, protecting revenue, and enhancing client confidence in your delivered materials.

fullContentHtml:
FPCA100 Horizontal Cable Coil Packing Machine

Streamline your production output with the FPCA100, an industrial-grade horizontal packing machine engineered for the secure, high-speed film wrapping of cable and wire coils. This automated solution is designed to meet the rigorous demands of B2B manufacturing, delivering consistent packaging quality while significantly reducing operational costs.

Precision Packaging for Modern Production Lines

The FPCA100 series specializes in packing cable, copper, and steel coils in a stable eye-to-sky position. Its core innovation lies in the supportive roller mechanism that provides full 360-degree rotation, eliminating position shift and ensuring uniform film application for maximum load stability and protection.

Addressing Critical Industrial Challenges

In an era of rising labor costs and skilled worker shortages, the FPCA100 provides a strategic automation solution. By integrating this system, manufacturers can automate up to 80% of the manual labor involved in the coil packaging process, translating to direct cost savings, increased throughput, and enhanced workplace safety.

Engineered for Efficiency and Ease of Use

Featuring an intuitive control interface, the FPCA100 allows for quick operation with minimal training. Its programmable memory stores packaging parameters for various coil specifications—enabling rapid changeovers and maintaining high-speed operation for coils with a minimum inner diameter of 90mm. This flexibility makes it an ideal asset for facilities running multiple product lines or bespoke orders.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: FPCA100
  • Packaging Method: Horizontal Stretch Film Wrapping
  • Min. Coil Inner Diameter (ID): 90 mm
  • Coil Orientation: Eye to Sky
  • Rotation Technology: 360-Degree Supportive Roller System
  • Control System: Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) with HMI
  • Primary Applications: Cable Coils, Wire Bundles, Copper & Steel Coils
  • Target Industries: Wire & Cable Manufacturing, Electrical, Metalworking

Investment in Packaging Innovation

The FPCA100 is more than a packing machine; it is a comprehensive protective packaging system. It safeguards your product quality during storage and shipping, reduces material waste versus manual methods, and provides a scalable automation platform to support your business growth and operational resilience.

fullContentHtml:
FPC-200 Industrial Copper Coil Wrapping Machine

Engineered for precision and durability in high-volume industrial environments, the FPC-200 automates the packaging of copper coils to ensure consistent quality, enhance material protection, and optimize warehouse and logistics operations.

Core Features & Engineering Benefits

  • Vertical Design & Custom Integration: Space-efficient vertical footprint with options for custom elevated table designs to seamlessly fit into your existing production or packaging line layout.
  • Advanced Control System: Centralized operation via a robust Programmable Logic Controller (PLC), ensuring reliable and repeatable cycles. An optional Human-Machine Interface (HMI) provides intuitive control and monitoring.
  • Global Operation Ready: User interface supports both English and Chinese displays, facilitating operation across international teams and reducing training barriers.
  • At-a-Glance Operational Status: A system of red, green, and yellow indicator lamps provides immediate visual feedback on machine state, promoting floor-level awareness.
  • Proactive Diagnostics: Machine automatically halts and displays specific error codes on the control panel upon fault detection, enabling rapid troubleshooting and minimizing production delays.
  • Flexible Wrapping Protocols: Configurable to apply one or two wrapping layers per packaging requirements, complete with automatic material cutting for efficient cycle completion.
  • Precision Tension & Overlap Control: Advanced system allows fine-tuning of material tension and overlap (from 20% to 90%), guaranteeing a tight, secure, and consistent wrap that protects coils during transit and storage.
  • Adaptable to Coil Dimensions: Board structure adjusts automatically or manually to accommodate a wide range of coil outer diameters (OD), ensuring versatility across different product batches.
  • Enhanced Durability: Key components, including the forming ring, utilize anti-wear polyurethane materials within a full mold structure for superior longevity and reduced maintenance.
  • Product Surface Protection: All contact rollers are wrapped with wear-resisting rubber, safeguarding the sensitive surface of copper coils from scratches or damage during the wrapping process.

Technical Specifications

  • Object Weight Capacity: 5 - 500 kg
  • Package Width: Please contact for specific width specifications based on your material requirements.

The FPC-200 Copper Coil Wrapper is a robust solution designed to bring automation, consistency, and protection to your metal coil packaging line. Ideal for manufacturers, processors, and distribution centers handling copper, brass, or similar non-ferrous coils.

fullContentHtml:
FPCW Series Industrial Cable Coil Wrapping Machine

The FPCW 200, 300, and 400 models represent a high-performance solution for automating the packaging of cable coils and similar products. Engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, this series enhances packaging line efficiency, ensures consistent presentation, and significantly reduces labor and material costs through intelligent automation.

Core Technology & Automated Operation

At the heart of the FPCW series is a robust PLC-based control system managed via an intuitive HMI touchscreen. This allows for fully programmable, hands-off operation, ensuring repeatable quality and seamless integration into existing production workflows. The inclusion of both automatic and manual modes provides operational flexibility for maintenance and specialized runs.

Precision Engineering for Superior Results

Precision is critical in industrial packaging. The machine utilizes a Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) to finely adjust the speed of the wrapping ring and rollers, allowing perfect adaptation to different coil sizes and film types. The central positioning function automatically centers coils from small to large diameters (200mm to 400mm+), while a specially designed tension breaker guarantees optimal wrap tightness without damaging the product.

Built for Safety and Efficiency

Operator safety and machine longevity are paramount. The FPCW series features comprehensive safety guardrails, inverter-controlled soft start and stop to minimize mechanical stress, and an automatic alarm system with visual indicators for immediate fault diagnosis. The automated loading/unloading system and material cutter further streamline the process, maximizing throughput.

Adaptable to Your Production Needs

Understanding that no two facilities are identical, the FPCW series is designed with adaptability in mind. It is compatible with a range of packaging materials and can be customized in specification to fit unique spatial, electrical, or integration requirements within your packaging line.

Key Business Benefits

  • Reduce Operational Costs: Automate labor-intensive wrapping tasks, freeing personnel for higher-value activities.
  • Minimize Material Waste: Precise tension and speed control ensure efficient use of stretch film.
  • Enhance Output Consistency: Achieve uniform, professional-grade packaging on every coil, improving brand presentation.
  • Increase Line Throughput: High-speed, automated operation accelerates the packaging cycle from start to finish.
  • Future-Proof Investment: Customizable and robust design ensures the machine meets evolving production demands.

fullContentHtml:
FPCA 200: Automated Packaging for Cable Production Lines

The FPCA 200 Cable Coil Wrapping Machine is an industrial-grade solution designed to automate the final packaging stage in cable manufacturing. It seamlessly integrates at the end of your extruder or coiling line to apply a protective, sealed layer of stretch or adhesive-backed PVC film, enhancing packaging speed, consistency, and product protection.

Core System Overview

The machine is engineered around three robust subsystems for reliable, high-uptime operation:

  1. Rotating Ring & Drive Device: Precisely orbits the film dispenser around the coil for uniform wrap application.
  2. Supportive Roller & Drive Station: Secures and rotates the cable coil (positioned eye-to-sky) for smooth handling of irregular shapes.
  3. Integrated Electric Control System: Centralized PLC and HMI for full automation, process monitoring, and data management.

Operational Advantages for Manufacturers

This system replaces manual or semi-automatic wrapping and strapping, delivering direct benefits to production efficiency and cost control.

  • Enhanced Line Integration: Cooperates directly with coiling equipment to create a continuous, high-speed packaging cell.
  • Superior Package Integrity: Produces a tightly sealed wrap with regular film overlap, protecting coils from environmental contaminants and handling damage during storage and transit.
  • Elimination of Secondary Strapping: The secure, sealed film wrap often removes the need for additional strapping, saving material and labor costs.
  • Reduced Labor & Improved Ergonomics: The accessible roller station design simplifies loading/unloading, streamlining workflow and minimizing physical strain on operators.

Technical Specifications & Integration

Built for the demands of a 24/7 production environment, the FPCA 200 is a durable, low-maintenance asset designed to maximize your packaging throughput and consistency while ensuring a professional, protected final product.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Coil Packaging Line for Integrated Metal Processing

This fully automated coil packaging line is engineered for B2B metal service centers and processors. It provides a turnkey solution for packaging strip coils directly after cutting on slitting-and-shearing lines, enabling seamless integration within rolling or extrusion shops. The system automates the entire process from coil reorientation to final pallet stacking, maximizing throughput and operational safety.

Core System Components

Heavy-Duty Coil Turnstile

Designed for robust, high-capacity material handling in demanding industrial environments.

  • Load Capacity: Engineered for maximum loads up to 60 Tons.
  • Structural Design: Heavy-load, reinforced construction for durability.
  • Configuration: Available with 2 or 4 arms to match specific slitting line speed requirements.
  • Arm Length: Maximum reach of 2000mm for handling large coil diameters.

Automatic Downender

Facilitates precise and safe transfer of coils from the turnstile to the packaging line.

  • Function: Automatically separates and picks up coils from the turnstile.
  • Adjustable Lifting Nose: Hydraulically driven to accommodate varying coil widths.
  • Safety Feature: Integrated coil falling protection device.
  • Integration: Equipped with a roller conveyor working table for smooth downstream flow.

Eye-Through Coil Wrapping Machine

Ensures secure and consistent coil bundling with fully adjustable parameters.

  • Design: Eye-through type for efficient wrapping.
  • Line Integration: Features a conveyor working table for continuous production line connection.
  • Precision Control: Wrapping tape tension is fully adjustable for optimal pack integrity.
  • Variable Speed Drives: Ring speed and roller speed are independently adjustable via inverter controls.

Automated Stacking Machine

Completes the packaging process by efficiently transferring packed coils onto pallets for storage or shipment.

  • Function: Handles wrapped coils from the conveyor and stacks them onto pallets.
  • Benefit: Enables fully automated, hands-free palletizing, readying coils for logistics.

B2B Operational Benefits

  • Increased Throughput: Eliminates manual handling bottlenecks for faster line speeds.
  • Enhanced Safety: Reduces manual labor in heavy coil handling, minimizing workplace risks.
  • Improved Consistency: Automated wrapping and stacking ensure uniform, shipment-ready packaging.
  • Reduced Operational Costs: Lowers labor dependency and decreases potential for product damage.
  • Seamless Integration: Modular components are designed for straightforward integration into existing slitting and processing lines.

fullContentHtml:
FPS-800 Automatic Coil Wrapping Machine

Engineered for B2B manufacturing and processing facilities, the FPS-800 is a high-performance automatic coil wrapping system designed to streamline packaging operations, ensure consistent load stability, and improve your bottom line.

Precision Automation for Industrial Packaging

The FPS-800 integrates an industrial-grade Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) with an intuitive Touch-Screen Human-Machine Interface (HMI). This powerful combination allows operators to centrally input critical coil data—including OD, ID, width, and weight—alongside specific wrapping requirements for speed and layer count. Once parameters are set, the machine executes a flawless, repeatable wrapping cycle, eliminating variability and reducing operator dependency.

Drive Operational Efficiency & Profitability

In high-volume production environments, packaging speed and reliability are direct contributors to profitability. The FPS-800 is engineered to meet these critical KPIs. By automating the wrapping process, it delivers:

  • Superior Packing Performance: Consistent tension and overlap ensure secure loads for transport and storage.
  • Maximized Throughput: High-speed wrapping capabilities keep pace with your production line, reducing bottlenecks.
  • Enhanced Labor Efficiency: Free skilled personnel for value-added tasks by minimizing manual wrapping labor.
  • Reduced Material Waste: Precise control optimizes film usage, lowering consumable costs.

Simply input the coil specifications and select the automated program. The FPS-800 handles the rest, transforming your packing goals into a reliable, profit-driving reality.

Technical Specifications & Capabilities

This series of equipment is designed against key industrial indicators: packaging speed, performance consistency, and return on investment. The FPS-800 meets these benchmarks, providing a robust automation solution that delivers measurable output in both speed and volume for your coil packaging operations.

fullContentHtml:
FPW-400 Stationary Wire Coil Wrapping Machine

Engineered for B2B manufacturing and processing facilities, the FHOPE FPW-400 is a robust, floor-standing wire coil wrapping system designed to automate and standardize packaging operations for steel and copper wire coils. This machine eliminates manual labor bottlenecks, ensures consistent package quality, and protects your product investment from production to shipment.

Strategic Advantages for Your Operation

The FPW-400 transforms coil packaging from a costly, variable manual task into a efficient, repeatable station. Its stationary design integrates directly into your floor-level production flow, allowing operators to load and unload coils ergonomically. The programmable logic controller (PLC) guarantees every coil is wrapped with identical tension and overlap, maximizing material use and minimizing film waste.

Core Technology & Performance

At the heart of the FPW-400 is a precision rotating ring mechanism guided by turning rollers. This system smoothly winds stretch film or other wrapping materials around the coil's circumference, creating a tight, protective layer. The inclusion of a frequency converter allows for fine-tuned speed adjustment to match different coil densities and film types, ensuring optimal performance without slippage or tearing.

Integration & Customization

As an industry pioneer, FHOPE understands that no two production lines are identical. The FPW-400 platform offers significant customization in form and structure. We can adapt machine dimensions, integration points, and control interfaces to suit your unique plant layout, material handling equipment, and upstream/downstream processes, ensuring a cohesive and efficient workflow.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: FPW-400
  • Machine Type: Stationary, Floor-Standing
  • Primary Application: Packaging of Steel Wire Coils & Copper Wire Coils
  • Coil Width Range: 20 mm to 3000 mm
  • Control System: Industrial PLC with Human-Machine Interface (HMI)
  • Drive System: Precision Frequency Converter
  • Operation: Fully Automatic Cycle
  • Wrapping Mechanism: Rotating Ring with Turning Rollers
  • Frame Construction: Heavy-Duty Industrial Steel

Business Value Proposition

Investing in the FPW-400 delivers direct ROI through significant labor cost savings, reduced film waste, and the elimination of product damage due to inconsistent manual wrapping. It enhances workplace safety by reducing strenuous manual handling and increases overall line throughput with its rapid, automatic cycle. This machine is not just a packaging tool; it's a strategic upgrade for modern, cost-conscious wire production and processing facilities.

fullContentHtml:
FPS-500 Heavy-Duty Automated Coil Packing Machine

Engineered for precision and durability in demanding metal processing environments, the FPS-500 coil packing machine automates the final packaging stage for steel, wire, and pipe coils. This system delivers a consistently sealed, protected bundle that safeguards product integrity through the supply chain, directly addressing key B2B concerns for material loss, corrosion, and handling efficiency.

Core Value Proposition for Metal Processors

Transform your coil finishing line with automated packaging that ensures:

  • Superior Corrosion Protection: Creates a waterproof, dustproof, and rustproof barrier, extending shelf life and reducing claims.
  • Enhanced Logistics Safety: Produces a stable, unitized load that minimizes shifting and damage during transport.
  • Operational Efficiency: PLC-driven automation reduces labor requirements, increases throughput, and ensures repeatable quality.
  • Material Optimization: Adjustable speed, overlap, and tension controls minimize film waste and cost.

Technical Features & Specifications

Automation & Control

The FPS-500 is built around an industrial-grade PLC and intuitive HMI. Operators simply input the coil's outer diameter (OD), inner diameter (ID), and width. The system automatically calculates and sets all other wrapping parameters, ensuring optimal results and eliminating guesswork.

Safety & Integration

Designed for plant floor safety, it includes protective fencing, safety sensors, and an integrated trolley for secure crane loading/unloading. The adjustable mainframe height allows for seamless integration into existing production and logistics lines.

Packaging Performance

Delivers a tight, tidy, and professional package. Key performance features include adjustable ring speed for cycle time control, precise overlap adjustment for seal integrity, and automatic film cutting for a clean finish.

Flexibility & Options

Accommodates various packaging materials, including standard and VCI (Vapor Corrosion Inhibitor) films. Optional polyurethane carrier rollers protect the surface finish of high-value coils from scratches during the wrapping process.

Ideal For

Steel service centers, pipe manufacturers, wire drawing facilities, and any metal processor requiring reliable, automated, and protective packaging for coiled products to improve operational ROI and customer satisfaction.

Automatic Cable Coiling and Wrapping Machine

An advanced, end-of-line cable packaging automation solution designed to replace manual labor, optimize production flow, and significantly reduce operational costs for cable manufacturers.

Production Line Transformation

This system consolidates labor-intensive tasks by enabling the management of 5-8 cable production lines through a single automated station. It directly addresses the rising cost and scarcity of manual labor in industrial packaging operations.

Positioned as the final critical station in the cable production process—after extrusion and testing and before palletizing—this machine ensures consistent, high-speed packaging ready for shipment or storage.

The Shift to Full Automation

While semi-automatic coiling machines served as a cost-effective entry point, they incur significant long-term labor expenses and limit throughput scalability. Modern manufacturing demands justify the ROI in full automation.

Upgrading to this automatic coiling and wrapping system eliminates continuous labor costs, minimizes human error, and provides a scalable packaging solution that grows with your production volume.

Core Features & Engineering

  • Advanced Control System: Features a programmable logic controller (PLC) and human-machine interface (HMI) for precise, repeatable automation cycles and easy changeovers.
  • Robust Construction: Utilizes components from trusted international brands to ensure machine longevity, reliability, and minimal downtime in high-volume environments.
  • Operator-Centric Design: All operational parameters are set via an intuitive English-language control program, facilitating quick training and global deployment.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Automatic Cable Coiling and Winding System

Engineered for manufacturing and packaging facilities, our automatic cable coiling machine streamlines end-of-line processing by transforming loose cable into uniform, ready-to-ship coils. It is a critical component for achieving a scalable, efficient, and consistent packaging workflow.

Core System Advantages

This system eliminates manual coiling bottlenecks, ensuring precise coil consistency and integrating directly with your cable extrusion or production line. It is designed to enhance operational throughput, reduce labor costs, and improve final product presentation for B2B clients and distributors.

Precision Automation for Modern Production Lines

The system performs a complete cycle: it automatically measures cable length, forms it into a precise coil, verifies dimensions, and cuts it—all without operator intervention. This closed-loop process guarantees accuracy and repeatability for every coil produced.

  • Seamless Line Integration: Available in both online and offline configurations. The online model connects directly to your cable extrusion line for continuous, inline packaging, while the offline version provides flexible processing for staged production.
  • Complete Packaging Line Solution: The coiling machine serves as the foundational module. It can be seamlessly coupled with automatic wrapping, strapping, or labeling machines to create a fully automated, end-to-end packaging cell, minimizing manual handling from production to pallet.

Engineered for Reliability and Control

Operation is managed through an intuitive touchscreen interface programmed in English. Here, supervisors can set all coil parameters, monitor real-time production data, and access system diagnostics.

  • Smart Diagnostics & Safety: An integrated sensor and servo system continuously monitors cable position and machine status. In the event of a fault or error, the system triggers an audible/visual alarm and displays clear diagnostic information on the touchscreen for rapid resolution, minimizing downtime.
  • Consistent Output Quality: A magnetically-controlled tensioner actively regulates winding tension throughout the coiling process. This ensures every coil is wound tightly and uniformly, preventing tangles and maintaining a professional, shipment-ready appearance.

Technical Specifications

Standard Coil Dimensions

  • Inner Diameter (ID): 140 - 200 mm
  • Outer Diameter (OD): 240 - 460 mm
  • Coil Height: 60 - 150 mm

Note: Custom dimensions may be available for high-volume applications.

System Capabilities

  • Operation Modes: Online (Inline) / Offline
  • Primary Functions: Automatic Feeding, Length Calculation, Coiling, Cutting
  • Tension Management: Magnetic Power Tensioner
  • Downstream Compatibility: Designed for integration with wrapping, strapping & labeling systems.

This industrial coiling system is the optimal solution for cable manufacturers, wire processors, and contract packagers seeking to automate their finishing operations, enhance product quality, and achieve significant gains in packaging line productivity.

Engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution facilities, the FPH-400W automates the final packaging stage for coiled hoses and plastic pipes. This system replaces manual, inconsistent wrapping with a reliable, high-speed process that delivers professionally packaged coils, reduces material waste, and lowers overall operational costs.

Core Operational Advantages

The FPH-400W is designed to handle coil widths from 100mm to 400mm, making it a versatile solution for various product lines. Its primary function is to apply a secure, uniform wrap of stretch or shrink film (among other materials) around a vertically oriented coil, creating a bundle that is protected for storage and shipment.

  • Streamlined Production Flow: Integrates directly into the end of your coiling or production line, automating the last step and minimizing handling.
  • Cost & Labor Savings: Dramatically reduces the labor required for packaging, allowing personnel to be allocated to higher-value tasks while minimizing film usage through precise overlap control.
  • Consistent, Professional Presentation: Eliminates human variability, ensuring every coil leaving your facility has a tight, clean, and brand-enhancing wrap that reduces damage claims.

Built for industrial environments, the FPH-400W combines robust construction with user-adjustable controls to fit specific operational needs.

Technical Capabilities & Customization

The machine provides granular control over the packaging process. Operators can manually position each material coil and adjust supportive roller height for optimal wrapping and conveyance. Packaging speed and tape overlap are precisely managed through inverter-based drives, while adjustable tension controls ensure secure bundling across various bearing sizes and packaging materials.

Engineered for Safety & Adaptability

The system's adaptability is demonstrated through its compatibility with multiple packaging materials and adjustable friction settings between drive wheels and bearing rings, guaranteeing secure handling without surface damage.

Commitment to Industrial Innovation

Fhopepack is dedicated to advancing packaging technology and craftsmanship. We focus on developing machinery that elevates quality standards and increases production capacity for bearing manufacturers worldwide, providing reliable, custom-configured automation solutions.

FPB-400 Fully Automatic Bearing Packing Machine

Engineered for industrial bearing manufacturers and distributors, the FPB-400 automates the packaging of large bearings and axletrees. This system is designed to integrate seamlessly into high-volume production lines, delivering significant operational advantages for B2B supply chains.

Strategic Advantages for Your Operation

The FPB-400 transforms packaging from a cost center into a value-adding process. By automating wrapping, it directly addresses key industrial challenges: escalating labor costs, material waste, and inconsistent package quality that can impact downstream logistics and customer satisfaction.

Core System Features

  • End-to-End Automation: Features automatic infeed and outfeed conveyors, minimizing manual handling and integrating smoothly with upstream and downstream processes.
  • Programmable Flexibility: Store and recall up to 6 packaging programs via the PLC keypad, enabling quick changeovers for different bearing specifications or customer requirements.
  • Precision Engineering: Automatic centralized positioning ensures each bearing is wrapped with uniform tension and alignment, guaranteeing a secure, professional-grade package every time.
  • Material Agnostic Design: Configure the machine to use film, paper, or woven fabric, allowing you to select packaging based on cost, durability, or specific client mandates.
  • Optimized Line Speed: Adjust working speed through industrial-grade converters to match your production tempo, maximizing overall equipment effectiveness (OEE).

Operational Parameters & Integration

The machine allows for straightforward setting of critical bearing dimensions—Outer Diameter (OD), Inner Diameter (ID), and width—alongside fine-tuned correction parameters. This ensures the packaging process is precisely tailored to your product range, reducing material usage and eliminating loose wraps that can lead to in-transit damage.

Business Impact Summary

  • Increased Throughput: High-efficiency operation boosts packing capacity, alleviating production bottlenecks.
  • Lower Operational Cost: Significant reduction in direct labor costs and controlled, minimal use of packaging materials improve your bottom line.
  • Enhanced Quality & Consistency: High machine stability eliminates human error, producing reliably tight and protective packages that uphold your brand's reputation for quality.
  • Supply Chain Ready: Produces stable, uniform packages ideal for secure palletizing, storage, and shipment within demanding industrial logistics networks.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Horizontal Stretch Wrapper for Furniture Manufacturing & Distribution

Furniture products present unique packaging challenges due to varied dimensions, shapes, and material sensitivity. Standard packaging solutions often fail to provide the necessary stability and protection for high-value B2B shipments. Our engineered horizontal stretch wrapping machines deliver customized, automated palletizing solutions designed specifically for the furniture industry's complex requirements.

Strategic Packaging Solutions for Furniture

To address the diverse forms of furniture—from bulky sofas to flat panels—we offer three primary industrial packaging systems:

  • A. Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine: For secure unitization of long, flat, or complex-shaped items.
  • B. Shrink Wrapping Machine: For creating a tight, protective film seal around individual items.
  • C. Vertical Stretch Wrapping Machine: For standard pallet loads and boxed furniture.

Horizontal Stretch Wrapper: Engineered for Furniture

This specialized horizontal stretch wrapper is the optimal solution for securing non-palletized furniture items. It ensures products are tightly wrapped, stabilized, and protected from dust, moisture, and handling damage during transit and storage.

Core Functions & Benefits

  • Horizontal Orientation Wrapping: Perfect for sofas, cabinets, tabletops, doors, flooring boards, and window frames.
  • Enhanced Shipment Integrity: Creates a tidy, sealed unit that prevents shifting and reduces load damage.
  • Full Automation Ready: Seamlessly connects to existing packing lines for inline, automated wrapping—eliminating manual labor and bottlenecks.

Automated Operational Workflow

  1. Product Placement: Items are loaded onto the integrated in-feeding conveyor.
  2. Automatic Positioning: Advanced sensors detect the product and automatically transfer it to the precise wrap zone.
  3. Secure Wrapping Cycle: A decompression-controlled press-down system stabilizes the item without excessive force, followed by a programmable wrapping sequence.
  4. Discharge: The wrapped, secure unit is conveyed to the next stage for labeling or loading.

B2B Value Proposition

This machine is not just a wrapper; it's a strategic investment in supply chain efficiency. It reduces material costs versus custom boxing, minimizes labor, decreases shipping damage rates, and presents a professional, secure load to your B2B customers—enhancing your brand's reputation for reliability.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Hose Coil Wrapping Machine Line for Industrial Packaging

Transform your hose packaging process with our high-performance, fully automatic wrapping line. Engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, this system maximizes throughput and consistency while minimizing operational costs through single-operator control and seamless conveyor integration.

Engineered for Unmatched Efficiency & Reliability

This automated line is designed for continuous operation in demanding industrial environments. By integrating a PLC-controlled wrapping station with a complete conveyor system, it automates the entire flow—from loading raw coils to dispatching neatly packaged and stacked products. This end-to-end automation is key to achieving superior ROI through significant labor savings and increased daily output.

Core System Features & Specifications

Precision Control & Automation

  • PLC Intelligence: Guarantees precise, repeatable wrapping cycles for consistent package quality.
  • Inverter-Driven Adjustments: Fine-tune ring speed, roller speed, and tape overlap rate for different coil dimensions and materials.
  • Automatic Fault Monitoring: Integrated alarms instantly alert the operator to any issues, minimizing downtime.

Robust Integration & Performance

  • Seamless Conveyor Line: Automates loading, presentation to the wrapper, and final stacking of packed coils.
  • Heavy-Duty Componentry: Built with renowned brand components for long-term reliability and reduced maintenance.
  • Flexible Material Handling: Automatically cuts and applies various materials (Paper, HDPE, Woven) to suit your product needs.

B2B Operational Benefits

  • Reduce Labor Costs: One operator manages the entire packaging line.
  • Increase Line Speed: Automated handling and wrapping significantly boost packages per hour.
  • Ensure Package Consistency: Eliminate human error for uniform, professional-grade coil protection.
  • Minimize Downtime: Durable construction and proactive alarm systems ensure continuous operation.
  • Adapt to Product Lines: Easily adjustable settings accommodate a wide range of hose coil sizes and packaging specifications.

FPCA-100 Horizontal Hose Coil Packing Machine

Engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, the FPCA-100 automates the packaging of hose, cable, and tubing coils. This robust machine delivers consistent, high-speed 360-degree horizontal wrapping, significantly reducing manual labor and material waste while ensuring shipment-ready product protection.

Core Technology & Automation

At the heart of the FPCA-100 is an advanced control system designed for reliability and ease of use. The optional PLC and HMI touchscreen interface enables automated operation, including material calculation functions to optimize film usage. Operators can seamlessly switch between manual and automatic modes, with critical parameters like ring speed, roller feed, and film overlap fully adjustable to match specific coil dimensions and packaging specs.

Engineered for Production Efficiency

The machine's horizontal design and intelligent engineering prioritize throughput. The ergonomic workstation allows for quick loading/unloading cycles. Independently controlled supportive rollers are easily adjusted to stabilize coils of varying weights and diameters, preventing shake during the high-speed wrap cycle. This results in a tight, professional-grade package every time.

Robust Construction & Safety

Built for continuous operation in industrial environments, the FPCA-100 incorporates critical safety and durability features. Motor overcurrent protection and soft start/stop functionality safeguard the drive system and extend component life. An intuitive foot switch provides hands-free control during setup, while the automatic timer function allows for unattended operation in batch processing scenarios.

Ideal For

  • Hydraulic & Pneumatic Hose Manufacturers
  • Industrial Cable & Wire Coiling Facilities
  • Irrigation & Tubing Distribution Centers
  • Logistics & Warehousing Operations preparing coils for shipment
  • Any B2B operation requiring consistent, high-volume coil packaging

The FPCA-100 Horizontal Hose Coil Packing Machine is a strategic investment for businesses aiming to standardize packaging, improve line efficiency, and reduce overall operational costs.

Streamline Your Aluminum Extrusion Output with Automated Packaging

In high-volume aluminum profile manufacturing, manual packaging creates a critical bottleneck, risking product damage, inconsistent presentation, and inflated labor costs. Our engineered packaging systems eliminate this bottleneck by providing a seamless, end-of-line automation solution.

Maximize Throughput & Protect Product Integrity

Our systems are designed to integrate directly with your extrusion saws and handling equipment. Profiles are automatically conveyed, measured, grouped, and packaged into secure bundles or palletized units, ensuring a consistent and professional finish that withstands logistics challenges.

Tailored for Industrial Demands

We don't offer one-size-fits-all machines. Each system is configured based on your specific profile dimensions, required packaging materials (film, strapping, etc.), target line speed, and integration needs with upstream and downstream equipment.

Drive Down Total Cost of Operation

Beyond the initial investment, our solutions deliver measurable ROI by significantly reducing direct labor, minimizing material waste through precise application, and virtually eliminating costly damage claims from customers. The robust construction and smart diagnostics ensure maximum uptime and predictable maintenance.

Ideal For:

fullContentHtml:
FPW2500 PC Wire Coil Packing Machine

The FPW2500 is an industrial-grade, automated packaging solution engineered for wire manufacturing facilities. It delivers high-speed, precision wrapping of medium to large pre-strand steel wire coils, enhancing production line efficiency and product protection.

Core Technology & Operational Advantages

This machine integrates a mobile wrapping station that moves on a dedicated track, simplifying the coil loading and unloading process. The entire wrapping sequence is managed by a precise computer control system, ensuring repeatable accuracy and minimal operator intervention.

Performance-Driven Design

At the heart of the FPW2500 is an indexing rotate ring paired with synchronized wrapping arms. This system maintains stable, programmable tension throughout the wrap, effectively securing the coil while actively preventing surface scratches and damage—a critical factor for maintaining wire quality.

Maximizing Production Throughput

With an exceptional wrapping speed of 18 seconds per cycle, the FPW2500 significantly increases packaging throughput. This rapid cycle time directly translates to higher output capacity and a substantial reduction in manual labor requirements and associated costs.

Key Configuration Features

  • Mobile Wrapping Station: Track-mounted for seamless coil handling, positioning, and transfer.
  • Flexible Control: Selectable manual or fully automatic working modes to suit different production needs.
  • Precision Wrapping Control: A converter allows fine-tuning of packing tape overlap by independently adjusting roller speed and ring rotation speed.
  • Comprehensive Safety: Built with protective guardrails and soft start/stop mechanisms for safe, reliable operation.
  • Industrial Integration: Designed for easy interfacing with overhead hoisting systems, ensuring safe and efficient coil management.

The FPW2500 PC Wire Coil Packing Machine represents an ideal capital investment for wire manufacturers seeking to automate their finishing line, improve coil integrity, and achieve a faster return on investment through elevated efficiency and lower operational costs.

FCL-H300 Industrial Automatic Pipe Coiling System

The FCL-H300 is a precision-engineered automatic coiling system designed for B2B manufacturing and packaging lines. It streamlines the post-extrusion process by automatically winding, cutting, and transferring coils of flexible polymer tubing, enabling seamless integration and enhanced throughput.

Core Operational Advantages

This system is engineered for continuous operation, directly connecting to your extruder for online coiling. It eliminates manual handling by automatically rewinding tubing from the reel, forming consistent coils, and then transferring the finished coil to the next station for binding, shrinking, or palletizing. This closed-loop automation is critical for reducing labor costs and increasing production line efficiency.

Advanced Control & Integration

Operation is managed through a centralized PLC control program, allowing for precise setting of parameters and automated execution of the entire sequence—from calculating exact tube length to initiating the cut and coil transfer. This programmability ensures repeatable quality and allows the machine to adapt to specific production run requirements with minimal setup time.

Ideal Application Scope

The FCL-H300 is the optimal solution for manufacturers requiring high-volume, consistent coiling of:

  • Pneumatic & Hydraulic Tubing: PU and nylon tubes for industrial applications.
  • Polymer Conduits: PE and LLDPE pipes.
  • General-Purpose Flexible Tubing: A wide range of material-specific pipes.

Its robust design makes it a key component in automated lines that include winding machines, strapping machines, and shrink-wrap systems.

The system executes a seamless, automated sequence: it first fixes and calculates the required tube length, proceeds to precise winding and cutting, then automatically transfers the loop for secure strapping via welded banding. This end-to-end automation minimizes manual intervention, reduces labor costs, and ensures uniform, shipment-ready coils that meet stringent packaging specifications for industrial clients.

It is a strategic investment for businesses seeking to automate packaging lines, improve output consistency, reduce physical strain on workers, and optimize operational footprint for scalable growth.

FCL-H600 Automatic Pipe Coiling & Packaging Machine

Streamline your post-extrusion pipeline with the FCL-H600, a fully integrated automation solution designed for high-volume manufacturers of flexible LLDPE, PE, and PVC piping. This system eliminates manual handling by performing precise length calculation, cutting, coiling, binding, and shrink-wrapping in one continuous, PLC-controlled cycle.

Core Automation Functions

The FCL-H600 executes a complete packaging workflow: it measures pipe length, triggers automatic cutting, winds the pipe into a tight, consistent coil, applies polypropylene (PP) strapping for stability, and finishes with a protective layer of shrink film. All sequences are managed by a central PLC, allowing for precise customization and integration into your existing production line.

  • Max. Coiling Speed:100 RPM
  • Power Requirements:380V, 60Hz, 3-Phase

Key Industrial Benefits

  • Increased Line Efficiency: Automates the most labor-intensive segment of pipe production, significantly boosting throughput and reducing per-unit packaging costs.
  • Uncompromised Consistency: PLC programming ensures every coil meets exact dimensional and tightness specifications, enhancing product presentation and quality control.
  • Reduced Operational Costs: Minimizes reliance on manual labor for coiling and wrapping while optimizing material usage (film, strapping).
  • Enhanced Worker Safety: Automates repetitive strain tasks and contains the cutting and wrapping processes within a guarded machine framework.
  • Market-Ready Packaging: Delivers a professionally coiled, bound, and protected product that is immediately suitable for warehousing, shipment, and retail display.

The FCL-H600 Automatic Pipe Coiling Machine is engineered for industrial pipe producers seeking to automate their finish line, ensure packaging uniformity, and achieve a rapid return on investment through sustained productivity gains.
