FCL-V800: Fully Automated Pipe Coiling & Strapping System

The FCL-V800 is a precision-engineered, end-to-end automation solution designed for high-volume production lines. It transforms loose plastic pipe into neatly coiled, strapped, and finished packages with exceptional reliability and speed, directly impacting your bottom line through reduced labor costs and enhanced operational efficiency.

Engineered for Industrial Performance & Uptime

In a B2B environment, machine reliability is non-negotiable. The FCL-V800 is built to deliver continuous operation, featuring a robust servo-driven system and intelligent controls that maintain a 99% strapping success rate. This minimizes product waste, prevents downstream bottlenecks, and protects your overall equipment effectiveness (OEE).

Core Technological Advantages

  • Smart Control Hub: Centralized operation via a user-friendly PLC and HMI allows for quick parameter changes, recipe storage, and real-time performance tracking.
  • Predictive Diagnostics: Integrated IoT connectivity provides remote monitoring and detailed error code reporting, enabling your maintenance team to perform rapid troubleshooting and minimize unplanned downtime.
  • Precision Handling: Advanced servo mechanics ensure accurate pipe length measurement, clean cutting, and the formation of tight, uniform coils that meet strict shipping and handling standards.

Specifications at a Glance

  • Model: FCL-V800
  • Max Coiling Speed: 80 m/min
  • Strapping Success Rate: ≥99%
  • Control System: PLC with HMI
  • Drive System: Servo-Controlled
  • Monitoring: IoT with Error Diagnostics
  • Primary Function: Automatic Coiling & Strapping
  • Output: Uniform Pipe Coils

Driving Efficiency in Your Packaging Line

By automating the final, labor-intensive stage of pipe production, the FCL-V800 creates a seamless flow from extrusion to shipment. Its ability to produce standardized packs at speeds up to 80 meters per minute ensures your packaging throughput keeps pace with your manufacturing capacity, optimizing floor space and streamlining logistics.

Ideal for manufacturers of PE, PVC, PEX, and other flexible plastic pipes, the FCL-V800 is the strategic upgrade for businesses focused on scalability, consistency, and lean operations.

FPCA-200 Horizontal Hose Coil Wrapping Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale efficiency, the FPCA-200 standardizes hose coil packaging with secure, consistent stretch film seals, optimizing your B2B supply chain from production to shipment.

The machine utilizes an eye-through type stretch film wrapping process, creating a neat, tightly sealed package that protects hose coils from dust, moisture, and handling damage during storage and transit. This reliable seal enhances product presentation and integrity for end-business customers.

Built for Manufacturing Reliability

As a standard-type machine designed for bulk production, the FPCA-200 delivers stable, repeatable packaging quality. Its robust industrial construction guarantees a long operational life with simple, low-maintenance requirements, maximizing your return on investment and minimizing downtime.

Flexible Configuration & Complete Integration

We offer different semi-automatic versions of the hose coil wrap machine to accommodate variations in coil diameter, weight, and preferred packaging film. Each unit is supplied as a complete, ready-to-integrate system:

fullContentHtml:
FPCA-300 Horizontal Hose & Pipe Coil Wrapping Machine

An automated, horizontal wrapping solution engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers. The FPCA-300 streamlines the final packaging stage for plastic hose and pipe coils, enabling high-throughput, integrated production lines with minimal manual intervention.

Core System Advantages

  • Line Integration: Features a built-in conveyor at the wrapping station, designed for direct connection to upstream automatic coilers and downenders, creating a continuous coil packing system.
  • Operational Efficiency: Engineered for single-operator control, significantly reducing labor requirements and associated costs in the packaging process.

  • Customizable Design: The entire solution can be tailored to your specific coil dimensions (ID, OD, weight) and packaging material specifications.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Cable Coil Strapping Machine

Streamline your cable manufacturing output with our industrial-grade Automatic Cable Coil Strapping Machine. This robust system automates the final packaging stage, integrating directly with your existing payoff, accumulation, and coiling stations to create a seamless, high-throughput production line.

Core System Overview

Designed for offline coil and strap packaging, this machine performs a complete sequence: precise cable length counting, automatic cutting, tight coil formation, and secure strapping. It eliminates manual handling, ensuring consistent, professional-grade bundles ready for storage or shipment.

The system is engineered for direct integration, creating a continuous workflow from the payoff machine through the accumulator and coiling station to the final strapped product.

Precision Strapping Technology

At the heart of the machine is a high-reliability strapping head that applies Polypropylene (PP) strap with adjustable tension. The strap ends are permanently joined via a secure heat-weld process, creating a robust bond that withstands handling and transport.

Choose from 1, 2, or 4-strap configurations to meet the specific security and presentation requirements of your cable products.

Automated Material Handling

Once strapping is complete, the integrated automatic coil holder engages, safely picking up and transferring the finished cable coil to the next designated station or palletizing area. This feature minimizes downtime and maintains the flow of your packaging line.

Industrial Design & Compliance

Built on the field-proven FHOPE cable coiling technology, this strapping machine features a durable and reliable platform designed for 24/7 industrial environments.

The entire system conforms to CE guidelines and incorporates the latest technological and design criteria for safety, durability, and performance. It is a strategic investment for B2B manufacturers seeking to enhance packaging efficiency, reduce labor costs, and ensure product integrity.

Streamline your hose packaging process with the FPH-400, an automated coiling and wrapping solution engineered for B2B manufacturing and distribution efficiency. This system transforms loose hose into neatly coiled, professionally wrapped bundles, ensuring product integrity and reducing manual labor.

Core Operational Advantage

This machine performs perpendicular coil winding followed by a tight, overlapping spiral wrap. This method creates compact, stable, and lightweight hose packages ideal for storage, shipping, and retail display, while significantly lowering your energy and operational costs.

Key Features for Industrial Performance

  • Broad Material Compatibility: Works with a wide range of plastic and polymer packaging films without limitation.
  • Rapid Setup & Reset: Intuitive design allows for fast configuration and restoration to default settings, minimizing downtime.
  • Flexible Operation: Switch between manual control for specific tasks and full automatic mode for continuous, unattended winding and wrapping.
  • Precision Speed Control: An integrated frequency converter allows fine-tuned adjustment of coiling ring and roller speeds for optimal results with different hose types.
  • Customizable Overlap: Precisely adjust the film overlap from 10% to 90% to achieve the desired bundle tightness and material usage efficiency.
  • Automatic Cycle Completion: The system automatically finishes the wrap, cuts the film, and prepares for the next cycle, ensuring consistent packaging quality.
  • Enhanced Safety & Smooth Operation: Features a soft-start system and full safety guardrails to protect operators and ensure smooth, jerk-free initiation of the coiling process.
  • Guided Coiling Path: Ensures uniform coil formation for a professional end-product every time.

This system integrates directly into your packaging line to enhance throughput, ensure consistency, and significantly reduce operational costs.

Automated Data-Driven Operation

The FPS-300 eliminates manual setup errors by utilizing customer-provided coil specifications to automatically configure the wrapping process. Key data inputs enable precise, hands-free operation:

  • Coil Outside Diameter (OD)
  • Coil Inside Diameter (ID)
  • Coil Width
  • Coil Weight
  • Target Wrapping Speed
  • Required Number of Wrapping Layers
  • Customer Identification Number for batch tracking

Core-Through, Flexible Design

Featuring a versatile core-through design, the machine accommodates a wide range of coil types and sizes. Its flexible architecture allows for seamless adaptation to meet unique client specifications and integrate with existing packaging line configurations.

Intelligent Control for Precision Packaging

At the heart of the FPS-300 is a robust Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) and Human-Machine Interface (HMI). This industrial control system translates coil data into optimized handling instructions, automating the entire packaging sequence for reliable, repeatable results shift after shift.

Key Business Benefits

  • Reduce Labor Costs: Minimize manual data entry and physical handling.
  • Increase Line Efficiency: Automated operation ensures consistent cycle times.
  • Enhance Product Protection: Programmable, consistent wrap tension and layers.
  • Improve Traceability: Integrate customer ID data for lot tracking.
  • Maximize Uptime: Durable construction and reliable PLC controls.

The FPS-300 Coil Wrapping Machine is more than just packaging equipment; it's a strategic investment in your production line's automation, cost-saving, and quality control.

Our integrated packaging line manages the entire process from initial coil compaction to final strapping and wrapping, delivering a perfectly secured bundle tailored to your logistics needs. fullContentHtml:
Industrial PC Wire Coil Packaging Machine

A robust, PLC-controlled automated packaging solution engineered for the secure and efficient bundling of prestressed concrete (PC) wire coils in industrial manufacturing and distribution environments.

Core Features & Capabilities

  • Advanced PLC Control: Features a fully approved programmable logic controller for reliable, consistent, and programmable operation cycles.
  • Integrated Coil Handling: Equipped with a dedicated track system for streamlined loading and unloading of wire coils, optimizing workflow.
  • Flexible Operation: Switch seamlessly between manual control for setup and troubleshooting and fully automatic mode for continuous production.
  • Precision Wrapping: An integrated converter allows fine-tuning of the packaging band overlap by adjusting roller and ring speed, ensuring optimal wrap consistency and material use.
  • Comprehensive Safety Suite: Includes protective guardrails, soft start/stop functionality, and emergency stop operations to protect both personnel and equipment.
  • Engineered for Durability: Constructed with polyurethane-wrapped rollers and a special high-tension device for long-term reliability under demanding conditions.

Technical Specifications & Adjustability

This machine is designed for precision and adaptability in a B2B setting, offering multiple points of control to meet specific packaging requirements.

  • Tension Management: Packaging tension is fully adjustable to accommodate different wire grades and coil densities.
  • Friction Control: The friction between drive wheels and the ring is adjustable for optimal grip and wrap integrity.
  • Protection Systems: Dual electric and mechanical limitation systems prevent operational errors and machine damage.
  • Secure Material Fixing: A dedicated ring mechanism securely holds the material in place during the wrapping process.

B2B Application Benefits

This PC Wire Coil Packaging Machine is engineered to enhance production line efficiency, reduce labor costs, and ensure consistent, shipment-ready packaging for industrial suppliers and manufacturers. Its focus on safety, adjustability, and reliable PLC automation makes it a strategic asset for operations requiring high throughput and precise packaging standards.

Engineered for Industrial Performance

Our engineering focus is on creating packaging lines that are robust, versatile, and easy to integrate. This machinery is built for reliability in demanding industrial environments and is designed to connect seamlessly with a wide range of upstream feeding systems and peripheral equipment, ensuring a smooth flow from production to dispatch.

Industry-Leading Reliability

As a leading manufacturer in coil packaging equipment, our machines are proven in operation globally. This automated line is engineered to reduce labor costs, minimize product damage, increase packaging speed, and deliver a consistently professional packaged product for your B2B customers.

fullContentHtml:
FHOPE Automatic Tube Bundling and Strapping Line

Streamline your industrial pipe and tube packaging with the FHOPE fully-integrated automatic bundling and strapping system. Engineered for precision and efficiency in B2B manufacturing and distribution environments, this line automates the entire process from bundle formation to secured palletizing, significantly reducing manual labor and improving output consistency.

Core System Capabilities

The FHOPE line is a comprehensive packaging and strapping system designed to handle various tubing materials and profiles. It efficiently manages key processes including pipe collation (pipe joining), bundling, strapping, wrapping, and stacking, preparing bundles for safe shipment and storage.

Technical Features & Workflow

This system integrates a hexagonal tube forming machine, an automatic feeding device, and a precision strapping head. It produces stable, uniform bundles in hexagonal, square, or rectangular configurations, optimizing load security and space utilization. The automated counting device ensures batch accuracy, while the layer lifter facilitates ergonomic pallet building.

Post-strapping, the integrated conveyor system automatically accumulates and transfers finished bundles to a designated pickup point, ensuring seamless workflow integration for forklift or crane handling. This end-to-end automation minimizes handling damage and maximizes throughput for steel, stainless steel, and copper tubing operations.

Operational Benefits

  • Increased Throughput: Automates bundling and strapping, eliminating production bottlenecks.
  • Enhanced Bundle Integrity: Creates tight, uniform bundles for secure shipping and storage.
  • Reduced Labor Costs: Minimizes manual intervention in counting, lifting, and transporting.
  • Improved Safety: Automates heavy lifting and repetitive strapping tasks.
  • Configuration Flexibility: Adapts to multiple tube shapes, sizes, and materials with optional wrapping.

fullContentHtml:
R100 Semiautomatic Rotary Arm Pallet Wrapping Machine

Engineered for B2B logistics, manufacturing, and distribution centers, the R100 semiautomatic pallet wrapper delivers reliable, high-throughput unitization to secure loads for storage and transport.

Engineered for Industrial Efficiency

This wall-mounted, semiautomatic rotary arm wrapper is a stable, free-standing machine designed to optimize packaging stations. Controlled by a precise PLC system, it integrates the main motor, rotary arm, conveyor, and control panel into one efficient unit. The rotary arm operates around the stationary load, applying stretch film with consistent tension.

Workflow is streamlined: once a forklift places a pallet on the packaging station, the operator manually attaches the film to the load and presses the start button. The machine then automatically executes the pre-set wrapping cycle. Upon completion, the operator manually cuts the film, and the secured load is removed via forklift, minimizing labor time and maximizing throughput.

Technical Specifications & Performance Data

Operation Mode
Semiautomatic
Throughput Capacity
Up to 35 pallet loads per hour
Rotation Speed
10-14 RPM, variable with inverter drive
Max. Load Dimensions
1300mm (L) x 1300mm (W) x 2300mm (H)
Wrapping Method
Programmable bottom, middle, and top wrapping. Layer count adjustable from 0 to 99 winds for optimal containment.

Integrated Control System

The machine is powered by a synchronized system where the PLC acts as the central control unit, coordinating the main motor, the rotary arm movement, and the conveyor mechanism. This integration ensures precise, repeatable wrap cycles for consistent load stability and reduced film waste.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Steel Tube Strapping Machine

Engineered for industrial packaging lines, this automatic strapping machine delivers secure, high-tension bundling for steel tubes, pipes, and profiles. It combines fully automated operation with manual control capability for seamless integration and flexible handling.

Core Technology & Workflow

The machine utilizes a fixed-position, moving-bundle system. The bundle is transported through the machine station, where the automatic strapping head applies multiple straps. The PLC-controlled system automatically calculates and executes strap placement based on the pre-set bundle length, ensuring optimal stability.

The process is monitored via a computer interface, providing operators with real-time data on production counts and machine status, enabling proactive line management.

Key Features for Industrial Performance

  • High-Reliability Design: Built for continuous operation in demanding mill and warehouse environments.
  • Superior Bundle Security: Generates 7000-18000 Newtons of strap tension, creating bundles that withstand rigorous handling and shipping.
  • Consistent Notching Seals: Forms a permanent, high-strength seal directly from the steel strap, eliminating the cost and inventory of separate seals.
  • Optimized Hydraulic Power: A water-cooled system maintains stable operating temperatures at 80-100 bar pressure, ensuring consistent performance and component longevity during extended shifts.
  • Rapid Cycle Times: With strap feed speeds of 2-3 meters per second, the machine supports high-throughput packaging lines without becoming a bottleneck.

Technical Specifications

ParameterSpecification
Machine TypeAutomatic Strapping Machine
Strap Tension7000-18000N
Seal TypeNotching
Strap MaterialSteel Strap
Strap Width25, 32 mm
Strap Thickness0.8 / 1.0 mm
Strap Feed/Take-up Speed2-3 m/second
Tensioning Speed6 m/min
Hydraulic System Pressure100 bar
Operating Pressure80-90 bar
Hydraulic Oil TypeStandard Hydraulic Oil
Cooling SystemWater-Cooled Hydraulic System

Industrial Application

This machine is the optimal solution for steel service centers, pipe mills, and metal distributors requiring automated, high-strength bundling of steel tubes, structural pipes, hollow sections, and long profiles. It enhances line efficiency, reduces labor costs, and guarantees bundle consistency for safe transport and storage.

fullContentHtml:
R300 Semi-Automatic Rotary Arm Stretch Wrapper: Engineered for Heavy & Unstable Loads

The R300 semi-automatic rotary arm stretch wrapping machine is a robust industrial solution designed to secure challenging palletized loads where stability is critical. Unlike turntable models, its innovative design keeps the load stationary on the floor while the film carriage rotates around it, providing a fundamental advantage for operational safety and load integrity.

Core Technology & Operational Benefits

This machine is engineered for durability and performance in demanding B2B environments such as warehouses, distribution centers, and manufacturing facilities. Its permanent, floor-anchored installation minimizes vibration and enhances long-term structural integrity, making it a reliable fixture in your material handling process.

Ideal for Specific Industrial Applications

The R300 excels in securing heavy loads exceeding 5,000 pounds and is indispensable for stabilizing unstable, lightweight, or top-heavy pallets that risk collapsing on a spinning turntable. This makes it the preferred choice for industries dealing with furniture, packaged goods, empty containers, or bulky finished products.

Considerations for Integration

When planning for the R300, allocate sufficient floor space to accommodate the full rotation of the wrapping arm and its support structure. This clear area is essential for safe and efficient operation. While turntable wrappers offer a smaller footprint for uniform loads, the R300's rotary arm system provides unmatched stability for difficult-to-secure shipments, protecting your product in transit and reducing damage-related costs.

Invest in the R300 to enhance load security, improve workplace safety, and achieve consistent, professional-grade wrapping for your most demanding palletized goods.

  • Zero-Downtime Design: The dual-winder system allows automatic transfer from a full spool to an empty one without stopping the upstream production line, protecting throughput and ROI.
  • Fully Automated Cycle: From automatic feeding and length-based cutting to spiral ordering, strapping, and final coil discharge, the process requires minimal operator intervention.
  • User-Centric Control: An intuitive HMI screen allows for easy configuration of coil parameters, length settings, and system monitoring.

Business Benefits

The FCL400 is more than a machine; it's a productivity investment. By automating the final stage of your hose or pipe production, you achieve:

  • Higher Output: Uninterrupted operation and high-speed cycling increase total packaged product volume.
  • Consistent Quality: Servo-controlled precision ensures every coil meets the same high standard, reducing waste and customer complaints.

Ideal for manufacturers of hydraulic hose, pneumatic tubing, irrigation pipe, and other flexible conduits, the FCL400 delivers the automation reliability required in modern industrial operations.

fullContentHtml:
FCL-800 Automatic Hose Coiling Machine

Streamline your production line with the FCL-800, an industrial-grade automatic coiling machine designed for efficiency and consistency in hose packaging.

Precision Packaging for Industrial Hose

Transition from manual, inconsistent coiling to a fully automated process. The FCL-800 delivers uniform, tight coils essential for professional presentation, safe shipping, and efficient storage.

It accommodates a wide range of industrial hoses—from standard 4ft to extended 8ft+ lengths, featuring smooth or corrugated surfaces, and including models with specialized end fittings. This versatility eliminates the need for multiple, size-specific machines.

Dual-Packaging System Flexibility

The FCL-800 supports two primary industrial packaging methods to meet your supply chain requirements:

  • Stretch Film Wrapping: Creates a secure, stable, and dust-protected coil. The machine's automatic tension control ensures the film conforms tightly without loosening, even on hoses with irregular heads. Optimal for coils within a standardized size range.
  • Strapping: Provides a robust, pallet-ready solution for heavy-duty or large-diameter hose coils, ensuring integrity during transport and handling.

This flexibility allows you to choose the optimal packaging based on hose type, destination, and customer specifications.

Key Operational Advantages

  • Enhanced Productivity: Dramatically increases output compared to manual coiling, reducing bottlenecks.
  • Superior Coil Consistency: Eliminates human error, producing uniformly sized and tensioned coils every time.
  • Labor & Cost Savings: Automates a repetitive task, freeing skilled workers for higher-value operations and reducing packaging labor costs.
  • Improved Workplace Safety: Minimizes manual handling, reducing the risk of strain injuries associated with repetitive coiling motions.

FCL100 Automatic Air Hose Coiling Machine for Industrial Manufacturing

The FCL100 is an industrial-grade automatic coiling machine engineered to optimize air hose production lines for manufacturers and large-scale distributors.

Core Function & Industrial Application

This machine is specifically designed for the automated coiling of industrial air hoses, including nylon, polyurethane (PU), and polyethylene (PE) tubing. It serves two primary functions within a production ecosystem:

  1. Stand-Alone Rewinding: Efficiently rewinds hose from large master reels into finished, uniform coils ready for packaging.
  2. Inline Production Integration: Directly connects to an extrusion line, enabling continuous, automated coil manufacturing which significantly reduces handling and labor costs.

Once the coiling cycle is complete, the finished coil is automatically conveyed to the next stage in your workflow, such as strapping, shrink-wrapping, or palletizing stations. This end-to-end design is built for seamless integration into high-throughput B2B manufacturing and distribution environments, enhancing productivity and consistency.

Key Features for Manufacturing Efficiency

  • Automated Coiling Process: Ensures consistent, tight coils for nylon, PU, and PE hoses, critical for professional packaging and shipping.
  • Inline Production Capability: Eliminates bottlenecks by connecting directly to extruders, creating a continuous manufacturing stream.
  • Downstream Workflow Integration: Engineered hand-off to bundling, shrinking, and stacking systems minimizes manual intervention.
  • High-Volume Output: Built for durability and reliability in demanding, round-the-clock industrial operations.
  • Labor & Cost Reduction: Automates a traditionally manual process, lowering per-unit costs and improving throughput for suppliers and OEMs.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: FCL100
  • Primary Function: Automatic rewinding and coiling of industrial air hoses
  • Compatible Hose Types: Nylon Tubing, Polyurethane (PU) Hose, Polyethylene (PE) Air Tube
  • Operation Mode: Stand-alone unit or inline production module
  • Production Integration: Output optimized for direct transfer to secondary processes like strapping and palletizing

The FCL100 Automatic Coiler is a strategic investment for businesses looking to scale their air hose production, improve product consistency, and streamline their supply chain from manufacturing to dispatch.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Coil Transfer Car for Metallurgical Handling

Engineered for precision and durability, our Coil Transfer Car is a critical component for modern metallurgical coil processing lines. It facilitates efficient coil movement, handling, packaging, and stacking, seamlessly integrating with slitting lines, upenders, and downenders to streamline operations and reduce reliance on overhead cranes.

Core Features & Advantages

Robust Design & Operation

  • Heavy-Duty Drive System: Built with a robust ground transport drive unit for reliable, long-term performance under demanding conditions.
  • Dual-Action Mechanism: Unique structural design enables simultaneous lifting and rotating of coils for optimal positioning.
  • Precision Control: Features an inverter speed regulator for smooth acceleration, deceleration, and precise movement control.

Safety & Automation

  • Comprehensive Safety System: Incorporates emergency stop functions, position locking, and operations limited by both manual and automatic safety controls.
  • Automated Positioning: Equipped with automatic load and discharge location systems to enhance accuracy and throughput.
  • Flexible Control: Operate via a manual control cabinet or a remote control system for adaptable workflow integration.

Integration & Application

This Coil Transfer Car is designed as a modular solution for coil handling lines. It effectively connects and automates material flow between key processes such as:

  • Slitting Lines: Transfers coils to and from slitting machinery.
  • Coil Upenders/Downenders: Integrates with upending and downending equipment for orientation changes.
  • Packaging & Stacking Stations: Automates movement to final processing stages, replacing less efficient and more costly crane handling.

By centralizing coil transport, this system minimizes handling time, reduces potential for damage, and improves overall line safety and efficiency.

This machine transforms manual wrapping processes into a standardized, efficient operation. It ensures uniform film application, reducing film usage by up to 30% through its pre-stretch system. It complies with key electrical safety standards, featuring a lockable power disconnect and an instantly accessible emergency stop, ensuring a secure workspace for your logistics team.

Strategic B2B Applications

  • Manufacturing & Distribution: Secures finished goods for shipment to retailers or distributors.
  • Food & Beverage: Protects perishable and non-perishable goods on pallets.
  • Chemicals & Building Materials: Stabilizes heavy, dense, or hazardous loads.

fullContentHtml:
JL-A200 Automated Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine

Engineered for B2B logistics, warehousing, and distribution centers, the JL-A200 automated pallet stretch wrapper secures unitized loads for safe transport and storage. This system applies stretch film with precision, providing critical stabilization that prevents load shifting, tipping, and product damage while in transit.

Core Operational Benefits

By automating the pallet wrapping process, the JL-A200 delivers consistent, high-tension wraps that enhance load integrity. This reduces the risk of in-transit losses, minimizes product damage from leaks or impacts, and improves warehouse efficiency. The clear film layer also allows for easy visual identification and inventory management of packaged goods.

Programmable Control System

  • Controller: Industrial PLC system ensures reliable, repeatable operation.
  • Tension Control: Integrated pre-stretch controller optimizes film usage, lowering material costs.
  • Operator Interface: Separate buttons and display for intuitive setup and monitoring.
  • Wrap Settings: Customizable overwrap and overlap adjustments, plus a re-wrap function for process correction.
  • Wrap Counters: Independent counters for top, middle, and bottom wraps provide detailed process data.
  • Cycle Counters: Total cycle counter and resettable counter for maintenance and batch tracking.
  • Safety: Features a red mushroom head emergency stop, lockable electrical disconnect, and a European-approved electrical enclosure.

High-Efficiency Film Delivery

The machine is designed for use with standard LLDPE stretch film. Its advanced film delivery system ensures smooth, consistent application, reducing film breaks and downtime while maximizing the stretch ratio for superior cost-efficiency.

Industry Applications

The JL-A200 is a versatile solution for securing palletized loads across multiple sectors, including chemical manufacturing, electronics, building materials, household appliances, paper products, and food & beverage distribution. It is ideal for any operation requiring stable, unitized loads for safe shipping and storage.

fullContentHtml:
A100 Automatic Pallet Wrapping Machine

The A100 automatic pallet wrapping machine is an industrial-grade solution designed to secure unitized loads for safe transportation and storage. By automatically applying stretch film around palletized goods, it provides critical reinforcement to prevent tipping, product damage, and leakage. This process ensures loads remain stable and intact throughout the supply chain, while also facilitating easier identification and separation of shipments.

Core Operational Benefits for Industrial Users

Deploying the A100 pallet wrapper translates to direct operational advantages. It standardizes and secures pallet builds, reducing product loss from transit damage and minimizing the risk of workplace incidents caused by unstable loads. The consistent, machine-applied tension optimizes film usage compared to manual methods, leading to measurable reductions in packaging material costs.

Industries & Applications

This machine is engineered for durability and reliability in demanding environments. It is widely implemented across sectors including Chemical Manufacturing, Electronics, Building Materials, Appliance Production, Paper & Packaging, and Food & Beverage Distribution. Its robust design makes it suitable for any logistics, warehousing, or production facility requiring efficient and secure pallet stabilization.

Control & Programming System

  • PLC-Based Control System: Ensures reliable, repeatable operation and easy integration with warehouse management systems.
  • Pre-Stretch Controller: Maximizes film yield by elongating the film before application, controlling tension and reducing material consumption.
  • Dedicated User Interface: Features separate buttons and a clear display for intuitive setup and control, minimizing operator training time.

Advanced Wrapping Settings

  • Customizable Wrap Patterns: Utilize independent counters to program precise film layers at the top, middle, and bottom of the load for optimal stability.
  • Re-Wrap Function: Allows for easy re-securing of a load without fully resetting the cycle.
  • Adjustable Coverage & Overlap: Fine-tune film overlap to match the specific requirements of your product density and shape.

Production Monitoring & Safety

  • Cycle Counters: Track total machine cycles for maintenance and individual batch counts via a resettable counter for production accountability.
  • Emergency Stop: Equipped with a prominent red mushroom-head button for immediate machine shutdown, prioritizing operator safety.

The A100 Automatic Pallet Wrapping Machine is a strategic investment for businesses seeking to enhance supply chain integrity, reduce packaging costs, and improve warehouse safety through automated, consistent load stabilization.

fullContentHtml:
FCL-V1000: Automated Coiling & Strapping System for Industrial Pipe Packaging

Engineered for manufacturing and distribution facilities, the FCL-V1000 Automatic Coiling and Strapping System represents a complete, turnkey packaging solution. This robust machine seamlessly integrates precision coiling with automated strapping to streamline the final packaging stage for hoses and pipes, specifically engineered for handling corrugated profiles.

Note on Customization:

The standard FCL-V1000 serves as a performance benchmark. Final machine configuration and specifications are modified and optimized based on your specific pipe dimensions, material type, and required output, ensuring a perfect fit for your production line.

Core System Advantages for B2B Operations

Coiling Machine Module

  • PLC & HMI Control: Centralized control for automated operation, recipe management, and easy troubleshooting.
  • Dual Operational Modes: Switch between fully automatic for production and manual for setup or maintenance.
  • Programmable Tension Control: Ensures tight, consistent coiling without damaging the pipe material.
  • Automatic Length Calculation & Cutting: Delivers precise, pre-set pipe lengths for uniform coil sizes and accurate inventory.
  • Sensor-Guided Positioning: Automatically detects and aligns pipe for perfect coil start position every time.
  • Pneumatic Discharge: Efficiently ejects finished coils onto conveyors or collection carts, enabling continuous operation.

Integrated Strapping Machine Module

  • Seamless Integration: Works in unison with the coiler to apply secure straps to the finished coil, creating a shipment-ready package.
  • Enhanced Bundle Stability: Prevents uncoiling during handling, storage, and transport, reducing product damage and claims.
  • Labor & Cost Savings: Eliminates manual coiling and strapping stations, significantly reducing labor costs and packaging time per unit.
  • Professional Presentation: Produces consistently neat, tightly bound coils that improve brand perception and customer satisfaction.

Technical Specifications & Workflow

The FCL-V1000 automates the entire post-extrusion packaging process. The pipe is fed, measured, cut, and tightly wound onto the rotating wheel. Once the coil is formed, the system automatically positions and applies strapping. Finally, the secured coil is pneumatically ejected, completing a full cycle with minimal operator intervention. This closed-loop system is designed for reliability and high repeatability in demanding industrial environments.

FCL-V1200 Automatic Pipe Coiling & Strapping Machine

Engineered for industrial pipe manufacturing lines, the FCL-V1200 Automatic Coiling and Strapping Machine delivers end-to-end automation for packaging PERT and HDPE pipes. This integrated system transforms loose pipe into neatly coiled, strapped, and ready-for-shipment bundles, significantly enhancing production line efficiency and reducing manual labor.

Core Benefits for Your Production Line

  • Maximize Throughput: Continuous dual-wheel winding and automatic cycling eliminate stoppages between coils.
  • Ensure Consistent Quality: PLC-controlled tension and winding produce uniform, tight, and professional coils every time.
  • Reduce Operational Costs: Minimize reliance on manual labor for coiling, tying, and strapping tasks.
  • Enhance Flexibility: Easily programmable settings allow quick changeovers for different pipe specifications and coil sizes.
  • Improve Workplace Safety: Automated handling and pneumatic discharge reduce manual lifting and repetitive strain injuries.

Technical Overview & Specifications

The FCL-V1200 is designed as a robust, reliable workhorse for demanding factory environments. Its core intelligence is a programmable logic controller (PLC) paired with an intuitive Human-Machine Interface (HMI), giving operators full command over the coiling and strapping process.

Note on Customization: This machine serves as the base model for HDPE and PERT pipe applications. Specific configurations can be modified to meet unique production line requirements, pipe dimensions, and desired coil weights.

Integrated Workflow: From Pipe to Pallet

  1. Automated Infeed & Tensioning: Pipe is fed under controlled tension to initiate a tight, stable coil core.
  2. Precision Winding: The dual-wheel system winds the pipe uniformly, with length monitored for automatic cut-off.
  3. Coil Formation & Ejection: Once the preset length is achieved, the completed coil is pneumatically displaced and ejected onto a conveyor or collection area.
  4. Automatic Strapping: The integrated strapping unit immediately secures the coil with plastic strapping, creating a compact, transport-safe bundle.

Ideal for pipe manufacturers seeking to automate the final packaging stage, the FCL-V1200 represents a strategic investment in productivity, consistency, and lean manufacturing principles.

fullContentHtml:
FCL-S1000 Automatic Coiling & Strapping Machine

The FCL-S1000 is an industrial-grade, automated packaging solution engineered for manufacturing facilities requiring high-speed, consistent coiling and securing of flexible linear products like pipes and hoses. It transforms loose product into stable, professionally packaged coils ready for storage, shipment, or direct distribution.

Key Industrial Benefits

  • Maximize Production Line Throughput: Eliminate manual coiling bottlenecks with continuous, automated operation.
  • Ensure Product Integrity & Presentation: Achieve uniform coil shape and secure strapping to prevent unravelling and damage.
  • Reduce Packaging Labor Costs: Automate a repetitive, labor-intensive process, reallocating personnel to higher-value tasks.
  • Standardize Output for Logistics: Create consistent, stackable bundles that optimize pallet space and simplify handling.

Technical Specifications & Integration

The FCL-S1000 system is built to rigorous industrial standards for reliability in demanding production environments. Its robust construction requires installation on a firm, level floor with a load capacity exceeding 1 ton/m².

ModelFCL-S1000

Standardized Packaging Workflow

  1. Material Feed: Product is fed from the extruder or spooler, passing through a tensioner and counter for measurement and control.

  4. Output: A finished, stable coil is discharged, ready for the next stage in your supply chain.

fullContentHtml:
Optimized for Industrial Wire & Cable Packaging

This industrial coil wrapping machine automates the final packaging stage for wire, cable, and coiled products, designed to integrate seamlessly into high-volume B2B manufacturing and distribution lines. It enhances throughput, ensures packaging consistency, and reduces manual labor.

Automated Operational Workflow

  1. System Start & Position: Machine initialization with automatic movement of the wrapping station to the designated coil loading position.
  2. Coil Loading: Efficient loading of the wire coil via overhead crane onto the supporting rollers.
  3. Station Positioning: The wrapping station moves precisely to the programmed packing position.
  4. Automatic Wrapping Cycle: Hands-free operation: the coil is rotated and wrapped, followed by automatic cutting of the packing material.
  5. Station Retraction: Post-cycle, the wrapping station returns automatically to the initial position for unloading.
  6. Coil Handling: Unloading of the wrapped coil by crane and simultaneous loading of the next coil for continuous operation.

Engineering & Design Specifications

Built for reliability in demanding environments, this machine combines robust construction with precise controls to meet diverse packaging requirements and minimize downtime.

Key Technical Specifications

  • Operation Mode: Fully Automatic
  • Coil Adjustment: Motorized Height Adjustment
  • Tape Control: Adjustable Overlap & Tension
  • Material Compatibility: Multiple Packing Films/Tapes
  • Roller Construction: Polyurethane-Covered
  • Roller Configuration: Upper & Lower Support System
  • Control System: PLC-Based with Inverter
  • Safety Design: Separated Electrical Cabinet
  • Core Function: Automatic Wrapping & Cutting

Business Benefits

  • Increase Line Efficiency: Automated process enables faster cycle times and consistent output.
  • Reduce Packaging Costs: Precise material control minimizes waste and optimizes tape/film usage.
  • Enhance Product Protection: Secure, tension-controlled wrapping ensures coils are shipment-ready.
  • Improve Operator Safety: Separated electrical cabinet and automated handling reduce manual intervention.
  • Maximize Uptime: Modular design and accessible components simplify maintenance and service.

fullContentHtml:
Master Steel Coil Orbital Wrapping Machine

Engineered for industrial efficiency, the Master Steel Coil Orbital Wrapping Machine automates the packaging process to ensure your steel coils are shipped securely, protected from dust and damage.

Advanced Control

Features a PLC & HMI interface for intuitive operation, full process control, and diagnostics, reducing operator training time and error.

Precision Wrapping

Automated Positioning

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Coil Tilters: Engineered for Safe, Efficient Material Handling

In high-volume manufacturing and logistics, precise orientation of heavy coils and rolls is a critical path operation. Manual or improvised tilting methods create bottlenecks, introduce significant safety risks, and compromise material integrity, directly impacting productivity and profitability.

Operational Challenges in Coil Handling

Manufacturers and distributors face consistent hurdles when rotating multi-ton coils without specialized equipment:

  • Safety & Liability Risks: Uncontrolled coil movement during manual rotation leads to workplace injuries, near-miss incidents, and increased operator liability.
  • Product Damage & Loss: Improper handling results in dented, scratched, or deformed coils, causing direct financial loss and quality rejections.
  • Throughput Inefficiency: Slow, inconsistent manual processes create production delays, unable to scale with increased shipping and installation demands.
  • Process Inconsistency: Lack of repeatable, precise positioning leads to downstream alignment issues in processing and fabrication lines.

Engineered Coil Tilting Solutions

Our industrial coil tilters (upenders) are custom-engineered to integrate directly with your existing material handling flow—forklifts, cranes, or dedicated lifters. They provide controlled, precise rotation through 90°, 180°, or 360° arcs, transforming a high-risk manual task into a safe, automated, and repeatable process.

B2B Applications & Integration

  • Manufacturing: Feed coils into processing lines with exact orientation.
  • Warehousing & Logistics: Efficiently position coils for storage, retrieval, and container loading.
  • Shipping & Receiving: Safely load and unload coils from trucks and shipping containers.
  • Metal Service Centers: Prepare coils for slitting, cutting, or further processing.

This process positions components optimally for maintenance, assembly, or further processing, enhancing workflow efficiency and operator safety.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Mechanical Upender / Coil Positioner

Engineered for precision and safety in demanding industrial environments, our mechanical upenders—also known as coil positioners—deliver reliable 90-degree bidirectional rotation for steel coils and other heavy loads, optimizing workflow and material handling.

Operational Integrity & Testing

Each unit undergoes rigorous operational cycles to verify system integrity. This includes monitoring the hydraulic hoist for potential oil leaks from vent plugs and checking for cavitation at the completion of the tilt cycle, ensuring long-term reliability and performance.

Inspection & Maintenance Protocol

To guarantee optimal performance and safety, the upending machine must be inspected and maintained strictly according to the correct operational sequence outlined in the manufacturer's official operating and maintenance manual, adhering to all prescribed safe operating procedures.

Safety & Compliance Procedures

Decommissioning

Any unit found to be in an unsafe operating condition must be immediately taken out of service. It can only be returned to operation after servicing to the original manufacturer's exact specifications.

Repair Authorization

All repairs and adjustments must be conducted exclusively by personnel authorized by the manufacturer, following the detailed instructions provided in the official technical documentation.

Operator Qualifications

Operation of this equipment is restricted to personnel who have been specifically trained and authorized to handle it, ensuring safe and correct usage.

Pre-Operational Checklist

Before initiating any machine operation, the assigned operator must ensure the following prerequisite is fully met:

  1. Documentation Review: The operator must have thoroughly read, had explained, and demonstrably understood the complete manufacturer's operating manual, including all safety warnings and procedural guidelines.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Hydraulic Coil Upender for Heavy Manufacturing

Engineered for precision and durability in B2B and industrial settings, hydraulic coil upenders are critical for safe material handling in steel, metal processing, and heavy manufacturing sectors. They provide the controlled rotational force necessary to maneuver high-weight coils and cylindrical loads, integrating seamlessly into automated production lines.

Core Technology & Operational Advantages

Unlike mechanical alternatives, the hydraulic drive system delivers superior power transmission, smooth acceleration, and precise control under extreme loads. This makes it the preferred solution for heavy-duty applications where load integrity and operator safety are paramount. The choice between mechanical and hydraulic models is primarily dictated by load weight, profile, and required cycle speed.

Proven in Global Industrial Operations

Case Study: Major Steel Production

Client: Baosteel Group Corporation
Location: Shanghai Baoshan Iron & Steel Complex, China
Solution: High-Capacity 20T Hydraulic Tilter
Performance: Achieves consistent coil turning in approximately 30 seconds, enhancing downstream processing efficiency.

Case Study: Integrated Metal Processing

Client: Angang Steel Company Limited
Location: Anshan Iron & Steel Complex, Liaoning, China
Solution: Custom 30T Hydraulic Coil Upender
Specifications: Handles coil ODs from 800mm to 1800mm. Features a floor pit installation for ergonomic, floor-level operation and seamless line integration.

Technical Overview & Design Principles

1. High-Pressure Hydraulic System

The core of the upender, comprising pumps, valves, and cylinders, engineered for reliable power delivery and minimal maintenance in continuous-use environments.

2. Structural & Safety Components

Includes a reinforced load cradle, a stable base frame (for pit or floor mounting), and integrated safety locks and controls to prevent accidental movement and protect both load and personnel.

Ideal for B2B & Industrial Applications

  • Steel Mills & Service Centers
  • Metal Fabrication & Processing Plants
  • Heavy Machinery Manufacturing
  • Paper & Converting Industries
  • Any operation requiring safe rotation of heavy cylindrical loads

As a leading roll upender manufacturer, we provide robust, application-engineered solutions designed to meet the specific throughput, safety, and durability demands of modern heavy industry.

Custom Hydraulic Coil Upender for Industrial Material Handling

Engineered for precision and safety in demanding B2B environments, our custom hydraulic coil upenders provide robust solutions for rotating, positioning, and handling heavy asymmetric loads such as steel coils and long cylindrical materials.

Core Function & Design Advantage

The upender features a platform design that accommodates significant size differentials, making it an ideal solution for stabilizing and manipulating asymmetric loads. This ensures safe, controlled flipping and precise positioning critical for downstream assembly, machining, or mold access processes.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Mobile Coil Upender and Tilter System

Engineered for manufacturing, warehousing, and metal processing facilities, our mobile coil upender and tilter delivers precision, durability, and operational flexibility for heavy coil handling.

Core System Overview

This high-quality industrial tilter features a double-coil compatible rotating platform integrated with a movable track. Powered by an industrial-duty motor and precision gear system, it ensures reliable performance for demanding B2B applications. Sensors and controls are embedded for a streamlined footprint or can be packaged for external installation, offering configuration flexibility.

Operational Precision & Safety

The rotation cycle is managed by an electric limit switch, providing automatic stop control at each operational endpoint. System activation is designed for trained personnel, ensuring safe operation through defined procedural protocols. The load rotates smoothly on a heavy-duty pivot bearing, engineered for longevity with a centralized lubrication point for easy maintenance.

Workflow Integration

Once a coil is secured on the V-bracket platform, the spin cycle is activated, rotating the load a precise 90 degrees. The integrated movable track allows the coil, along with its tray, to be seamlessly transferred to the next stage. The system also operates in reverse, enabling efficient removal of material from the tray and reorientation for subsequent processing steps, maximizing line versatility.

Drive & Power Specifications

Primary power is supplied by a robust electric motor, which drives a sprocket mechanism via a reduction gearbox. This design delivers the high torque necessary for stable, controlled rotation of heavy industrial coils, ensuring consistent performance and reducing strain on upstream material handling equipment.

Our engineering team can develop upenders with specific platform dimensions, load capacities, and control systems to integrate seamlessly into your existing material handling process, solving unique roll manipulation challenges.

Ideal for critical roll handling tasks in steel service centers, paper mills, printing facilities, and converting plants, our upenders increase safety, reduce manual labor, and improve throughput in demanding industrial environments.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Material Handling with an Industrial-Grade Coil Upender

Our heavy-duty hydraulic coil upender and tilter is engineered for B2B environments where handling long, cylindrical, or irregular loads is a daily challenge. Transform your workflow by safely and efficiently rotating, positioning, and transferring cumbersome items like paper rolls, textile cores, metal coils, and large-diameter piping.

Key Benefits for Your Operation

  • Enhanced Productivity: Drastically reduce manual handling time and labor costs associated with positioning heavy loads for processing, packaging, or shipping.
  • Superior Workplace Safety: Minimize strain injuries and accident risks by mechanizing the tilting and rotation of heavy, unstable loads.
  • Process Consistency: Achieve precise, repeatable positioning for downstream machinery, improving overall production line quality and throughput.
  • Space Efficiency: Designed to integrate seamlessly into existing material flow paths, optimizing valuable floor space in warehouses and manufacturing facilities.

Operational & Safety Protocol

To maximize the return on your capital equipment investment and ensure a safe working environment, adhere to these core operational guidelines:

1. Comprehensive Operator Training

Strictly follow the manufacturer's operational manual and safety guidelines. Ensure all personnel are fully trained on control functions, load limits, and emergency procedures.

2. Mandatory Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)

Operators and nearby personnel must wear appropriate PPE, including ANSI-rated safety glasses, steel-toe boots, and high-visibility clothing, as dictated by your facility's safety plan.

3. Rigorous Load Securement

Prior to any tilting operation, verify the load is centered and securely fastened to the platform using rated straps, chains, or custom fixtures to prevent shifting or slippage.

Ideal for Diverse Industrial Sectors

This robust upender is a critical asset for industries including:

  • Paper & Packaging: Handling large rolls of paper, cardboard, and plastic film.
  • Metals & Coil Processing: Positioning steel, aluminum, and copper coils for slitting, blanking, or transport.
  • Textiles & Carpets: Managing heavy fabric and carpet rolls.
  • Printing & Converting: Feeding large material rolls into presses and processing machines.
  • Pipe & Tube Distribution: Sorting and loading lengthy piping materials.

Contact our engineering team today to discuss your specific load dimensions, cycle requirements, and integration needs for a tailored upender solution that drives efficiency and safety in your facility.

fullContentHtml:
Precision Hydraulic Upenders for Automated Production Lines

Engineered for reliability in demanding B2B environments, our industrial hydraulic upenders are integral components for automated material handling and palletizing systems. They are designed for modification and seamless integration into existing automated operating systems.

Guaranteed Operational Integrity

Prior to dispatch, each unit undergoes multiple complete operational cycles. This rigorous testing protocol checks for critical performance factors such as secure gripping hose connections and the absence of hydraulic leaks at all fittings, ensuring reliability upon installation.

Engineered for Global Voltage Standards

Built for operational flexibility, our hydraulic upenders function across a variety of industrial supply voltages. The system utilizes a multi-voltage motor. Essential overload protection heaters are configured and shipped according to the specific voltage requirements provided at the time of factory order.

Critical Installation Note:

If the unit is connected to a power source different from the factory-specified configuration, a heavy-duty overload relay matching the new power source must be installed prior to operation. Failure to install the correct protective device will result in motor failure and potential damage to the hoist mechanism.

Uncompromising Safety Protocol

Operation must only be conducted from the designated remote control position. For maximum safety, personnel must never place any part of their body within the upender's structure or on the lifting platform during its cycle.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Roll Upender: A B2B Guide for Secure Material Handling

Selecting the correct roll upender is a critical decision for manufacturing and logistics operations handling cylindrical materials. This guide details key considerations for B2B buyers to ensure safety, efficiency, and compatibility with existing material handling workflows.

Core Application & Integration

Industrial roll upenders are designed for secure rotation and repositioning of large rolls in sectors like paper manufacturing, textile production, and flooring. The primary challenge involves integrating the upender seamlessly into diverse transfer points: from production lines to workstations, or during loading/unloading for storage and transport.

Integration with Material Handling Equipment

Successful implementation depends on compatibility with your facility's primary lifting equipment. The upender design must align with the chosen method to maintain a safe, efficient workflow.

1. Integration with Hand Lifters

For operations utilizing manual or battery-powered hand lifters, the upender must feature floor-level operation. This design ensures the lifting equipment can smoothly load and unload rolls without requiring elevation or complex maneuvering.

A fork-type design is optimal here, allowing the lifter to move directly into the upender's structure for direct engagement and stable upending of the roll.

2. Integration with Forklifts

When using forklifts for roll handling, the upender requires a different design approach. The working platform or interface must be engineered to safely and securely receive rolls from the forklift's forks, facilitating a stable transfer for the upending process. The structural integrity and positioning are paramount to handle the dynamic loads involved.

Key Selection Criteria for B2B Buyers

  • Roll Specifications: Determine maximum roll diameter, width, and weight capacity required.
  • Equipment Compatibility: Confirm the upender design matches your lifter or forklift interaction model.
  • Cycle Time & Durability: Assess build quality for required operational cycles in your environment.
  • Safety Features: Look for secure locking mechanisms, stability controls, and compliance with relevant material handling standards.
  • Footprint & Workflow: Ensure the equipment fits your spatial constraints and optimizes, rather than disrupts, material flow.

Choosing the right industrial roll upender is an investment in operational safety and productivity. By aligning the equipment's design with your specific roll types and material handling ecosystem, you can significantly reduce manual handling risks and streamline your logistics process.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Coil Upender Systems for Precision Material Handling

Engineered for B2B metal processing and fabrication facilities, our heavy-duty coil upender systems ensure safe, efficient, and centered transfer of steel rod coils between handling stages. These systems are built to integrate seamlessly into your production line, enhancing workflow and protecting material integrity.

Core Technology & Operation

The upender utilizes a robust hydraulic system featuring two synchronized “wings” that actuate simultaneously. This precise motion centers the steel rod coil perfectly onto the conveyor section's mesh pad, ensuring stable downstream processing. A dedicated hydraulic reservoir maintains system performance, requiring routine checks for optimal oil levels.

Platform Design & Safety Features

The primary load platform is engineered for durability and flexibility. It includes removable fork guides for secure placement via forklift. Operator controls are intuitive: releasing the UP button engages a lock to keep the platform stationary, while pressing the DOWN button initiates a controlled lowering sequence. For handling coils in a horizontal position, an optional V-bracket cradle is mounted to the platform to prevent lateral rolling of circular cross-section material, a critical safety feature for core stability. Platforms can be configured as the primary load point or, when positioned at the line's lower end, as the offload point.

Configurations & Integration

These upender systems are typically supplied as complete, factory-configured units ready for integration. Units are available with or without the V-bracket, allowing use as a dedicated unloading or loading platform to suit your plant layout. Standard operation involves using a forklift truck or overhead crane to lower coil material onto the platform, from which the upender's automated centering and tilting sequence takes over.

B2B Applications & Value

Ideal for steel service centers, wire processing plants, and metal fabrication facilities, our coil upenders reduce manual handling, minimize product damage, and increase line throughput. The robust construction and focus on operator safety translate into lower total cost of ownership and reliable performance in high-cycle industrial environments.

fullContentHtml:
Custom Engineered Coil Upenders for Industrial Material Handling

Optimize your production line with a precision coil upender engineered for your specific B2B application. Our mechanical upenders provide reliable, controlled rotation for heavy coils, enhancing workflow efficiency and workplace safety.

Core Design & Engineering

Our industrial upenders feature a robust, round cradle frame mounted on four precision-machined rollers. This engineered system ensures smooth, stable rotation for consistent material handling performance.

Custom Installation Planning: For in-floor or pit applications, our engineering team provides detailed site specifications. Precise measurement from the table end to the floor is a critical step in our custom design process to ensure a perfect fit for your facility.

Operational Integrity & Safety

Proper operation is characterized by smooth, quiet rotation. The following conditions indicate a need for immediate service to maintain operational integrity and safety:

  • Audible Faults: Scraping or knocking noises during operation.
  • Kinematic Faults: Shaking or irregular motion during the rotation cycle.

Protocol: Operators must halt equipment immediately if any of these conditions are observed and initiate inspection by qualified service personnel. Critical Safety Rule: Never place any part of the body inside the hoist during operation. Always secure the unit by placing the maintenance pin in the locked position prior to any service activities.

Configuration & Integration

We provide both standard and fully custom-engineered upender solutions. Each system can be tailored for seamless integration with downstream equipment, such as:

  • Coil Wrapping and Packaging Machines
  • Coil Transport Systems and Transfer Cars
  • Processing and Production Lines

Application Overview

Our custom coil upenders are integral components in advanced material handling systems, designed to interface efficiently with wrapping stations, transporters, and other line equipment to create a cohesive, productive workflow.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Your Coil Handling & Dispatch with Automated Packaging

This advanced coil packaging line is engineered for B2B manufacturing and processing centers requiring reliable, high-throughput preparation of stainless steel, copper, and aluminum alloy coils for storage and shipment. The integrated system eliminates bottlenecks and ensures consistent, secure packaging.

Complete End-to-End Packaging Process

The line seamlessly integrates several automated stations: a rotating turnstile for coil intake, a precision separator, a digital weighing device for inventory control, a high-tension strapping machine, and a programmable stacking system linked by a synchronized conveyor line. This flow is designed for minimal manual intervention.

Industrial Control & Integration

Operation is managed by a centralized supervisory control system (PLC-based), providing real-time monitoring and data logging. Each module can also be operated independently via manual controls for maintenance or flexible production scheduling. The system includes an integrated hydraulic press station; clients supply standard plant power (380V/60Hz) and compressed air (4-6 bar).

Technical Specifications for System Integration

  • Weight Capacity: 100 - 3000 kg
  • Coil Width: 30 - 300 mm
  • Coil OD Range: 600 - 1500 mm
  • Standard Coil ID: 508 mm
  • Line Speed: 2 - 4 m/min
  • Wrapping Speed: 20 - 60 sec/piece
  • Power Consumption: ~3.6 kW
  • Strapping Type: PP Band

This system is designed to enhance your operational efficiency, reduce labor costs, and ensure your valuable stainless steel and alloy coils are packaged securely for transport or storage.

fullContentHtml:
Precision Mechanical Upenders for Industrial Heavy Load Handling

In capital-intensive manufacturing sectors—including aerospace, automotive tooling, and heavy fabrication—the reliable orientation and transfer of large, heavy components is a critical path operation. Traditional manual methods create bottlenecks and expose both personnel and high-value assets to significant risk.

The High Cost of Inefficient Load Handling

Operations managers and plant engineers identify consistent challenges:

  • Manual Rigging Risks: Compromised safety and potential for catastrophic damage to expensive tooling, such as injection molds or composite layups.
  • Throughput Delays: Production schedules are disrupted by slow, unreliable tilting and positioning processes, creating downstream bottlenecks.
  • Asset Protection: Improvised fixtures lack the controlled motion required to prevent impact damage to sensitive or high-tolerance assemblies.

Engineered for Precision and Integration

Our mechanical upender systems provide a robust, engineered solution. They deliver controlled, precise tilting and steering for loads ranging from sheet metal bundles to rocket assembly jigs, ensuring seamless workflow integration and operational predictability.

Core Operational Benefits

  • Risk Mitigation: Replace hazardous manual processes with a stable, controlled mechanical operation.
  • Flow Optimization: Eliminate waiting periods for crane availability or rigging, accelerating cycle times.
  • Damage Prevention: Engineered motion control protects the structural integrity and finish of critical components.
  • ROI Focused: Reduce downtime, prevent costly accidents, and safeguard capital equipment investment.

Next Steps for Engineering & Procurement Teams: Discuss your specific load parameters, floor space constraints, and integration requirements with our engineering team to develop a specification for a system that eliminates handling bottlenecks and protects your valuable assets.

fullContentHtml:
Master Coil Orbital Stretch Wrapper for Industrial Steel Packaging

Engineered for high-volume production lines, our automated master coil stretch wrapper delivers precision, protection, and efficiency for packaging cold-rolled steel coils. This robust system ensures your coils are shipment-ready with a secure, dustproof, and corrosion-inhibiting VCI film wrap.

Core Application & Technology

This industrial-grade orbital wrapping machine is specifically engineered for the demanding requirements of steel service centers and mills. Its dual blocker roller stations provide superior film control and containment during the wrapping process, creating a tight, uniform package that protects against dust, moisture, and handling damage.

The integrated VCI (Vapor Corrosion Inhibitor) film compatibility offers an added layer of defense, actively preventing rust during storage and transit while presenting a clean, professional appearance.

Automated Operation & Precision

The system features automatic coil size detection, which initiates a fully automated cycle including machine movement, precise coil positioning, and through-eye wrapping initiation. This eliminates manual measurement and setup, reducing operator involvement and potential for error.

A multi-roll shuttle system carries 2 or 3 film rolls simultaneously, enabling overlap wrapping for enhanced film strength and integrity. Advanced tension control maintains consistent force across varying coil diameters, ensuring optimal film stretch and load stability for both large and small coils.

Engineering & Implementation Scope

Our comprehensive service covers the entire project lifecycle, from initial concept to detailed engineering and analysis, ensuring a solution tailored to your production specifications.

  • System Conceptualization: Design of the integrated packing system for your facility layout and throughput goals.
  • Mechanical & Electrical Design: Engineering of all machine modules, drives, and control systems.
  • Detailed Analysis & Simulation: Finite element analysis (FEA) and motion simulation for each module to validate performance and durability.
  • General Assembly Layout: Provision of detailed floor plans and integration drawings.
  • Cycle Time Analysis: Optimization of wrapping cycles to meet your production line speed requirements.
  • Production Engineering: Detailed drawings, machining instructions, and bill of materials for manufacturing.

Installation Requirements

For optimal performance and longevity, the machine must be installed on a stable, level concrete floor surface as specified in the foundation drawings provided during the engineering phase.

fullContentHtml:
Heavy-Duty Industrial Coil Upenders & Tilters

Engineered for precision and durability in B2B and industrial environments, our coil upenders are critical for safe and efficient handling of steel coils and heavy cylindrical loads. These robust machines facilitate seamless integration into your material flow, enhancing productivity and workplace safety.

Core Technology & Operation

An industrial upender is a mechanical device engineered to tilt or flip heavy loads with precision. The system comprises a reinforced platform for load placement and a powerful hydraulic actuation system—using cylinders or jacks—to execute controlled lifting and tilting motions.

Operational Workflow:

  1. Load Positioning: Securely place the coil or cylindrical load onto the platform in the required starting orientation.
  2. Machine Setup: Position the upender within the workflow with adequate clearance for its full range of motion.
  3. Activation: The operator engages the hydraulic system, initiating a smooth lift and tilt cycle.
  4. Precision Tilting: The platform rotates to the precise angle required—typically 90 degrees to a vertical position.
  5. Completion & Reset: Once the operation is complete, the hydraulic system lowers the platform safely back to its original position, ready for the next cycle.

Engineered for Industrial Demands

We specialize in custom-designed solutions that align with specific capacity, footprint, and integration requirements. Our upenders are built to handle the most challenging loads, ensuring reliability and longevity in continuous operation environments.

From standard models to fully customized units with special platform geometries, we provide the engineering expertise to optimize your coil handling process, reduce downtime, and protect your valuable material from handling damage.

fullContentHtml:
Optimize Coil Handling for Modern Production & Logistics

In high-volume coil processing, fabricating, and distribution facilities, efficient material flow is critical to profitability. The transition of heavy coils between vertical and horizontal orientations is a pivotal yet often problematic node in the workflow, impacting downstream packing, depalletizing, and production line efficiency.

The High Cost of Inefficient Coil Orientation

Reliance on manual methods or improvised solutions for coil turning creates significant operational vulnerabilities. These include heightened risk of worker injury, potential for costly coil edge damage or deformation, production bottlenecks, and inconsistent cycle times that disrupt synchronized material flow.

Engineered for Reliability & Integration

Our Advanced Coil Upender System is engineered as a robust, automated solution to this core handling challenge. It transforms a risky manual operation into a controlled, automated process. The system is designed for seamless integration into your existing facility layout and material handling sequence, supporting continuous operation and protecting your capital investment in coils.

Drive Operational Excellence

By deploying a purpose-built upender, operations managers and plant engineers can achieve measurable outcomes: eliminate manual handling hazards, dramatically reduce product damage claims, increase line throughput with predictable cycle times, and ensure compliance with stringent workplace safety regulations. This investment directly contributes to a safer, more efficient, and more profitable material handling ecosystem.

Industrial-Grade Electric Coil Upender for Precision Material Handling

Engineered for demanding B2B environments in manufacturing, metal processing, and logistics, our fully electric coil upender delivers reliable, safe, and efficient tilting and positioning of heavy coils. The system integrates all controls and safety features into a single, robust unit for streamlined operation.

Core Operational Features

The fully electrically controlled system ensures precise movement. The isolating switch and button control station are conveniently mounted on the unit for direct access. For maintenance, the platform can be lifted and secured using the dedicated maintenance safety bar, which locks into appropriate disengaged positions.

Operation is simplified through automated rotation control managed by limit switches. Prior to full operation, it is recommended to run the hoist through several complete cycles to verify system integrity, checking for issues such as clamped hoses or hydraulic leaks at fittings.

Mandatory Safety & Operational Protocol

Strict adherence to safety procedures is paramount for industrial equipment operation.

  • Operators must be fully trained and authorized before using the equipment.
  • Conduct a full pre-operation check to verify correct equipment status and functionality.
  • Always wear appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
  • Follow all manufacturer instructions for use precisely.
  • Ensure the load is properly secured on the platform and the upender is in confirmed working condition before activation.

Applications & Industries

This heavy-duty upender is critical for:

  • Steel & Metal Service Centers
  • Wire & Cable Manufacturing
  • Paper & Converting Mills
  • Heavy Logistics & Warehousing

Selecting an Industrial Upender Manufacturer

The global market includes numerous manufacturers of upending machinery. For businesses seeking a reliable partner, it is critical to conduct thorough due diligence to find a supplier that aligns with your operational needs and quality standards.

  • Assess Build Quality & Durability: Evaluate the construction materials and engineering design for long-term performance in high-cycle environments.

  • Research Company Reputation: Investigate the manufacturer's track record, industry certifications, and client portfolio.
  • Seek Independent Validation: Review case studies or seek references from existing clients in similar industries to gauge real-world performance and reliability.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial HDPE Pipe Coil Packing Machine

Engineered for reliability in high-demand production environments, our HDPE Pipe Coil Packing Machine delivers consistent, secure wrapping to protect your product through the supply chain. This robust station enhances packaging line efficiency and reduces material waste.

Core Engineering & Performance

Durable Construction

The machine is built around a reinforced aluminum cast-solid rotating ring, ensuring stability and longevity under continuous industrial use. Polyurethane rubber driving wheels provide reliable traction and smooth operation.

Precision Control Systems

Gain complete command over the wrapping process. Adjust friction and packing material tension via belt tension adjusters, screws, and a specialized brake device. Control ring and roller speed precisely through an integrated inverter.

Operational Flexibility

Features include soft start and stop functionality, ring jog mode, and packing position reset for seamless operation. The overlap of packing material (10%-90%) is fully adjustable via frequency inverter, allowing customization for optimal load stability and film use.

Adaptable Handling

The system accommodates various coil sizes with adjustable distances between protective and supporting rollers. The motor-driven supporting rollers and manually adjustable upper/lower protective rollers ensure secure coil positioning throughout the wrap cycle.

Packaging & Integration

Compatible with a range of industry-standard packaging materials—including LLDPE, knit belts, and compound paper—to meet your specific logistical and protective requirements. The separate industrial control cabinet centralizes operations, simplifying maintenance and ensuring operator safety alongside full machine guardrails.

B2B Application Benefits

  • Increase Line Throughput: Automated, consistent wrapping reduces manual labor and bottlenecks.
  • Reduce Packaging Costs: Minimize material waste with precise overlap and tension control.
  • Enhance Load Security: Ensure coils arrive undamaged, reducing returns and claims.
  • Improve Worker Safety: Enclosed operation with guardrails minimizes interaction with moving parts.
  • Simplify Maintenance: Separate control cabinet and robust design minimize downtime.
