fullContentHtml:
Automatic Cable Coiling and Heat Shrink Wrapping System

Streamline your cable manufacturing and distribution process with our fully integrated, PLC-controlled packaging system. Designed for B2B and OEM environments, this solution automates coiling and shrink-wrapping to enhance throughput, ensure consistency, and reduce labor costs.

System Overview

This advanced system combines a precision automatic coiling machine with a heat shrink tunnel to create a seamless, end-to-end packaging line. It is engineered for reliability in high-volume production settings, capable of handling various cable types and specifications with minimal setup time.

Core Operational Advantages

  • Flexible Integration: Choose between online (integrated directly into your extrusion or testing line) or offline (standalone batch processing) configurations to match your factory layout and workflow.
  • Precision Engineering: The coiling mechanism features adjustable OD and programmable cut-length, paired with critical tension control to produce uniform, damage-free coils ready for retail or shipment.
  • Intelligent Automation: From sensor-initiated cable positioning and automated cutting to the mechanical transfer of finished coils into the heat tunnel, the process requires minimal operator involvement.
  • Production Reliability: Built-in error detection and diagnostic alarms alert operators immediately to issues, preventing waste and facilitating rapid maintenance to maximize equipment uptime.

Technical Specifications & Workflow

The system is built around an industrial-grade PLC, managing the entire sequence: coil winding, securing with a pressing device, cutting to length, and transferring the coil. The heat shrink machine then applies a durable, professional-grade polyolefin sleeve, resulting in a compact, stable, and protected final product.

Ideal for wire harness producers, electrical component manufacturers, and cable distributors, this machine is a scalable investment in packaging automation, improving both output quality and operational efficiency.

productName: Rigid Board Protective Packaging System
seoTitle: Industrial Rigid Board Packaging Machine | EPS & Foam Panel Protection
metaDescription: Automated packaging system for EPS and high-density foam panels. Ensures damage-free transport & storage with low-temperature heat sealing. Ideal for construction material manufacturers.
features: Low-Temperature Heat Sealing Technology: Protects temperature-sensitive EPS and foam panels from thermal damage during the packaging process.
Enhanced Product Protection: Creates a secure, weather-resistant barrier to prevent oxidation, moisture ingress, and physical damage during warehousing and transit.
Sustainable Operation: Utilizes a steam and water-based process with no environmental contaminants, aligning with green manufacturing initiatives.
Optimized for Construction Materials: Specifically engineered for the fixed-size dimensions of rigid insulation boards used in the building industry.
Efficient Logistics Readiness: Produces stable, unitized loads that streamline handling, reduce shipping damage, and improve on-site storage at construction areas.

specifications.application: Packaging of rigid EPS panels and high-density foam insulation boards
specifications.sealingMethod: Controlled hot air blower system (replaces traditional high-heat tunnels)
specifications.keyBenefit: Surface-level heat application ensures package integrity without compromising panel core properties
specifications.materialCompatibility: Designed for use with standard industrial shrink films

fullContentHtml:
Advanced Packaging for Rigid Insulation Panels

Rigid board insulation—including EPS (Expanded Polystyrene) and high-density foam panels—is a premier building material valued for its exceptional thermal insulation, cost-effectiveness, and environmental profile. Its production is a clean process utilizing primarily steam and water.

To preserve these qualities and product integrity from production line to job site, a robust protective packaging solution is critical. It mitigates risks of damage, oxidation, and moisture exposure during transportation, warehousing, and on-site storage.

Precision Engineered Packaging Technology

Our Rigid Board Packaging System is specifically designed to address the unique challenges of insulating materials. Recognizing the heat sensitivity of EPS and certain foam cores, we have engineered an alternative to conventional high-heat shrinking tunnels.

  • Targeted Heat Application: The system employs precisely controlled hot air generators and specialized blowers. This directs a sustainable flow of heat exclusively to the surface of the packaging film.
  • Product-Safe Process: This method ensures the high temperature is confined to the film, allowing for a tight, secure shrink-wrap seal without transferring damaging heat to the encapsulated panels.
  • Optimal Seal Integrity: The result is a durable, conformal package that locks out environmental factors while maintaining the full R-value and structural integrity of the insulation product within.

This system is an essential investment for manufacturers seeking to reduce transit damage claims, enhance brand presentation, and ensure their insulation products arrive on-site performing as specified.

E2000 Horizontal Subfloor Panel Packing & Wrapping Machine

Engineered for building material manufacturers, the E2000 Horizontal Wrapping Machine automates the final packaging stage for subfloor panel production. It delivers robust, consistent wraps that protect product integrity from factory floor to job site.

The Packaging Challenge for Modern Subflooring

Contemporary subflooring systems are engineered components. Combining a moisture barrier, HIPS film, and raised drainage channels, they create a dry, stable base for floor assemblies. Final packaging must protect these precise features during shipping and handling.

Precision Engineering for Industrial Output

The E2000 is built to meet the rigorous demands of B2B manufacturing. Its side rollers firmly secure panels during the wrap cycle, preventing misalignment. The extended ring mechanism is designed for large panels and continuous, high-volume operation, maximizing line productivity.

Protection-Centric Design

To safeguard the panel surface and critical HIPS film layer, the machine utilizes belt conveyors. This system significantly reduces friction and abrasion during the packaging process, ensuring products arrive in market-ready condition and reducing costly damage-related waste.

Drive Efficiency in Your Production Line

By automating the wrapping process, the E2000 delivers exceptional operational efficiency and cost-effectiveness. It streamlines labor requirements, increases throughput, and produces a tight, professional package that enhances brand presentation and reduces shipping claims.

Streamline Cable Finishing with the FCL-H200 Automated System

The FCL-H200 Automatic Cable Winding and Strapping Machine is engineered for industrial manufacturers seeking to optimize end-of-line packaging processes. This robust system automates the precise coiling, cutting, and strapping of cables and hoses, delivering consistent, bundle-ready output to enhance throughput and reduce labor costs.

Core Operational Advantages

Designed for seamless integration into production lines, the FCL-H200 performs a complete sequence: it accurately measures cable length, forms it into a uniform coil, makes a clean cut, and secures the bundle with a PP strap. The automated transfer mechanism then moves the finished coil to the next station, ensuring a continuous workflow.

Engineered for Reliability and Control

At the heart of the machine is an advanced PLC control system, managed via an intuitive HMI. Operators can easily set and adjust all critical parameters—including coil diameter and cut length—directly in English. This precision control guarantees repeatable results batch after batch.

Built for Demanding Industrial Environments

Industrial Automatic Cable Coiling and Strapping Machine

Streamline your cable packaging process with our fully automated, CE-certified coiling and strapping solution. Engineered for reliability in demanding B2B and industrial manufacturing settings, this machine integrates seamlessly into both online and offline packaging lines.

Machine Overview

This system performs a complete packaging cycle: automatically winding cable into consistent coils, cutting to a preset length, transferring the coil to the strapping station, and securing it with a PP band. Designed with modern industrial criteria, it enhances throughput, ensures packaging uniformity, and reduces labor costs.

Core Features & Technological Advantages

  • Advanced PLC/HMI Control: Centralized control system enables fully automated operation, easy parameter setting, and real-time monitoring for optimal production management.
  • Precision Adjustability: Key parameters like coil outer diameter (OD) and cut length are easily adjustable via the HMI to meet specific product requirements without mechanical changeover delays.
  • Robust Safety & Reliability: Features dual protective guards, automatic error detection with alarms, and sensor-guided positioning to ensure safe operation, immediate fault identification, and consistent product handling.
  • Secure Coil Formation: The integrated pressing device stabilizes the finished coil, ensuring it remains tight and uniform for a secure, professional strapping application.

Specifications & Integration

fullContentHtml:
FCL-100H: Automated Cable Coiling and Strapping System for Industrial Packaging

The FCL-100H is a fully integrated, offline packaging line engineered to automate and streamline the final stages of cable production. Designed for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, this system enhances throughput, ensures consistency, and reduces labor costs by automating cable measuring, coiling, cutting, and strapping processes.

System Overview & Application

This automatic cable packaging line is designed for offline, end-of-line packaging operations. It performs precise length counting, automatic cutting, uniform coil formation, and secure PP strapping, creating a packaged product ready for storage or shipment. The entire system is CE-certified and built to rigorous industrial design criteria for durability and reliability in high-demand environments.

Core Technical Characteristics

1. Integrated Coiling & Strapping Machine

A unified system that manages the complete transition from loose cable to a strapped, finished coil.

A. Precision Tension Control Unit

Function: This module manages the unwinding of jumbo cable reels and applies consistent, adjustable tension during the feed process. This critical control is essential for producing tight, uniform, and professional-quality coils, preventing tangles and ensuring smooth operation.

  • Tension is easily calibrated via an adjustable braking system, allowing quick adaptation to different cable types and diameters.

B. Automatic Coiling Machine

Function: The heart of the system. This unit automatically calculates preset cable lengths, forms the cable into a precise coil, executes a clean cut, and then securely holds and transfers the finished coil to the subsequent strapping station—all without manual intervention. All operational figures and sequences are programmable via the central control system.

Key Features:

  • Programmable Automation: Utilizes a robust PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) and intuitive HMI (Human-Machine Interface) for fully automatic operation, cycle management, and error monitoring.
  • Flexible Parameter Configuration: All critical parameters—including coil length, diameter, and production count—can be directly set and modified through the user-friendly control panel, enabling rapid changeovers for different product specifications.

Operational Benefits for Your Business

  • Increased Productivity: Automates labor-intensive manual processes, significantly boosting packaging line output.
  • Enhanced Consistency: Produces uniformly packaged coils, improving product presentation and reducing waste.
  • Reduced Operational Costs: Lowers dependency on manual labor and minimizes repetitive strain injuries.
  • Scalable Production: PLC-driven system allows for easy replication of settings and scaling of production runs.
  • Industrial Reliability: CE-certified design ensures safety and compliance for integration into modern industrial facilities.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Aluminum Profile Stacking Machine

Engineered to transform the efficiency and reliability of your aluminum extrusion post-production handling. Our automatic stacking system represents the culmination of decades of specialized engineering in industrial material handling, delivering measurable ROI through labor reduction and throughput optimization.

Streamlined Production Cycle Integration

This critical automation component is designed for direct integration with your existing extrusion line. It interfaces seamlessly with outfeed conveyors and transfer systems to receive profiles, eliminating manual handling and bottlenecks. The machine automates the entire process of counting, grouping, and layering extruded aluminum profiles into designated shipping containers.

Precision Handling & Surface Protection

Beyond simple stacking, the system ensures product integrity. An automated interlayer sheet feeder places protective material between each layer of profiles within the crate or basket, safeguarding critical surface finishes—an essential feature for anodized, mill-finished, or painted products destined for demanding architectural or industrial applications.

Operational & Economic Advantages

Transitioning from manual to automated stacking delivers immediate benefits: a significant reduction in direct labor costs, minimization of product damage from handling, increased line speed consistency, and improved worker safety. The system is engineered for single-operator oversight, reallocating skilled labor to higher-value tasks while ensuring continuous, reliable operation.

Core System Benefits

  • Maximized Line Uptime: Enables uninterrupted operation of the upstream extrusion press.
  • Configurable Stacking Logic: Adaptable programming for various profile geometries and packing specifications.
  • Reduced Operational Cost: Lowers dependency on manual labor and associated variability.
  • Enhanced Traceability: Integrated counting and batching supports precise lot control.
  • Robust Industrial Design: Built for 24/7 performance in demanding plant conditions.

Invest in an automation solution that directly addresses the productivity and quality challenges of modern aluminum profile manufacturing. Contact our engineering team to discuss integration specifications and performance metrics for your operation.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Aluminum Profile Wrapping & Tapping Machine

Streamline your extrusion finishing line with a fully automated solution designed for high-volume bundling, protection, and identification of aluminum profiles.

Core Technology & Process

This advanced system integrates two critical finishing steps: high-speed protective wrapping and simultaneous profile tapping. The tapping mechanism activates during the wrapping cycle while the profile is in motion, applying identification marks or codes without interrupting production flow. The entire sequence—from bundle loading to strapping and unloading—is managed by a centralized automated control system, ensuring precision and repeatability.

Integrated Sub-Bundle Strapping Machine with Transfer Belt

This module is engineered for continuous, high-throughput operation within the wrapping cell.

  • Sequential Strapping Stations: Three to four dedicated stations perform the strapping process. Workers load profile bundles onto the input platform, where an automatic positioning system aligns them before strapping.
  • Automated Material Handling: Once strapping is complete, an integrated lifter automatically unloads bundles one by one, facilitating a non-stop production cycle.
  • Precision Wrapping Head: A rotating ring holds the roll of wrapping film on a mandrel equipped with a specially designed clutch. This mechanism maintains constant tension throughout the entire roll, guaranteeing wrap consistency and material efficiency.
  • Optimized Speed & Control: Wrapping speed is precisely regulated via an electronic inverter, allowing fine-tuning for different profile dimensions and materials.
  • Proactive System Monitoring: An automatic sensing device detects film tears or complete roll depletion. It immediately halts the machine and alerts the operator, preventing defective bundles and minimizing waste.

The machine is designed for reliable standalone operation or seamless integration into a fully automated extrusion finishing line.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Aluminum Profile Protective Film Applicator Machine

Streamline your production line and reduce operational costs with our fully automated profile film taping solution. Designed for B2B manufacturing environments, this machine eliminates manual inconsistencies and bottlenecks in the protective film application process.

Core Business Advantages

This system is engineered to automate the entire sequence—from in-feed and precise film application to cutting and out-feed—transforming a labor-intensive task into a seamless, high-speed operation. It integrates directly into existing extrusion handling lines, requiring minimal supervision and delivering immediate ROI through direct labor savings.

Technical & Operational Overview

The machine applies consistent strips of protective adhesive film or tape to the top and bottom edges of aluminum profiles. Its servo-driven cutting mechanism is synchronized with profile movement, allowing for continuous operation without stopping between parts. This ensures maximum throughput at speeds up to 40 meters per minute, significantly outperforming semi-automatic methods.

Direct Impact on Production Efficiency

  • Labor Optimization: Reduces dependency on manual tape application, saving the cost of 2-3 operators per shift and reallocating personnel to higher-value tasks.
  • Throughput Enhancement: Enables continuous, high-speed processing, increasing overall line output and capacity.
  • Quality & Consistency: Automated precision ensures uniform film application every time, reducing material waste and improving product finish.
  • Line Integration: Compatible with standard roller conveyors for easy implementation into new or existing aluminum profile processing lines.

This equipment represents the definitive solution for aluminum profile manufacturers seeking to automate finishing processes, cut direct labor costs, and achieve new levels of production consistency and speed.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Slit Coil Handling & Packaging Line

Engineered for precision and efficiency in B2B metal processing environments, our integrated slit coil handling and packaging line streamulates post-slitting operations from transfer to shipment-ready preparation.

Streamlined End-to-End Automation

This complete system is designed for direct connection to your slitting line, automatically picking up coils via a turnstile arm. The process continues through automatic strapping—securing the coil through the ID and over the tail—and concludes with organized stacking on a skid for secure storage and shipment. This seamless flow eliminates manual bottlenecks.

Core System Advantages for Industrial Operations

  • Maximized Productivity: Significantly increases coil handling and packaging speed for higher throughput.
  • Superior Product Integrity: Protects sensitive coil surfaces and dramatically reduces handling-related damage.
  • Optimized Labor Utilization: Saves substantial man-power by automating repetitive, heavy-duty tasks.
  • Lower Total Cost of Ownership: Reduces maintenance time, frequency, and associated operational costs.

Enhanced Protection & Traceability

The system can be equipped with plastic stretch film wrapping, providing an essential barrier against dust and moisture for non-ferrous and high-finish coils. Designed with operational intelligence, it supports coil tracking through packing, weighing, and labeling stages, enabling seamless data integration for shop floor and stock control systems (MES/WMS).

Technical Specifications

Control: PC/PLC-based controller for user-friendly operation and programming.
Strapping: Automatic machines configured for secure coil ID strapping.
Packaging: Capable of stretch wrapping and pallet/skid stacking.
Design: Robust construction for reliable, low-maintenance performance in industrial settings.

Engineered Coil Packing and Storage Line Solutions for Industrial Operations

Fhope Group delivers precision-engineered, integrated coil packing and storage lines designed to optimize your B2B material handling logistics. We specialize in creating systems that seamlessly combine packing efficiency with secure, organized storage for steel and aluminum coils.

A Complete, Integrated System for Coil Logistics

Our solutions move beyond standalone equipment to offer a cohesive line that manages the coil from the end of the production process through to secure storage. This integrated approach minimizes handling, reduces damage risk, and maximizes floor space efficiency.

Core System Components

  • Coil Handling Equipment: Robust roll blocks and roll cradles designed for safe lifting, turning, and positioning.
  • Storage & Organization: Dedicated coil storage systems for slit coils, coil mats for floor protection, and structured racking for inventory management.

Tailored for Your Operational Requirements

Every facility has unique constraints and goals. We prioritize bespoke design, customizing the line layout, component selection, and automation level to align with your specific handling requirements, production volume, and spatial configuration. Our expertise in diverse logistics techniques ensures a solution that enhances your operational flow for both large master coils and smaller slit coils.

The Fhope Group Advantage

We are dedicated to crafting streamlined packaging experiences that account for intricate logistical elements. By partnering with Fhope Group, you gain a system engineered to protect your product integrity, improve safety, and provide a scalable foundation for your coil handling and storage needs.

Its floor-level interface allows for direct loading via standard pallet jacks or forklifts, making it ideal for equipment without integrated loading systems or for automating legacy machinery.

Beyond reliable and smooth operation, the exchanger incorporates advanced stabilization for handling sensitive loads like ceramics and glass. Its space-optimized design minimizes the machine's footprint while simplifying the entire pallet change process, reducing downtime and labor costs.

Decades of industry-specific design expertise inform our machinery and methodology. Our solutions directly address the critical vulnerabilities in panel product logistics—particularly damp environments and unprotected transit—that lead to product degradation, customer disputes, and financial loss.

Core System: Sealed Shrink Packaging

Our primary Shrinking Solution utilizes precision machinery to encapsulate panels in a tight, sealed plastic film. This process creates a robust, unitary package that is inherently waterproof and resistant to handling damage, ensuring products arrive in market-ready condition.

Tangible Business Outcomes

  • Elevated Product Presentation: Transition from basic bundling to consistent, professional packaging that enhances brand perception and value.
  • Dramatic Risk Reduction: Significantly lower incident rates of water damage, edge erosion, and surface marring, reducing claims and protecting margins.
  • Production Scalability: Our machinery integrates seamlessly to support and expand your production capacity with reliable, automated packaging.

Partner with Fhope to deploy a packaging system that functions as a strategic asset, safeguarding product integrity from your production floor to the end customer.

Automatic Cable Coiling Machine for Industrial Manufacturing

Streamline your cable production and packaging process with our advanced automatic coiling machine. Engineered for seamless B2B integration, this system automates precision coiling, cutting, and handling to boost throughput and ensure consistent output quality.

Complete Packaging Line Solution

Our automatic cable coiling machine performs core functions—calculating length, forming coils, and cutting—with high precision. For a fully automated, end-to-end packaging line, the system can be integrated with an optional strapping or wrapping unit. Choose between in-line models for direct connection to your cable extrusion line or off-line models for flexible, standalone operation.

Core Features & Operational Excellence

  • Automated Precision: The system automatically calculates cable length, winds it into uniform coils, and performs clean cuts.
  • Intelligent Control: All operational parameters are easily set via an English-language control program. The machine features automatic error detection, triggering immediate alarms to minimize downtime.
  • Superior Coil Integrity: Integrated sensors detect cable position for perfect winding start points, while precise tension control prevents deformation and ensures neat, stable coils.
  • Enhanced Productivity: Once a coil is complete, the machine automatically holds and transfers it to the next processing station, enabling continuous operation.

Seamless Production Line Integration

This machine is designed for successful integration into your existing cable manufacturing workflow. By connecting directly to your production line, it enables efficient in-line packaging, eliminating manual handling stages, reducing labor costs, and accelerating time-to-ship for your finished cable products.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Cable Coiling and Shrink-Wrapping Machine

Streamline your cable manufacturing and packaging process with our advanced, fully automated coiling and shrink-wrapping solution. Engineered for B2B industrial environments, this system enhances throughput, ensures consistency, and reduces labor costs by automating the final stages of cable production.

System Overview

This integrated system combines precision automatic coiling with subsequent shrink-wrapping in one seamless workflow. Designed for reliability and high-volume output, it features a robust PLC control system for complete automation.

Choose from two deployment configurations to best suit your production line:

  • Inline Model: For direct integration into a continuous cable extrusion or processing line.
  • Offline Model: A standalone unit for flexible, batch-based coiling and packaging operations.

Core Technology: Automatic Coiling Machine

The heart of the system performs with exceptional precision:

  • Automated Length Management: The system automatically calculates the required cable length, executes a perfect coil, and delivers a clean cut.
  • Intelligent Material Handling: Once coiled, the cable bundle is securely held and automatically transferred to the next stage—the integrated shrink-wrapping tunnel.
  • Precision Engineering: An adjustable coiling cabin ensures perfect coil formation for various Outer Diameters (OD), while programmable settings allow for quick changeovers between product runs.

Key Features for Industrial Performance

  • PLC & HMI ControlEnsures reliable, unattended operation with a user-friendly interface for supervisors.
  • English/Global InterfaceAll operational parameters are easily set and adjusted via the control program.
  • Adjustable Coiling ODAccommodates a broad range of cable types and thicknesses with quick changeover.
  • Programmable Cable LengthDelivers precise, consistent cut lengths for every coil, minimizing waste.
  • Dual Protective GuardsProvide safe fixation and smooth transfer of the coiled cable between stations.
  • Automatic Error DetectionMonitors system performance and triggers immediate alarms for any fault, preventing defective output and downtime.

Operational Benefits

By integrating coiling and shrink-wrapping, this system delivers significant competitive advantages:

  • Increased Line Efficiency: Eliminates manual handling between coiling and packaging stages.
  • Superior Package Consistency: Produces uniform, professional coils ready for retail or distribution.
  • Reduced Operational Costs: Lowers labor requirements and minimizes material errors.
  • Enhanced Scalability: Designed to keep pace with growing production demands in industrial settings.

Ideal for wire harness manufacturers, cable producers, and any B2B operation requiring high-speed, reliable cable finishing and packaging.

FCL-Y800: Automated Coiling & Strapping for Industrial Pipe Production

The FCL-Y800 Automatic Coiler is engineered for B2B manufacturers seeking to streamline the final stage of HDPE, PERT, and PEX pipe production. This robust system eliminates manual handling, ensuring uniform coil quality, secure strapping, and enhanced throughput for demanding industrial environments.

Core System Advantages

  • Boost Production Line Efficiency: Integrates seamlessly into existing extrusion lines for continuous, automated winding and bundling.
  • Ensure Bundle Consistency: Precision servo motors and encoder feedback guarantee tight, uniform coils every time, reducing waste and improving logistics.
  • Reduce Labor Costs & Fatigue: Fully automated operation from winding to strapping minimizes manual intervention and associated ergonomic risks.
  • Maximize Uptime: Built with industrial-grade components (PLC, solenoid valves, air cylinders) for reliable, low-maintenance performance in shift work.

Technical Specifications & Integration

Designed for seamless facility integration, the FCL-Y800 meets standard industrial utility requirements.

  • Machine Footprint: 4.5m L x 2.2m W x 2.1m H
  • Control Architecture: HMI + PLC + Servo Drive System
  • Power Supply: 220VAC / 50Hz / <3kW Total Load
  • Pneumatic Supply: 0.5 MPa, Consumption <1.0 m³/h

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Tube Coiling and Strapping Machine

Streamline your packaging line for short tubes and small-diameter products with our industrial-grade, CE-certified Automatic Tube Coiling and Strapping Machine. Engineered for reliability and precision in high-volume B2B environments, this system integrates advanced automation to enhance output consistency and operational efficiency.

Core Technology & Operation

The machine utilizes a robust Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) and an intuitive Human-Machine Interface (HMI) to manage all functions autonomously. A custom encoder accurately calculates tube length, enabling the system to automatically execute cutting, winding, and strapping sequences without manual input, ensuring repeatable results batch after batch.

Key Features for Industrial Performance

  • Precision Control: Servo motor-driven coiling and adjustable tension settings protect sensitive or soft tubing from deformation during processing.
  • Operational Flexibility: Quickly adapt to different product specs by adjusting coiling diameter (130-170mm) and cut length directly via the HMI.
  • Built-in Quality Assurance: Automated error detection halts operation and triggers an alarm in case of malfunctions, preventing waste and facilitating rapid maintenance.
  • Optimized Workflow: Features two dedicated working positions for sequential coiling and strapping, alongside sensor-based automatic tube positioning for seamless material handling.

Technical Specifications

  • Control System: PLC with HMI Touch Interface
  • Coiling Diameter Range: 130 - 170 mm (adjustable)
  • Strapping Points: 2 points simultaneously
  • Safety Certification: CE Standards
  • Error Management: Automatic detection with alarm
  • Primary Automation: Cutting, winding, strapping
  • Length Measurement: Custom encoder system
  • Material Handling: Sensor-guided positioning

This machine is designed as a turnkey solution to increase packaging throughput, reduce labor costs, and ensure bundle uniformity for manufacturers, distributors, and packaging service providers.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Pipe Capping Machine for Industrial Production Lines

Engineered for precision and durability, our automatic pipe capping machine integrates seamlessly into your manufacturing process to automate the final sealing stage, enhancing throughput and ensuring consistent end-cap quality.

Key Features for Manufacturing Efficiency

  • Production Line Integration: Designed as a modular component for continuous pipe production systems, minimizing bottlenecks.
  • Advanced Control System: Features a user-friendly Human-Machine Interface (HMI) and programmable Logic Controller (PLC) for precise operation and easy changeovers.
  • Robust Sensing & Actuation: Utilizes photoelectric sensors for accurate pipe positioning and reliable solenoid valves with pneumatic cylinders for high-speed capping.
  • Low Operational Cost: Energy-efficient design with under 300W power consumption and optimized air usage below 1.0 cubic meters per hour.
  • Built for Demanding Shifts: Constructed to perform reliably in a wide temperature range (-20°C to 45°C) and at altitudes up to 3000 meters.
  • Customizable Solutions: Available in custom colors and configurable for non-standard pipe diameters or specific production requirements.
  • Turnkey Service: We provide complete installation, calibration, and commissioning to ensure rapid deployment and immediate productivity gains.

Detailed Technical Specifications

Compatibility & Input

  • Pipe Diameter Range: 20-32 mm (Standard)
  • Custom Sizes: Available upon request
  • Standard Pipe Length: 3 meters or 4 meters
  • Length Tolerance: ±10 mm
  • Pipe Material: National standard size
  • Cap Specification: Injection molded, flash <4mm

Machine Performance & Control

  • Core Control: HMI + PLC System
  • Precision Sensing: Photoelectric Sensors
  • Actuation Mechanism: Solenoid Valves & Pneumatic Cylinders
  • Cap Feeding: Vibratory Bowl Feeder
  • Project Support: Full turnkey installation

Operational Environment

  • Design: For indoor industrial use
  • Operating Temperature: -20°C to +45°C
  • Maximum Altitude: 3000 meters
  • Power Supply: AC 220V (±10%), 50Hz, TNS Ground
  • Air Supply Pressure: 0.5 MPa
  • Avg. Power Consumption: < 300 Watts
  • Avg. Air Consumption: < 1.0 m³/h

Physical Dimensions

  • Machine Footprint (L x W x H): 5500 mm x 1200 mm x 1100 mm
  • Standard Finish: Light Yellow (RAL 1015)
  • Custom Colors: Available per client request

Ideal for Pipe Manufacturing & Processing Facilities

This machine is a critical component for businesses involved in the production of plastic, PVC, or metal pipes requiring end protection. It is designed to enhance line efficiency, reduce labor costs associated with manual capping, and ensure a uniform, secure finish on every product unit.

Contact our engineering team to discuss integrating this automatic capping solution into your production line, request detailed CAD layouts, or obtain a customized quotation for your specific pipe dimensions and output requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Tire Packaging Line

Transform your tire handling and distribution logistics with our fully integrated Automatic Tire Packaging Line. This turnkey automation solution is engineered for B2B manufacturers and distribution centers seeking to maximize throughput, ensure consistent package quality, and reduce labor costs.

System Overview

Our system seamlessly combines a horizontal tire wrapping machine with automated information reading, data transmission, and tire palletizing into a single, coherent workflow. It features automatic tire outer diameter (OD) detection and allows for quick, automated changeover of packaging materials. Every line is custom-designed to fit your facility's spatial constraints and meet specialized requirements for tire dimensions and supply chain data integration.

Core Features & Engineering Specifications

  • Robust Control & Safety: Built to CE standards utilizing premium, international brand electrical components for dependable operation.
  • Precision Control Interface: Centrally managed via a PLC and user-friendly touchscreen interface, providing complete control over the packaging process.
  • Seamless Line Integration: Designed to connect directly with your existing tire in-feed conveyor system for a continuous production flow.
  • Optimized Speed Management: Equipped with inverters for precise adjustment of ring, roller, and conveyor speeds to match production demands.
  • Automated Handling: Includes a dedicated stacking machine for efficient palletizing of packaged tires, ready for shipment or storage.
  • Proactive Diagnostics: System-wide indicator alarms and detailed error messages with specific codes enable rapid troubleshooting and minimize downtime.
  • Stable Wrapping Process: Incorporates supportive rollers that lift and stabilize the tire during the ring wrapping cycle, ensuring uniform package integrity.
  • Configurable Wrapping: The overlap rate of the wrapping film is fully adjustable to achieve the desired level of protection and material efficiency.

B2B Operational Benefits

This automated line is more than machinery; it's a strategic investment. It standardizes packaging quality, significantly increases output per shift, reduces physical strain on workers, and provides traceability through integrated data capture. The customizable nature of the system ensures it acts as a perfect fit within your broader manufacturing or logistics ecosystem, scaling to meet your specific tire sizes and information system requirements.

fullContentHtml:
MO-600 Fully Automatic Side Seal Shrinking Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale efficiency, the MO-600 is a fully automatic L-seal shrink wrapper designed to streamline high-volume packaging operations. It integrates seamlessly into production lines to automate feeding, conveying, bagging, sealing, and shrinking, significantly reducing labor costs and increasing output consistency for manufacturers, distributors, and contract packagers.

Core Technology & Precision Sealing

The machine utilizes a vertical-driven transverse cutter and a constant-temperature side sealing mechanism. This engineering ensures every package receives a straight, strong, and hermetic seal, critical for product protection during storage and transit. The thermostatic heating system provides consistent performance across various industry-standard shrink films, including POF.

Operational flexibility is built-in. Changeover between different packaging specifications is simplified via manual handwheel adjustments for height and width, minimizing downtime. The continuous-motion longitudinal seal allows for packaging products of virtually unlimited length, making it suitable for long, narrow, or irregularly shaped items.

Automation for Modern Production Lines

At the heart of the MO-600 is a reliable PLC control system. This ensures precise, repeatable operation cycles and enables straightforward integration with upstream and downstream automation equipment. By automating the entire pack cycle—from product infeed to final shrunk package—this machine enhances line speed, reduces human error, and optimizes floor space.

Ideal for Demanding B2B Applications

The MO-600 is the optimal solution for businesses requiring durable, secure, and professional packaging at high speeds. Its robust construction and intelligent design address key industrial needs: reliability, versatility, and total cost of ownership. It is an investment in packaging throughput and consistency for sectors including food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and hardware.

FP-250A Fully Automatic L-Bar Shrinking Machine

Engineered for B2B industrial packaging, the FP-250A is a servo-driven, fully automatic L-bar sealing machine built to optimize high-volume production lines. It delivers reliable, efficient shrink packaging with minimal operator intervention and rapid changeover capabilities.

Core Advantages for Production Efficiency

This machine transforms packaging operations by automating the sealing process. The integration of a servo motor drive guarantees high-speed, precise, and repeatable seals, maximizing throughput and reducing energy consumption. Its tool-less changeover system allows your line to adapt to new product dimensions in minutes, significantly boosting operational flexibility and reducing downtime.

Precision Engineering & Reliable Performance

The FP-250A is constructed with durability and consistent output in mind. The sealing knife features a Dupont Teflon coating on a high-temperature aluminum alloy base, ensuring a non-stick surface that eliminates seal contamination, cracking, and residue buildup. This results in pristine, professional-grade packaging every time.

Adaptable to Diverse Packaging Needs

Designed for versatility, the machine includes a manually adjustable feeding platform and film guide system to handle a wide range of product widths and heights. Its dedicated joint sealing function is ideal for securing small items, multi-packs, or promotional bundles. Compatibility with optional imported photoelectric sensors ensures accurate product detection and placement for complex packaging tasks.

Ideal Application

The FP-250A is the optimal solution for manufacturers, contract packagers, and distribution centers seeking to automate their end-of-line shrink wrapping process. It is suited for packaging a variety of rigid and semi-rigid products where speed, reliability, and clean presentation are critical.

FP-400LA+SH-450C Automated L-Bar Shrink Packaging System

Engineered for industrial production environments, the FP-400LA+SH-450C is a fully automatic L-Bar sealing and shrinking machine designed to optimize packaging line efficiency. This system enables reliable, high-speed, and unmanned operation, making it an ideal solution for businesses seeking to scale output and reduce labor costs.

Core Operational Advantages

The machine integrates seamlessly into mass production workflows. Its automatic film feeding system with a guide punch and manually adjustable membrane framework allows for quick changeovers between products of varying widths and heights. This eliminates downtime associated with changing molds or bag-making devices, ensuring continuous production flow.

Engineering & Reliability Features

  • Durable Sealing Mechanism: Features a Dupont Teflon-coated sealing bar paired with a high-temperature resistant aluminum alloy knife. This combination prevents film adhesion and ensures consistent, clean seals over extended operation periods.
  • Precision Sensing: Equipped with an imported photoelectric inspection system that accurately detects even thin or small goods, guaranteeing successful sealing and packaging for a wide range of product types.
  • Automated Material Handling: The system includes an automatic feeding mechanism driven by an induction motor, coupled with an automatic waste film winding unit. This maintains a clean workspace and reduces manual intervention.
  • Accurate Process Control: Utilizes a well-known Omron digital display temperature controller. This provides sensitive and accurate thermal management for the sealing process, allowing parameters to be precisely set and maintained for optimal film fusion.

Ideal Application Scope

This L-Bar machine is specifically designed for the efficient packaging of small products. Its corner sealing function creates a secure, professional package. The design is ideal for manufacturers in electronics, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and hardware, where rapid, reliable, and adaptable packaging is critical to meeting production targets and maintaining product integrity.

fullContentHtml:
FP-400LB+SH-450C L-Bar Shrinking Machine for Industrial Bundling

The FP-400LB+SH-450C is a fully automatic, L-type sealing and cutting machine engineered to optimize packaging lines for high-volume manufacturers. It specializes in the efficient and secure collective bundling of cylindrical products—such as bottles and cans—into standardized multi-packs (e.g., 1x5, 1x10, 2x5 configurations), delivering reliability for unattended, continuous operation.

Core Features & Engineering Benefits

Durable, Non-Stick Sealing Mechanism

The sealing knife is constructed from a high-temperature resistant aluminum alloy and coated with DuPont Teflon. This critical combination prevents film melt adhesion, reduces maintenance downtime, and guarantees a consistently clean and secure seal across extended production runs.

Precision Detection for Diverse Products

Integrated import-grade photoelectric sensors provide accurate product detection. This ensures reliable operation even with thin or small-diameter items, expanding the machine's application range and reducing product handling errors.

Automated Material Management System

A complete automation suite includes precision film feeding, a synchronized punching device, and an induction motor-driven waste rewind system. This integration minimizes manual input, maintains a clean workspace, and supports non-stop production flow.

Accurate & Programmable Thermal Control

At the heart of the system is a well-known brand Omron digital temperature controller. It offers sensitive and precise thermal management, allowing operators to set and maintain the exact temperature required for optimal seal strength with various film types.

Built-In Operator & Machine Safety

The sealing knife is equipped with an automatic protection function coupled with an audible/visual alarm system. This proactive safety design helps prevent accidents and protects the machine's components from potential damage due to operational anomalies.

Seamless Production Line Integration

Designed for modern smart factories, this machine is built to connect seamlessly with upstream and downstream equipment, enabling fully unmanned operation within a continuous production and packaging line.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: FP-400LB+SH-450C
  • Machine Type: Automatic L-Bar Sealing & Cutting
  • Primary Application: Collective Bundling of Cylindrical Objects
  • Standard Configurations: 1x5, 1x10, 2x5 Packs
  • Sealing Knife Coating: DuPont Teflon
  • Knife Construction: High-Temp Aluminum Alloy
  • Control System: Omron Digital Temperature Controller
  • Sensing System: Import Photoelectric Sensor
  • Key Automation Features: Auto Film Feed, Punching, & Waste Rewind
  • Operational Mode: Designed for Unattended Production Line Integration

B2B Application Summary

The FP-400LB+SH-450C L-Bar Shrinking Machine is a robust industrial solution for businesses seeking to automate and scale their secondary packaging process for cylindrical goods. It combines precision engineering, reliable automation, and critical safety features to reduce labor costs, increase line efficiency, and ensure consistent package quality in high-output environments.

fullContentHtml:
SK-060ABS Automatic Sleeve Type Shrink Bundling Machine

Engineered for industrial packaging efficiency, the SK-060ABS is a fully automatic shrink bundling solution designed to integrate seamlessly into high-speed production lines. It eliminates manual intervention from feeding to cooling, ensuring consistent throughput and secure packaging for single products without under-support.

Core Features for Industrial Performance

  • Uninterrupted Automation: Achieve end-to-line packaging automation with synchronized feeding, wrapping, sealing, shrinking, and freezing stages, minimizing labor costs and bottlenecks.
  • Configuration Flexibility: Rapidly adapt to changing production needs with multiple pre-set bundling patterns (1x10, 2x5, 3x3, 3x4, 3x5, etc.) and support for multi-line setups.
  • Precision Engineering: Combines world-class craftsmanship with a Siemens PLC-based control system for unmatched reliability, safety, and operational precision.
  • Vibration-Free Operation: The worm gear reducer ensures smooth, stable product and film handling, protecting product integrity and reducing wear.
  • Secure Sealing Technology: A dedicated sealer delivers robust, reliable seals that withstand handling and shipping, reducing product damage and returns.

Technical Specifications & Integration

The SK-060ABS is built for seamless B2B integration. Its electro-mechanical-pneumatic system, governed by an advanced programmable controller, allows for quick changeovers between packaging formats via a simple rotary switch. This machine is ideal for manufacturers in food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, and consumer goods seeking to enhance packaging line speed, flexibility, and reliability.

Primary Advantage: Increase your packaging line's output and consistency while reducing operational complexity and manual labor dependency. The SK-060ABS is a scalable solution designed to grow with your production demands.

fullContentHtml:
180-Degree Pallet Inverter System

Engineered to revolutionize your warehouse material handling, the 180-Degree Pallet Inverter is an essential component for modern, efficient logistics systems. This system seamlessly integrates into tray-less loading processes, solving a critical bottleneck in pallet transfer operations.

Core Operational Advantage

By rotating the load unit a full 180 degrees, this inverter allows you to preserve valuable internal trays or containers while transferring the entire load onto a rackable pallet. This process effectively doubles loading speed compared to manual methods, eliminating a major productivity constraint. It is the ideal solution for operations where products are received on non-standard pallets and must be efficiently transferred for storage or shipment.

Key Features & Engineering Benefits

  • Premium Componentry: Utilizes renowned brand-name components in critical areas, ensuring system reliability, reduced downtime, and long-term performance.
  • Eliminates Manual Handling: Prevents the inefficient and hazardous manual accumulation and transfer of goods, significantly improving workplace safety and reducing labor costs.
  • Adjustable Press System: Features adaptable press plates to securely handle a wide range of packaging sizes and load heights, ensuring stability during inversion.
  • Solid-State Construction: Built with a solid structural frame and durable designs to withstand the rigors of daily industrial use, providing a high return on investment.
  • Self-Contained Electrical Unit: Houses all controls in a separate enclosure for enhanced operational safety, streamlined technical validation, and simplified fault diagnosis.
  • Modular Rotation Speed: The inverter's rotation speed can be precisely modulated, allowing operators to tailor the cycle to delicate or stable loads.
  • Smooth Cycle Control: Incorporates soft start and stop functionality with an automatic stop position, preventing load shift and protecting product integrity.
  • Comprehensive Safety Systems: Includes both mechanical blocks and electrical safety interlocks to guarantee secure operation and comply with industrial safety standards.
  • Advanced Control Interface: Operated via a centralized control panel, enabling easy integration, operator training, and process control.

Technical Specifications

  • Rotation Angle: 180°
  • Operation Type: Automated Pallet Transfer/Inversion
  • Load Capacity: Model-Dependent (Customizable)
  • Control System: PLC-Based with Manual Override
  • Key Safety Features: Mechanical Safety Locks, Electrical Interlocks, Emergency Stop
  • Power Supply: Standard Industrial (Configurable)
  • Frame: Heavy-Duty Welded Steel Construction
  • Primary Application: Transfer between disposable and permanent pallets, load recovery, repalletizing.

Ideal For Manufacturing & Distribution

This system is perfectly suited for environments where products are manually palletized at the destination point. It automates the final transfer step, ensuring loads are securely placed on the correct pallet type for automated storage and retrieval systems (AS/RS), racking, or further transportation, thereby streamlining the entire supply chain link.

fullContentHtml:
SK-060CBS Fully Automatic Sleeve Shrinking Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale efficiency, the SK-060CBS automatic sleeve shrinking machine delivers reliable, high-speed packaging for single or multiple cylinder products. Its seamless integration and robust automation eliminate manual handling, optimizing your production line for maximum throughput and consistency.

Core Engineering & Performance Features

Built with precision workmanship and leading global technology, the SK-060CBS is designed for operational safety and long-term reliability in demanding B2B environments.

  • Advanced Control System: Centralized automation via a Siemens PLC and programmable controller, integrating electrical, mechanical, and pneumatic components into one responsive system.
  • Adaptable Packaging Configurations: Easily pack products in two, three, or four lines with optional under-support. Change packing formats instantly using the rotating mode switch to meet varying production demands.
  • Stable Motion Control: The worm gear reducer ensures perfectly smooth, vibration-free in-feeding and film feeding, critical for maintaining seal integrity and product alignment.
  • Superior Sealing Technology: A specialized sealer with a Teflon coating guarantees secure, durable seals that resist accidental opening and prevent film sticking, minimizing downtime.
  • Durable Conveyor System: Constructed from high-abrasion PE material, the conveyor withstands continuous operation, reducing maintenance needs and extending component life.

Streamlined Automated Workflow

This machine is engineered for complete hands-off operation. It automatically manages the entire process—feeding, wrapping, sealing, shrinking, and cooling—connecting directly to your existing line to create a seamless, efficient packaging cell that boosts output and reduces labor costs.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: SK-060CBS
  • Operation Mode: Fully Automatic
  • Packaging Type: Sleeve Packing for Single/Multiple Cylinders
  • Control System: Siemens PLC & Programmable Controller
  • Line Configuration: Adjustable for 2, 3, or 4 Lines
  • Drive Mechanism: Worm Gear Reducer
  • Sealer Technology: Specialized with Teflon Coating
  • Conveyor Material: High-Abrasion Polyethylene (PE)
  • Integration: Designed for Inline Production Connection

The SK-060CBS is the strategic solution for businesses seeking to enhance packaging line productivity, ensure consistent seal quality, and achieve a rapid return on investment through robust, low-maintenance automation.

SK-060EBS Fully Automatic Shrink Bundling Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale secondary packaging, the SK-060EBS automates the carton stacking and shrink bundling process to create stable, secure unit loads for storage and distribution. This system integrates directly into your production line to automate feeding, wrapping, sealing, and shrinking, eliminating manual handling and boosting palletizing efficiency.

Core Features for Industrial Packaging

  • End-to-End Automation: Executes the complete bundling cycle—feeding, wrapping, sealing, shrinking, and cooling—without manual intervention, ensuring consistent output and labor savings.
  • Advanced Control System: Built around a Siemens PLC and programmable controller, unifying electrical, mechanical, and pneumatic components into a single, reliable, and easily managed system.
  • Rapid-Change Flexibility: Configure the machine for two, three, four, or more packing lines, with optional under-support. Switch packing formats instantly using the rotary selector switch to accommodate different production runs.
  • Precision Drive System: The worm gear reducer guarantees smooth, vibration-free operation during carton in-feed and film dispensing, critical for maintaining bundle alignment and integrity at high speeds.
  • High-Performance Sealing: A specialized sealer with a Teflon coating produces strong, secure seals that are difficult to open accidentally and prevents film residue buildup, minimizing maintenance and downtime.

B2B Operational Benefits

The SK-060EBS is built for manufacturing and distribution centers requiring robust, unattended operation. It transforms packed cartons into uniform, tightly wrapped bundles that are easier to handle, palletize, and ship, reducing product damage and improving warehouse logistics. Its programmable logic and robust construction ensure high uptime and a rapid return on investment in high-volume environments.

  • Line Integration Ready: Designed to connect directly with existing tape production or collating lines for automatic tower or flat packing.
  • Durable Sealing System: Features a robust, alloy sealer with a non-stick Teflon coating, supported by four columns for reliable, consistent seals and lower operational costs.
  • Premium Control System: Utilizes a Siemens PLC, intuitive color touch screen, and Omron temperature controllers for precise, user-friendly operation and minimal downtime.
  • Space-Optimized Design: A compact machine structure delivers high efficiency without consuming valuable factory floor space.

fullContentHtml:
SK-075D Automatic Shrink Bundling Machine

Engineered for industrial packaging lines, the SK-075D automates the secondary bundling process, securely grouping multiple boxes into single, shippable units. This machine enhances pallet stability, reduces material handling, and significantly increases output for manufacturers, distributors, and third-party logistics (3PL) providers.

Primary Application

The SK-075D is specifically designed for the collective packing and bundling of boxes equipped with hook eyes. It is ideal for creating stable, multi-unit packs for secure transport and storage, commonly used in industries such as food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, and consumer goods.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Boost Line Efficiency: Achieve consistent bundling speeds of up to 12 packs per minute, eliminating manual tying or taping bottlenecks.
  • Ensure Shipment Integrity: The sleeve sealing method applies uniform heat for a tight, conforming bundle that minimizes shifting during transit.
  • Reduce Operational Costs: Automate a labor-intensive process, allowing staff to be redeployed to higher-value tasks while using standard PE film.
  • Maximize Uptime: Industrial 3-phase power and a robust pneumatic system ensure reliable performance for multi-shift operations.
  • Simplify Integration: The adjustable working height and variable speed conveyor allow for seamless integration into existing packaging lines.

fullContentHtml:
SK-080E Automatic Sleeve Shrinking Machine

The SK-080E is a professional-grade, fully automatic sleeve shrinking machine engineered for high-volume packaging of long, rigid products such as floor panels, rectangular tubes, and similar industrial goods. It delivers complete product encapsulation via a robust bottom lap sealing method.

Core Technology & Design

Built with precision engineering and superior craftsmanship, the SK-080E ensures reliable, safe, and continuous operation for demanding production schedules. Its integrated system, centered on a Siemens PLC, synchronizes all electrical, mechanical, and pneumatic components into a single, efficient control unit.

Operational Advantages for Manufacturing

  • Production Line Flexibility: Easily adapt to packaging requirements for two, three, or four product lines, with or without under-support. Changeover is achieved simply by rotating a selector switch, minimizing downtime.
  • Precision Handling: The worm gear reducer eliminates vibration during critical in-feed and film feeding stages, ensuring precise product positioning and consistent film application.
  • Durable Sealing & Conveyance: A specialized sealer with a Teflon coating produces strong, secure seals while preventing film adhesion. The high-abrasion-resistant PE conveyor withstands heavy use, reducing wear and maintenance costs.

Automated Workflow

The SK-080E manages the entire packaging process autonomously: product in-feed, film wrapping, secure sealing, controlled shrinking, and final cooling. This end-to-end automation enhances line speed, reduces labor costs, and guarantees uniform packaging quality for every unit.

Industrial Door Shrink Wrap Packaging Machine

Engineered for manufacturing and distribution centers, our industrial door shrink wrap machine delivers a flawless, tight package that enhances product protection and elevates brand presentation at the point of sale.

Precision Edge Finishing

Our machine incorporates two vertical press rolls that actively compress the film on both sides of the door panel immediately after shrinking. This critical step eliminates loose film and creates a crisp, professional edge, transforming the packaged door into a premium display-ready product.

Engineered for Reliability & Control

Intuitive HMI Operation

All machine parameters and settings are programmed into a centralized Human-Machine Interface (HMI). This simplifies operation, ensures consistency, and provides clear visual error alerts for immediate troubleshooting, minimizing downtime.

Robust Construction

We utilize a solid steel pole to house the import-grade silicon rubber heating tube, ensuring even heat distribution and longevity. The chain-pole type transportation system is built for heavy-duty cycles and continuous operation.

Adaptable & Efficient Process

Conveyor chains can be specified in different materials to suit specific product requirements. The integrated cooling fan rapidly solidifies the shrunk film, allowing for quick handling and palletizing, which accelerates your overall packaging line throughput.

B2B Application & Value

This machine is designed for high-volume production environments, delivering a consistently beautiful pack finish that adds tangible value. Its versatile design accommodates a wide range of door and rigid panel types, making it a strategic investment for manufacturers seeking to improve efficiency, reduce labor costs, and enhance product presentation in the B2B marketplace.

The FPSH-B100 is a precision-engineered, automated shrink wrapping machine designed for B2B manufacturers of profiles, boards, window frames, and door components.   • Precision & Consistency: Equipped with photoelectric sensing for accurate product positioning, guaranteeing uniform seal placement and packaging quality on every unit.
  • Operational Flexibility: Offers both automatic and manual feed-in modes, providing adaptability for varying production volumes and line configurations.
  • Cost-Effective Material Use: Utilizes standard PE or POF roll film, with the system automatically sealing three sides to optimize film usage and reduce waste.
  • Configurable Design: Modular components allow for specific machine collocations to meet the exact dimensions and throughput demands of different products.
  • Broad Material Compatibility: Features a constant-temperature heat sealing and cutting system rated for industrial-standard shrink films including PE, PVC, and POF.

Automatic Pipe Capping and Bag Packing Machine

Streamline your post-extrusion process with a fully automated solution for capping and packaging plastic pipes. This integrated machine is engineered for B2B manufacturing environments, designed to boost packaging line efficiency, ensure consistent product presentation, and reduce manual labor dependency.

Core Functionality

This system performs two critical functions in sequence: applying protective end caps to pipes and then automatically loading them into woven bags. It is specifically engineered for online automatic bagging directly from your extrusion line, creating a seamless flow from production to palletizing.

Technical Specifications & Applications

  • Compatible Materials: Ideal for rigid and semi-rigid plastic pipes including PVC, PPR, and PE.
  • Diameter Range: Efficiently handles straight pipes with diameters from 100 mm (4") up to 300 mm (12").
  • Line Integration: We provide customized packaging solutions tailored to match your output, whether from single, double, or four-tube extrusion equipment.

Key Engineering Features

Robust & Reliable Design

Built with industrial-grade components for simple, stable operation and minimal maintenance, ensuring maximum uptime.

Secure Bag Handling

A stable clamping device, powered by 0.15Mpa air pressure, guarantees woven bags are held firmly throughout the loading cycle without loosening.

Operational Flexibility

Features a height-adjustable storage device and tool-less adjustments for quick changeovers between different pipe dimensions and production runs.

Precision Packaging

The end-of-structure design with a 1000mm working width provides precise alignment for consistent bag placement and loading.

Secure Closure

Utilizes a sewing thread mechanism at the bag mouth, providing a strong, tamper-evident seal that protects the product during storage and transit.

B2B Operational Benefits

  • Increase Throughput: Automate a labor-intensive process to achieve higher packaging speeds consistent with extrusion output.
  • Reduce Labor Costs: Minimize manual handling, lowering long-term operational expenses and reducing ergonomic risks.
  • Ensure Packaging Consistency: Achieve uniform, professional bagging and capping for every pipe, enhancing brand presentation.
  • Optimize Line Integration: A customized solution ensures smooth compatibility with your existing extrusion and material handling systems.

fullContentHtml:
Enterprise Data Encryption for Modern Infrastructure

Safeguard critical business data across hybrid environments with a cryptographic solution engineered for enterprise scale, performance, and compliance mandates.

Core Value Proposition

Our encryption platform eliminates the trade-off between robust security and operational agility. By providing transparent, policy-driven encryption, IT and security teams can protect sensitive assets—including PII, financial records, and IP—without disrupting business workflows or application performance.

The solution is designed for seamless integration into existing technology stacks, offering centralized management that reduces administrative overhead and ensures consistent enforcement of data security policies across the entire organization.

Addressing Critical Business Challenges

  • Regulatory & Compliance Risk: Meet stringent data protection requirements with validated cryptography and comprehensive audit trails.
  • Data Breach Mitigation: Render stolen data unusable, significantly reducing the financial and reputational impact of a security incident.
  • Cloud & Digital Transformation: Enable secure migration to cloud and containerized environments with consistent data protection controls.
  • Operational Complexity: Unify encryption management across disparate systems through a single pane of glass.

Technical Architecture & Integration

Built on a modular, API-first architecture, our encryption software integrates directly with your identity management, security monitoring, and IT automation tools. This facilitates automated policy enforcement and embeds data security into the DevOps lifecycle (DevSecOps).

For IT Infrastructure Teams

Deploy fleet-wide via existing configuration management tools. Gain granular control over encryption for databases (SQL/NoSQL), network-attached storage, and virtualized or containerized workloads with minimal performance impact.

For Security & Compliance Teams

Establish a verifiable chain of custody for all protected data. Generate compliance-ready reports and leverage detailed logs for forensic analysis and real-time threat detection within your SIEM.

Next Steps for Enterprise Deployment

Contact our solutions architecture team for a customized proof-of-concept, detailed compliance mapping, or to discuss volume licensing and enterprise support agreements tailored to your organization's scale and requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Pallet Transformers - Series B: Revolutionizing Industrial Load Handling

Engineered for precision and efficiency in demanding B2B logistics environments, the Series B Pallet Transformers represent a significant leap in material handling technology. This system is specifically designed to streamline operations involving lightweight but voluminous loads, addressing common pain points in warehouse and distribution workflows.

Core Operational Advantage

The defining feature of the Series B is its 180-degree rotational capability. This allows operators to seamlessly substitute an external pallet with an internal one, facilitating rapid pallet exchange without disrupting the load integrity. This process is critical in cross-docking, returns processing, and quality control stations.

Furthermore, the system's innovative design enables the complete inversion of a base load. This is particularly valuable for inspecting or replacing compromised lower units in a stack—a task that traditionally required complete disassembly and re-palletizing. The Series B executes this in a single, controlled motion, dramatically reducing labor time and risk of product damage.

Technical Specifications & Design

  • Series Designation: B
  • Primary Mechanism: Dual-Clamp Turbine System for secure, balanced grip
  • Load Profile: Optimized for lightweight, high-stack configurations common in consumer goods, packaging, and apparel.
  • Key Benefit: Eliminates the inefficient and costly step of unloading cargo solely to change its pallet or access the bottom layer.

B2B Applications & ROI

Implementing Series B Pallet Transformers translates directly into operational cost savings and increased throughput. By minimizing touch points and manual handling, businesses experience:

  • Reduced labor costs associated with pallet switching and load manipulation.
  • Lower rates of load damage and product loss during handling.
  • Enhanced workflow velocity in sorting, returns processing, and pallet retrieval operations.
  • Improved worker safety by automating heavy and repetitive manipulation tasks.

The Series B is an investment in lean logistics, designed to integrate seamlessly into automated or semi-automated material handling systems, providing a reliable and efficient solution for modern supply chain challenges.

Industrial Roll Shrink Wrapping Machine for B2B Packaging

FHOPE provides industrial packaging solutions designed to meet the specific challenges of manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers of roll-based products. Our engineering team collaborates with B2B clients to identify and solve core packaging pain points, from transit damage to inefficient storage.

Addressing Critical Industrial Packaging Needs

A common requirement across sectors like flooring, textiles, and paper goods is the need for a robust, waterproof protective package. Our industrial roll shrink wrapping machine is engineered precisely for this purpose, providing a complete automated solution for sealing and protecting cylindrical products.

Machine Process & Operational Benefits

The machine automates the entire packaging sequence: it wraps the roll product in a protective film, creates a secure seal on all sides, and applies heat to shrink the film taut. This results in a tight, stable, and professional package.

  • Superior Product Protection: The finished package is waterproof, dustproof, and guards against abrasion, significantly reducing claims for in-transit damage.
  • Enhanced Brand Presentation: Delivers a consistent, high-quality finish that reflects professionalism to your B2B customers and end-users.
  • Logistics Optimization: The compact, shrunken package dramatically decreases the space required for warehousing and transportation. This density increase can lead to substantial savings on storage and freight costs, with some clients reporting a reduction in related expenses by up to 50%.
  • Extended Application Range: While ideal for carpet, fabric, and paper rolls, this system is also effectively deployed for packaging yoga mats, drapery textiles, toweling, and other rolled goods.

Engineered for Reliability & Integration

Built for continuous operation in industrial environments, our roll shrink wrapping machines are designed for seamless integration into existing production or dispatch lines, enhancing throughput and packaging consistency while reducing labor dependency.

Ready to optimize your roll product packaging line?

By automating the bundling process, it eliminates manual bottlenecks, creates uniform, secure cases that minimize load shifting, and directly contributes to lower overall cost-per-shipped unit. The result is enhanced economic value through improved throughput and reduced transit damage.

The advanced shrink tunnel, with its precisely controlled airflow and cooling, guarantees a tight, professional-grade bundle finish. Every component is selected for durability to maximize uptime and return on investment in a 24/7 production setting.

For bottlers aiming to scale output and optimize packaging logistics, FHOPE's automatic bundling machine represents a strategic investment in operational excellence and supply chain resilience.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Sleeve Shrink Packaging Machine for Bottled Water

FHOPE's sleeve shrink packaging machine delivers a robust, cost-effective secondary packaging solution for beverage producers. This system is engineered to bundle multi-packs of water bottles into a secure, stable unit for distribution.

Precision Sleeve Packaging Technology

The 'sleeve' method involves applying a band of shrink film around a grouped set of bottles. After sealing and cutting, this film band is conveyed through a heat tunnel, where controlled shrinkage creates a high-tension, tamper-evident sleeve that locks the bottles together at their contact points.

Engineered for Load Stability & Security

A primary concern in multi-pack packaging is load stability. Our machine's thermal profile and film tension control are calibrated to ensure the shrunk film contracts firmly around the bottle group's 'corners,' creating a balanced matrix of force. This prevents bottle movement, eliminates scatter, and ensures the pack remains intact through rigorous supply chain handling.

Operational & Cost Benefits for Manufacturers

  • Reduced Material Costs: The sleeve design uses significantly less film than full-body wraparound, lowering per-unit packaging costs.
  • Enhanced Line Efficiency: High-speed operation and reliable performance minimize downtime, supporting continuous production targets.
  • Improved Sustainability Profile: Material reduction directly decreases packaging waste and can contribute to sustainability goals.
  • Market-Ready Presentation: Produces a clean, professional pack that allows for full bottle label visibility and can accommodate promotional sleeve printing.

Ideal for High-Volume Bottling Lines

This machine is built for integration into automated B2B bottling environments. Its durable construction, precise controls, and configurable design make it a reliable component for securing productivity and protecting product quality from production floor to point of sale.

Industrial Sofa Shrink Wrap Machine for Furniture Manufacturers

FHOPE delivers specialized packaging solutions for the wood and furniture industry. Our engineering team dedicates extensive research to the unique challenges of furniture manufacturing, resulting in robust, industry-informed equipment like our advanced sofa shrink wrap machine.

Engineered for Industrial Furniture Packaging

Informed by the processes of global industry leaders, our machine design incorporates proven methodologies for superior product protection and packaging efficiency.

Dual-Layer Protective Wrapping System

This industrial machine utilizes a two-stage wrapping process to ensure maximum furniture protection for shipping and storage:

  • Primary Protective Layer: Automatically applies bubble film to safeguard against drops, collisions, scratches, and surface damage during handling and transit.
  • Secondary Stabilizing Layer: Applies a shrinkable PE film (or other specified material) that contracts to form a tight, compressed, and secure final package, immobilizing the contents.

B2B Benefits & Operational Advantages

Integrating this system into your production line significantly enhances product integrity. The automated process ensures consistent, high-quality packaging that reduces in-transit damage, minimizes returns, and protects your brand's reputation. The tight, compressed packages also optimize space utilization in containers and warehouses, lowering logistics costs.

Industry Application: Designed for furniture manufacturers, warehouse distributors, and logistics centers requiring reliable, high-volume packaging for delicate and bulky items.

Industrial Pallet Shrink Wrap Machine with Integrated Heat Tunnel

Streamline your shipping and storage operations with a fully automated pallet shrink wrapping system. This integrated solution combines automatic sealing with a precision heat tunnel to create durable, secure, and professional pallet loads, optimizing your supply chain for efficiency and product protection.

Core Operational Advantages

The machine automates the entire packaging sequence: conveying the pallet, sealing the film, and uniformly shrinking it via a controlled heat tunnel. This process creates a tight, conforming second skin that stabilizes the load and fully displays the product for immediate identification.

The resulting package provides a robust seal against moisture, dust, and pollutants, significantly reducing in-transit damage and product loss. The tamper-evident nature of the wrap also enhances security, deterring pilferage.

Engineered for Industrial Performance

Designed as a standalone unit, this system integrates conveying, heating, film fitting, and cooling into one continuous, efficient operation. It features automatic temperature control and a thermal circulating air system for consistent, energy-efficient heat application that minimizes film waste.

With adjustable speed controls, the machine synchronizes seamlessly with your production or warehouse line pace, maintaining stable operation. The integrated high-capacity cooling system ensures the load is stabilized and ready for immediate handling or movement post-shrink, maximizing throughput.

B2B Impact & ROI

  • Reduce Operational Costs: Lower labor requirements versus manual wrapping and decrease material usage through consistent, optimized film application.
  • Minimize Product Damage: Protect your goods from environmental factors and shifting during logistics, leading to fewer claims and returns.
  • Enhance Logistics Efficiency: Create stable, uniform pallets that are safer to stack, store, and transport, optimizing warehouse and trailer space.
  • Improve Brand Professionalism: Deliver customer and retail shipments with a clean, secure, and branded appearance that reinforces quality.
