fullContentHtml:
FPW-300 Automated Wire Coil Wrapping Machine

FHOPE's FPW-300 series sets the industrial standard for automated wire coil packaging. This precision-engineered machinery is designed to integrate seamlessly into your production line, enhancing efficiency, ensuring product integrity during transit and storage, and delivering significant operational cost savings.

Engineered for Precision and Flexibility

The FPW-300 utilizes advanced eye-core wrapping technology, providing a secure and consistent wrap for coils of varying specifications. Its core strength lies in its adaptability; the system can be precisely tailored to meet unique customer specifications and integrate with diverse packaging line configurations.

Data-Driven Automated Operation

Operators manually input critical coil data as coils enter the system. This data informs the machine's automated handling and wrapping decisions, creating a streamlined, intelligent packaging process. Key input parameters include:

  • Coil Dimensions: Outer Diameter (OD), Inner Diameter (ID), and Width
  • Coil Weight for handling calibration
  • Process Requirements: Target wrapping speed and number of layers
  • Customer/Order ID for traceability and batch control

Advanced Control & Integration

At the heart of the FPW-300 is a robust PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) and HMI (Human-Machine Interface) system. The intuitive touch-screen interface allows for effortless operation, including:

  • Real-time viewing of machine status and coil data
  • Easy modification of wrapping parameters for different product runs
  • Simple entry and management of coil specifications

This intelligent control system translates coil information into precise automated actions, optimizing the entire coil packaging line for maximum throughput and reliability.

Business Value Proposition

The FPW-300 is more than a wrapper; it's a strategic investment in your packaging logistics. It reduces labor costs, minimizes material waste through precise application, protects product quality, and provides the scalability needed for growing industrial operations. Contact FHOPE to discuss how the FPW-300 can be configured for your specific coil packaging challenges.

fullContentHtml:
Engineered Stretch Hood Film for Industrial Pallet Packaging

Maximize the efficiency and reliability of your automated stretch hood system with our technically formulated films. We provide material science solutions tailored to your specific machine parameters and packaging objectives.

Request a Machine-Specific Sample for Testing

To engineer the optimal film formula for your operation, please provide the following details. Our technical team will prepare tailored samples.

  • Stretch Hood Machine Brand & Model: Ensures compatibility with force, stretch, and sealing mechanisms.
  • Machine Series Number: Allows for precise calibration to equipment specifications.
  • Factory Climate Conditions: Informs formulation for temperature, humidity, and static control.
  • Standard Pallet Dimensions & Load Profile: Critical for determining film gauge, width, and strength requirements.
  • Required Line Speed (pallets/hour): Determines film memory, cling, and elongation properties for high-speed stability.

Comparative Analysis: Stretch Hood vs. Alternative Pallet Packaging Methods

Performance MetricStretch Hood FilmShrink WrappingSpiral Stretch Wrap
Packaging Strength & Stability★★★★★
Superior 5-side hold, high puncture resistance.		★★★
Good containment, can be prone to tearing.		★★★
Good load retention, dependent on wrap pattern.
Energy Consumption★
Cold stretch process; minimal energy use.		★★★★★
Requires significant heat for shrinking.		★★★
Motor-driven rotation consumes power.
Material Reloading FrequencyFewest
Large roll size maximizes uptime.		Few
Moderate roll size.		Many
Frequent roll changes required.
Process AutomationFully Automated
Integrated, hands-free palletizing line solution.		Semi to Fully Automated
Often requires manual L-sealer or tunnel handling.		Semi to Fully Automated
Commonly automated but may need top-sheet for weatherproofing.
Weather & Water ResistanceFully Waterproof
Tight seal provides complete environmental barrier.		Fully Waterproof
Shrunk skin provides good protection.		Not Inherently Waterproof
Gaps between film layers allow moisture ingress.
Typical Max Line Speed~200 Pallets/Hour
High-speed capability for demanding logistics.		~100 Pallets/Hour
Limited by heat tunnel cycle time.		~100 Pallets/Hour
Limited by rotation speed and stability.

Technical & Operational Benefits Summary

Stretch hood film represents the advanced evolution of pallet packaging, offering a combination of operational efficiency, cost savings, and load integrity that is critical for modern supply chains. Its cold-application process eliminates the energy overhead of shrink systems, while its superior mechanical properties reduce film usage and waste compared to traditional stretch wrap. The fully enclosed, waterproof hood is ideal for outdoor storage and long-distance shipping, reducing product damage and claims. For businesses investing in automated palletizing lines, it is the high-performance, high-reliability sealing solution designed to protect your product and your bottom line.

Automatic Wire Coil Packaging Line

The core line features a dual-station wrapping system for both film and paper packaging, complete with synchronized infeed and outfeed conveyors. Its modular architecture allows for the future addition of an automatic coil strapping machine and a coil stacker & pallet wrapping machine, enabling a complete, unmanned packaging cell.

Every line is custom-engineered based on your specific coil dimensions (size and weight), chosen packaging materials, and required output speeds. We design the system layout to fit precisely within your existing factory space and material flow.

Technical Features & Specifications

  • Custom-Designed Machinery: Each component is specified and built to handle your unique coil profiles and packaging requirements.
  • Flexible Layout Integration: The entire line is configured to adapt to your plant's layout, ensuring optimal use of space and seamless connection with upstream production.
  • High-Speed Automation: The system is engineered to eliminate gaps in the packaging process, achieving the high-speed, consistent output necessary for unattended operation.
  • End-to-End Solution: From receiving individual coils to producing strapped, wrapped, and palletized loads ready for shipment.

Operational Benefits

This automated line transforms your packaging operations by significantly reducing manual labor, enhancing packaging consistency and quality, and increasing overall line throughput. The closed-loop, automated process ensures reliability and prepares your operation for Industry 4.0 standards.

fullContentHtml:
VCI Stretch Film for Industrial Metal Protection

Our VCI Stretch Film is an engineered pre-stretched film designed specifically for the volatile corrosion inhibition (VCI) of metal products during storage and transportation. It represents the culmination of advanced VCI film technology, providing a superior sealed-wrap barrier against moisture and corrosive elements.

Core Industrial Applications

This film is the optimal solution for packaging steel coils, metal rings, loop components, long perch stock, and strip metal products. It delivers a tight, secure, and corrosion-resistant wrap that is essential for maintaining product integrity through extended warehousing and complex logistics chains.

Packaging & Operational Efficiency

Engineered for flexibility in high-volume environments, our VCI Stretch Film is compatible with both manual wrapping stations and fully automated packaging machinery. In steel service centers and manufacturing facilities, it is used to encapsulate entire metal products, forming a protective shield against atmospheric humidity and contaminants.

Storage & Handling Protocols

To ensure maximum efficacy and shelf life, film rolls must be stored in a dry, shaded, and cool environment with their original protective packaging kept tightly sealed. Maintaining the integrity of the original packaging prior to use is critical for preserving the film's volatile corrosion-inhibiting properties and ensuring long-lasting protection for your metal assets after they leave the factory.

Summary of Benefits

VCI Stretch Film is the definitive choice for cost-effective, reliable corrosion protection in metal processing and distribution. It provides a critical layer of defense, ensuring your products arrive at their destination in pristine, corrosion-free condition, thereby reducing claims, rejects, and total cost of ownership.

fullContentHtml:
VCI Stretch Film for Industrial Metal Protection

Engineered for B2B and industrial applications, VCI Stretch Film is an advanced pre-stretched packaging solution that integrates volatile corrosion inhibiting (VCI) technology directly into a high-performance stretch film. This consumable is designed to safeguard metal products from corrosion during storage and transportation, providing a cost-effective and efficient protective barrier.

Core Benefits for Your Business

This specialized film delivers a sealed, overlapping wrap that actively inhibits rust and corrosion on metal surfaces. By combining the load stability of stretch film with proven VCI chemistry, it eliminates the need for separate desiccants or oils, streamlining your packaging process and reducing total cost of protection.

Industrial Applications

VCI Stretch Film is specifically formulated for packaging:

  • Steel & Metal Coils: Provides full-surface protection against atmospheric moisture and corrosion during indoor or covered storage.
  • Fabricated Parts: Ideal for rings, loops, machined components, and assemblies requiring ready-to-use protection.
  • Long Products: Effectively wraps strips, bars, perch, and other elongated metal products for secure transit.
The tight, fixed packaging enhances handling safety and optimizes storage space in warehouse and logistics operations.

Packaging & Integration

Designed for flexibility, this film integrates seamlessly into existing workflows. It is compatible with both manual wrapping stations and automated pallet wrapping machinery, allowing for scalable deployment across your facility. In steel mills and metal service centers, it is commonly used as a final protective cover over products, shielding them from the hydrosphere and industrial environments.

Storage & Handling Guidelines

To ensure maximum efficacy and shelf life, store VCI Stretch Film in its original packaging within a dry, shaded, and cool environment. Avoid puncturing or tearing the sealed packaging until ready for use. Proper storage preserves the volatile inhibitors, extending the protective life of the film once applied to your metal products post-factory.

This product represents a critical component in a comprehensive corrosion prevention strategy, reducing warranty claims, minimizing waste from corroded goods, and ensuring your metal products arrive in optimal condition.

fullContentHtml:
FPC-400 Automated Copper Coil Wrapping Machine

The FPC-400 is an industrial-grade wrapping machine engineered for high-efficiency packaging of copper coils, wire bundles, and cable coils. Designed for B2B manufacturing and distribution centers, it automates the wrapping process to significantly reduce labor costs, minimize material waste, and ensure consistent, secure loads for storage and transport.

Machine Overview

This robust wrapper, also referred to as copper wire wrapping machinery or horizontal coil packing machinery, utilizes a horizontal rotating method for optimal stability. Its core intelligence lies in the PLC system, which automates complex calculations, driving operational efficiency and reliability in demanding industrial environments.

Key Features for Industrial Efficiency

  • Automated Precision Control: The PLC and HMI interface allows for simple input of coil dimensions (Outer Diameter, Inner Diameter, Width). The system then automatically determines the required tape length, number of wrapping layers, and cutting points, eliminating guesswork and human error.
  • Advanced Tension Regulation: A proprietary tension control system provides precise management of tape application. This ensures consistent overlap and optimal firmness, adapting to different coil densities and tape materials for a secure pack every time.
  • Enhanced Operational Uptime: Integrated diagnostic systems monitor machine health. In the event of a fault, indicator lamps and detailed error messages on the control panel facilitate rapid troubleshooting, reducing maintenance delays.
  • Flexible Integration: Designed with a flexible slide boom and conveyor system, the FPC-400 can be configured for in-line production flow or as a standalone station, offering adaptability to existing warehouse or factory layouts.

Technical Specifications

  • Model Series: FPC
  • Primary Model: FPC-400
  • Wrapping Orientation: Horizontal
  • Control Unit: Industrial PLC with Graphical HMI
  • Material Handling: Motorized Conveyor
  • Core Function: Automated Parameter Calculation & Precision Tension Wrapping

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Automatic Cable Winding Machine

Streamline your cable and hose packaging line with a precision-engineered automatic winding solution. Designed for B2B manufacturing environments, this machine delivers consistent, tight coils for a variety of materials—enhancing throughput, reducing labor costs, and ensuring shipment-ready packaging.

Core Functionality & Packaging Integration

Modern cable and hose packaging presents unique challenges: variable lengths (from standard 4ft, 6ft, 8ft to custom super-long runs), differing surface textures (smooth or corrugated), and specialized end fittings. Manually coiling these products to a tight, uniform standard is time-consuming and inconsistent.

Our automatic cable winding machine eliminates this bottleneck. It efficiently forms precise coils based on your pre-set diameter, weight, and tension parameters. A key feature is its integrated stretch film wrapping system, a robust and common industrial packaging method that secures the coil for storage and transit.

Optimized Stretch Film Packaging Process

The process is engineered for reliability:

  1. Precision Coiling: The extruded hose or cable is automatically formed into a uniform circle. Critical parameters like coil width and weight are user-defined via the machine's control system.
  2. Head/Fitting Securement: The machine actively manages the position of hose ends or special fittings during winding. This is crucial to prevent the finished coil from loosening, ensuring integrity.
  3. Configurable Wrapping: The integrated stretch film wrapper can be configured for either horizontal or vertical packaging action. The optimal orientation is selected based on your specific coil characteristics and downstream handling requirements.

Machine Configuration & Range Considerations

For maximum efficiency and coil quality, the machine is engineered to operate within an optimal size range. A single machine cannot effectively handle an extremely broad spectrum from very small to very large coils without compromising wrap tension or speed. We work with you to specify a model tailored to your primary product dimensions, ensuring peak performance and film economy. This focused design philosophy guarantees reliable, high-quality output for your core product lines.

Key Industrial Benefits:

  • Increased Line Speed: Automate a manual, variable-speed process.
  • Uniform Product Presentation: Create consistent, professional coils for customers.
  • Reduced Film Waste: Precise control optimizes stretch film usage.
  • Lower Labor Dependency: Free skilled workers for higher-value tasks.
  • Improved Shipment Safety: Tight, film-secured coils minimize damage in transit.

fullContentHtml:
Streamline Coil Packaging with Automated Compaction & Strapping

This integrated system combines a hydraulic wire coil compactor with an automatic PET strapping machine, engineered for direct connection to your wire production line. It automates the final packaging stage, transforming loose coils into compact, securely strapped units ready for shipment or storage, all through hands-free, online operation.

Automated Operational Sequence

  1. PLC-Driven Setup: All operational parameters—including coil specifications, required number of straps, and exact compacting force—are pre-programmed into the central PLC for consistent, repeatable results.
  2. Precise Coil Positioning: As the coil approaches, the conveyor's chains and rollers activate, automatically transporting the coil and its basket to the exact center of the strapping station.
  3. Controlled Hydraulic Compaction: Once in position, the compactor descends to apply calibrated force, systematically reducing the coil's height and improving its density for secure strapping and optimal logistics.
  4. Initiation of Strapping Cycle: After compaction is complete, the system seamlessly triggers the strapping process without operator intervention.
  5. Automatic PET Strapping: The strapping machine feeds the PET strap through the coil's inner diameter, completing a secure circumferential bind. This process repeats automatically for the programmed number of straps.

B2B Benefits & Value Proposition

  • Increase Line Efficiency: Eliminate manual handling bottlenecks by integrating packaging directly into the production flow.
  • Ensure Packaging Consistency: PLC control guarantees every coil is compacted and strapped to identical specifications, improving load stability and professional presentation.
  • Reduce Labor Costs & Injury Risk: Automate a physically demanding process, reallocating personnel to higher-value tasks while enhancing workplace safety.
  • Optimize Logistics: Compacted coils utilize space more efficiently in transportation and storage, lowering shipping costs.
  • Leverage Durable PET Strapping: Benefit from the high tensile strength, corrosion resistance, and recyclability of PET strapping for superior coil integrity.

Ideal for: Wire mills, steel service centers, and manufacturers of rod, wire rope, and cable seeking to automate finishing operations, improve packaging quality, and reduce total operational costs.

Robust Drive & Control

The double-ring and double-rub wheel mechanism provides exceptional driving force and operational stability. Inverter-controlled speed and adjustable friction ensure consistent performance for various load weights and film types.

Precision Adjustability

Fine-tune film overlap from 10% to 90% and adjust packing material tension to achieve optimal containment force while minimizing material usage. The wrapping position reset function streamlines changeovers.

Enhanced Safety & Compatibility

Automatic Load Protection System

Integrated stabilizing devices, including top pressers and side supports, actively prevent product shifting or toppling during the high-speed wrapping process. This system is critical for securing unstable or irregular loads, reducing risk and product loss.

B2B Application Benefits

fullContentHtml:
Automated Horizontal Coil Packaging Line for Integrated Metal Processing

Our turnkey Automatic Horizontal Coil Packaging Line delivers a synchronized, high-speed solution for packaging slit metal coils directly from your slitting line. Engineered for B2B industrial applications, this system eliminates manual handling and bottlenecks through complete automation.

Seamless Production Line Integration

The core design specification of this line is its direct integration with the exit point of a slitting line, facilitated by a coil car or turnstile system. This seamless handoff is critical for maintaining continuous material flow, ensuring maximum production uptime and packaging speed without operational gaps.

Tailored Engineering for Your Output

Technical features and line design are contingent on key operational parameters. We develop custom-built machinery based on your specific slit strip coil dimensions, unit weight, and packaging process requirements. Following detailed consultation, we provide the optimal solution to meet your throughput and protection goals.

Complete, Synchronized Packaging Process

The integrated line typically encompasses a turnstile for coil orientation, a slit coil upender, a coil strapping machine for secure bundling, a coil wrapping machine for surface protection, a conveyor system for transport, a coil stacker, and a final pallet wrapping machine. This sequence is fully automated, creating a robust, unmanned packaging cell for materials including copper coil, stainless steel coil, and wire coil.

Operational Advantage

By automating the entire post-slitting packaging process, this line significantly reduces labor costs, minimizes product damage, and ensures consistent, secure packaging for storage and shipment. It is the definitive solution for metal service centers and processors aiming to optimize their end-of-line operations for efficiency and reliability.

The FCL-600 Series offers three models to match your specific production capacity and coil dimension requirements. All models share the core automated architecture but provide flexibility in the finished coil's outer diameter, height, and inner core size.

Integration & Workflow Automation

The FCL-600 is more than a standalone unit; it's a productivity module. fullContentHtml:
Optimize Your Board Handling & Shipping with Industrial-Grade Packaging

Our engineered board packaging systems are designed for manufacturers and distributors seeking to automate finishing lines, reduce operational costs, and ensure product integrity during storage and transit. We provide tailored solutions that scale from semi-automatic stations to complete, turnkey packaging lines.

Core System Components

  • Automatic Board Stretch Wrapping Machine: Secures board stacks to pallets using stretch film, preventing shift and damage.
  • Automatic Board Shrink Wrapping Machine: Applies a tight, protective shrink film layer for weather resistance and enhanced stability.
  • Automatic Palletizing & Stacking Systems: Robotically or mechanically gathers and stacks boards onto pallets with precision.
  • Complete Packaging Lines: Integrated systems that combine conveying, stacking, palletizing, and wrapping into one efficient process.

B2B Advantages

  • Increase Throughput: Eliminate bottlenecks in your finishing department with high-speed, automated packaging.
  • Reduce Labor Dependency & Costs: Automate repetitive manual tasks for stacking and wrapping.
  • Minimize Material Waste: Intelligent film dispensing systems optimize usage, lowering consumable expenses.
  • Improve Load Stability: Create uniform, shipment-ready pallets that reduce transit damage and claims.
  • Gain Process Control: Integrate counting, weighing, and data tracking for inventory and logistics management.

Request Your Custom Packaging Solution

We partner with you to analyze your specific board dimensions, production volume, and facility layout. Our engineering team will propose a customized packaging solution, supported by detailed CAD drawings and video demonstrations, to meet your exact operational and budgetary goals. Contact us to discuss your board packaging requirements.

fullContentHtml:
Hand Stretch Film for Industrial Palletizing

Hand stretch film is an essential manual wrapping solution designed for B2B logistics, warehouse, and shipping operations. It enables secure unitization and stabilization of palletized goods, preventing load shift, product damage, and ensuring safe transportation.

Operational Advantages for Your Business

This film is engineered for manual application, offering flexibility for low-volume pallets, mixed-load staging, or repair/reinforcement of existing loads. Its inherent cling properties create a tight, self-bonding wrap that securely holds items together without the need for tapes or adhesives.

Standardized for Efficiency & Compatibility

Featuring a universal 3-inch core, our hand stretch film is compatible with all standard manual dispensers. The inclusion of a dispenser—often equipped with a braking system—allows operators to achieve a consistent, tighter stretch, enhancing load security while optimizing film yield and controlling consumable costs.

Common Configurations

While available in various widths to meet specific load profiles, the 15-inch and 18-inch rolls are industry-preferred for balancing coverage and manageability. Lightweight rolls (typically under 10 lbs) improve ergonomics and reduce operator fatigue during extended use.

Primary Application

Ideal for securing boxes, bags, and irregular items on pallets, hand stretch film is a cost-effective, reliable first line of defense against in-transit damage for manufacturing, distribution, and fulfillment centers.

Its full-sided shrinking process ensures products are tightly bundled and protected from dust, moisture, and handling damage. The flexibility of auto/manual modes and compatibility with standard film types provides adaptability for diverse production schedules and material choices.

  • Design Purpose: Engineered as a modular component for enhanced automated packaging lines, aiming to maximize throughput and minimize total cost of ownership.

By automating the final packaging stage, the FPSH-B Series allows your workforce to focus on core production tasks, reduces film waste through precise application, and ensures a professionally packaged product that enhances your brand's reputation for quality and reliability in the B2B marketplace.

fullContentHtml:
FHOPE-B Series: Automated Industrial Bag Packaging System for Pipes & Tubes

Streamline your post-production line with the FHOPE-B Series, an integrated automation solution designed to replace manual pipe and tube packaging. This system consolidates counting, bagging, and sealing into one efficient, PLC-controlled unit, engineered to reduce operational costs, minimize material waste, and maximize packaging speed for industrial manufacturers.

Core System Overview

The FHOPE-B Series is a complete end-of-line packaging cell comprising an automatic pipe counting module, a bag forming machine, and a precision bag filling station. It delivers a consistent, professional package finish while directly addressing key B2B pain points: high labor expenditure and production bottlenecks in the packaging stage.

Key Automated Processes

1. Automatic Counting & Alignment

The system automatically receives pipes from the production conveyor, performs accurate batch counting (configurable for 3, 6, or 10 pieces), and aligns them uniformly. This ensures precise loading into bags and eliminates counting errors, providing reliable batch consistency for shipping and inventory.

2. Integrated Bag Form-Fill-Seal

The machine forms bags from roll stock film on-demand, fills them with the pre-counted pipe batch, and applies a secure heat seal. This saves on material costs by reducing pre-made bag inventory and minimizes film waste compared to manual methods.

Operational & Control Features

  • PLC & HMI Control: Ensures reliable, repeatable operation with a touch-screen interface for easy parameter setting, production monitoring, and quick changeovers.
  • High-Speed Cycling: Capable of handling up to 10 pipes per cycle, dramatically increasing packaging throughput compared to manual labor.
  • Proactive Diagnostics: The system features automatic indicator alarms and on-screen fault messages to facilitate rapid troubleshooting, reducing machine downtime.
  • Flexible Integration: The FHOPE-B Series can be custom-designed to interface with your existing production line layout and accommodate specific pipe dimensions and packaging requirements.

Note for B2B Buyers: This system is engineered for integration. Our engineering team can collaborate on custom designs to ensure the FHOPE-B Series meets your specific production volume, pipe specifications, and factory floor layout.

FPW-600 Series: Automated Wire Coil Wrapping System

Engineered for industrial-scale efficiency, the FPW-600 Series is a robust wrapping solution designed to automate the packaging of large, heavy-duty wire coils. It integrates seamlessly into production lines with its dedicated trolley and track system for precise loading and unloading.

Strategic Advantages for Production Facilities

This machine transforms coil packaging from a manual bottleneck into a controlled, high-throughput process. It is specifically configured for demanding applications such as PC wire, compacted wire, and pre-strand wire coils, ensuring consistent wrap tension and layer alignment for superior load stability during storage and transit.

Core Operational Features

  • Adaptable Automation: Switch between fully automatic sequences for high-volume runs and semi-automatic modes for specialized batches or material testing.
  • Optimized Material Handling: The centralized packing material station minimizes changeover time, supporting a range of standard industrial wraps like woven belt, compound paper, and non-woven fabrics.
  • Engineered Durability: The drive system utilizes polyurethane-coated rollers and an integral mould structure, providing reliable grip and extended service life with minimal maintenance.
  • Direct Cost Savings: Achieve a rapid ROI through dramatic reductions in manual labor and precise control over packaging material usage, eliminating waste.

Technical Specifications & Integration

The FPW-600 is not an off-the-shelf product. Its core design principle is flexibility. We work with engineering teams to adapt the machine's dimensions, control interface, and handling logic to fit unique factory layouts, existing material flow, and specific coil specifications. This ensures a value-driven solution that enhances overall plant productivity.

Ideal For:

Wire manufacturing plants, steel mills, and metal processing facilities seeking to standardize, accelerate, and reduce the cost of their large-coil packaging operations.

fullContentHtml:
Engineered for Industrial Coil Handling Efficiency

A coil turnstile system is a pivotal automation component in modern metal processing and distribution facilities. Designed for B2B operations handling copper coils, steel strips, and precision slit coils, this system transforms manual, labor-intensive storage into a streamlined, high-throughput process.

Core Operational Advantages

By automating the rotation and staging of coils, the turnstile eliminates bottlenecks between production and packing. It ensures coils are precisely positioned for the next downstream process—whether feeding a strapping line, a wrapping station, or a palletizing system—minimizing handling damage and operator intervention.

Strategic Integration in Coil Packing Lines

The turnstile acts as the central hub in an automated coil packing line. It receives coils from upstream processing (e.g., slitting, leveling) and systematically presents them to downstream equipment in the correct orientation. This synchronized flow is critical for maintaining line speed, inventory accuracy (FIFO/LIFO), and maximizing overall equipment effectiveness (OEE).

Technical Design for Reliability

Built with a heavy-duty structural frame and high-torque rotation drives, the system is engineered for continuous operation in demanding environments. Precision indexing ensures accurate coil placement, while integrated safety guarding and load monitoring protect both the asset and personnel. The modular control architecture allows for easy integration with existing plant MES or WMS for real-time inventory tracking.

ROI and Operational Impact

Investing in a coil turnstile system delivers tangible returns through reduced labor costs, minimized product damage from handling, optimized warehouse footprint, and increased line throughput. It is a strategic upgrade for processors and service centers aiming to scale capacity, improve order accuracy, and enhance supply chain reliability for their B2B customers.

fullContentHtml:
FHOPE-H Series: Industrial-Grade Board Shrink Wrapping Machine

Streamline your panel product packaging with the FHOPE-H Series, an automated shrink wrapping system engineered for manufacturing and distribution facilities. This robust machine delivers secure, tamper-evident packaging for MDF, foam insulation boards, and other rigid panels, enhancing product protection and presentation for B2B shipments.

Core System Overview

The FHOPE-H Series automates the end-of-line packaging process. Panels are conveyed into the system where a film roll dispenses material, enveloping the product. An integrated sealer immediately cuts and seals the film, creating a loose sleeve. The wrapped panel then enters a controlled thermal shrinking tunnel, which tightens the film to form a rigid, protective skin. This process is ideal for creating uniform, professional bundles suitable for palletization and protected storage or transit.

Technical Specifications & Customization

  • Control & Automation: Features a central PLC control system with a user-friendly touchscreen HMI (Human-Machine Interface). Operators can easily switch between automatic and semi-automatic modes, set parameters, and monitor system status.
  • Configurable Design: The conveyor system width and the length of the shrinking tunnel are not one-size-fits-all. They are engineered to your specific panel dimensions and required production line speed, ensuring optimal efficiency and film usage.
  • Packaging Flexibility: Engineered to handle both single panels and pre-stacked bundles, providing versatility for different order fulfillment and shipping requirements.

Key Features for Industrial Operations

  • Durable Construction: Built with industrial components for reliable, continuous operation in plant environments.
  • Precision Sealing: Ensures a strong, consistent seal that withstands handling and transport.
  • Efficient Heat Management: The shrinking tunnel provides even, adjustable heat for a wrinkle-free, tight finish on long or large-format boards.
  • Safety Compliant: Designed with standard safety features including emergency stops and protective guarding.

The FHOPE-H Series Board Shrink Wrapping Machine is a strategic investment for businesses seeking to automate packaging, reduce labor costs, minimize material waste, and improve the shipped quality of panel products.

Industrial Machine Stretch Film for Automated Palletizing

Streamline your shipping and storage operations with our premium machine stretch film, engineered specifically for integration with automated stretch wrap equipment. Ideal for warehouses, distribution centers, and manufacturing facilities with medium to high-volume output.

fullContentHtml:
FPCM Series Master Coil Stretch Wrapper

An industrial-grade, automated stretch wrapping system designed for seamless integration into steel processing and coil handling lines. The FPCM Series enhances packaging efficiency, data traceability, and operational control for high-volume B2B environments.

Automated Packaging Process

  1. Coil Loading: Coil is positioned on the trolley via crane.
  2. Automated Eye Wrapping: System initiates pre-programmed wrap pattern based on coil data.
  3. Material Sealing: Packaging film is securely cut and sealed.
  4. Coil Unloading: Finished, wrapped coil is discharged for transport or storage.

Technical Specifications

Coil Specifications

  • Outer Diameter (OD): 900 - 2000 mm
  • Inner Diameter (ID): 508 mm / 610 mm
  • Width: 300 - 2500 mm
  • Weight Capacity: 300 - 30,000 kg

Operational Data

  • Shuttle Speed: 1 - 3 m/min
  • Packaging Materials: Stretch film, PE, HDPE, PVC
  • Power Supply: Customizable per facility
  • Air Supply: 5 - 8 bar

Core Operational Principle

The FPCM Series functions as an intelligent node within your coil processing line. It calls preset coil parameters (size, weight, type) from its memory or integrated network to automatically determine and execute the optimal wrapping cycle. This data-driven approach ensures consistent packaging quality, reduces manual input, and provides actionable data for line optimization and inventory management.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Steel Tube Strapping Machine for Industrial Bundling

This automatic steel tube strapping machine is engineered for seamless integration with industrial tube bundling lines. It automates the final packaging step, applying high-tension steel straps to secure bundles for shipment, handling, and storage with precision and reliability.

Optimized for Automated Production Lines

Designed as a critical component in an automated workflow, this machine connects directly to steel tube bundling equipment. It performs the strapping operation inline, eliminating manual intervention and creating a continuous, efficient production process from fabrication to final packaged product.

Precision Strapping Process

The machine automates the entire strapping sequence. It intelligently determines the number and position of straps required based on the length of the steel tube bundle, ensuring optimal load stability. The machine is stationed at a fixed point within the line, and the bundle is conveyed through it to receive each strap, maximizing efficiency and consistency.

Engineered for Durability & Performance

Built for the rigors of metal service center and pipe mill environments, this strapper prioritizes high reliability and uptime. It utilizes robust steel strapping secured with notching seals, creating a permanent, high-strength closure capable of withstanding the demands of logistics and supply chains.

Key Technical Specifications

  • Model Type: Auto Strapping Machine
  • Strap Tension: 7000-18000N
  • Seal Type: Notching
  • Strap Material: Steel Strap
  • Strap Width: 25mm, 32mm
  • Strap Thickness: 0.8mm / 1.0mm
  • Feed/Take-up Speed: 2-3 m/sec
  • Tension Speed: 6 m/min
  • Hydraulic Pressure: 100 bar
  • Operating Pressure: 80-90 bar
  • System Oil: Hydraulic Oil

This machine represents a strategic investment for tube and pipe producers seeking to enhance line automation, improve bundle security, and reduce labor costs in their packaging operations.

fullContentHtml:
Streamline Your Post-Extrusion Process with the FCL-800 Automatic Coiling System

In industrial manufacturing, efficiency and consistency in post-production packaging are critical for profitability and customer satisfaction. The FCL-800 Automatic Pipe Winding Machine is engineered to transform your finishing line, replacing labor-intensive manual or semi-automatic processes with a robust, precision-driven automation solution.

End-to-End Automation for Continuous Production

The FCL-800 is designed for direct in-line integration with extruders and storage systems, creating a seamless flow from production to pallet. This closed-loop automation eliminates bottlenecks, reduces manual handling, and ensures a consistent packaging standard that manual methods cannot match.

Advanced Servo Technology for Unmatched Coil Consistency

Moving beyond outdated mechanical winders, the FCL-800 utilizes a sophisticated servo control system. This technology provides precise command over rotation, tension, and layering, guaranteeing perfect coil geometry—every time. Consistent coil size, shape, and tightness are crucial for automated palletizing, shipping efficiency, and end-user unpacking.

Complete Packaging Solutions: Wrapping & Strapping

The system offers two primary packaging pathways to suit your product and logistics needs:

  • Automatic Stretch Film Winding: Produces a weather-resistant, dust-proof bundle ideal for storage and shipment. The process forms the extruded line into a uniform circle, applies controlled-tension film, and delivers a professionally wrapped coil.
  • Automatic Strapping: Applies durable straps for a ultra-secure, high-strength bundle, optimal for heavy-duty hose or high-volume logistics where unit integrity is paramount.

Engineered for Complex Product Ranges

Whether handling standard smooth hose, corrugated pipe, or profiles with specialized end fittings, the FCL-800's programmable logic adapts. It manages varying lengths (from 4-foot segments to super-long continuous runs) and material characteristics to produce neat, tight, and damage-free coils at high speed.

Business Impact: The FCL-800 Automatic Pipe Winding Machine is more than packaging equipment—it's a strategic investment. It significantly reduces direct labor costs, minimizes product damage, optimizes shipping space, and enhances your brand's reputation for delivering professionally packaged industrial products.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Coil Down Ender for Integrated Packaging Lines

Streamline your post-slitting workflow with our automatic down ender, a precision-engineered material handling solution designed for seamless integration with coil slitting lines. This system automates the critical transfer and reorientation process, enhancing efficiency and safety in your packaging operation.

System Operation & Workflow Integration

The automated process begins as a strip coil is transferred from the slitting line to a turnstile. The down ender then securely takes the vertically-oriented coil, precisely reorienting it to a horizontal position. This prepared coil is subsequently conveyed via the integrated roller conveyor system directly to downstream stations for strapping and wrapping, ensuring a continuous, automated flow from slitting to final packaging.

Key Technical Specifications

  • Coil Capacity: Handles Outer Diameter (OD) 600-1600mm, Width 10-400mm, with standard Inner Diameters (ID) of 508mm or 610mm.
  • Weight Capacity: Robust design supports coil weights up to 2500kg.
  • Hydraulic System: Operates at 140 Bar for reliable and powerful movement.
  • Cycle Efficiency: High-speed handling with a cycle time of 20-30 seconds per coil, maximizing line throughput.
  • Power Configuration: System power supply is customized to align with your specific plant infrastructure and requirements.

Design Advantages for B2B Operations

Our coil down ender is engineered with a focus on compactness and cost-efficiency, providing a superior alternative to traditional, bulkier handling equipment. The specific technical features and design are adaptable, depending on key operational factors such as line speed, spatial constraints, and integration points with existing slitting and packaging machinery. This flexibility ensures an optimal fit for your production environment.

fullContentHtml:
Heavy-Duty Industrial Coil Upender / Tilter

Engineered for precision and durability in demanding B2B metallurgical environments, our Coil Upender is designed for the safe and efficient 90-degree rotation of steel, aluminum, and wire coils. This robust machine integrates seamlessly into automated material handling lines, enhancing workflow and protecting valuable materials.

Core Applications & Industries

This industrial-grade tilter is essential for operations involving coil up-ending, module rotation, and roll positioning. It is a critical component for:

  • Steel service centers and processing lines
  • Aluminum rolling and fabrication plants
  • Wire and cable manufacturing facilities
  • Any operation requiring precise coil orientation for downstream processing or storage

Technical Design & Build

Built for reliability, the upender features a heavy-duty mechanical derivation system comprising a motor, gear, and chain drive, engineered for consistent 90-degree turning under load. A fail-safe position locking mechanism ensures the machine remains securely in place during power interruptions.

Customizable B2B Solutions

We understand that industrial needs vary. Therefore, this machine is available as a custom-built solution tailored to your specific operational requirements. Key customization options include:

  • Drive System Flexibility: Choose between robust mechanical or high-power hydraulic drive systems to match your plant's infrastructure and performance needs.
  • Line Integration: The unit can be engineered to connect directly with your existing conveyor systems, facilitating a seamless automated workflow.

Key Engineering Features

  1. Reinforced Drive Assembly: Utilizes a specially reinforced oblique gear and worm speed reducer within a heavy-structure frame for unmatched durability and long-term performance under continuous use.
  2. Protected Roller System: Features a heavy-duty four-roller mechanism wrapped in polyamide adhesive. This design provides superior grip while preventing surface damage to sensitive coil materials.
  3. Precision Speed Control: An inverter-based control system allows for fully adjustable rotation speeds, ensuring fast, stable, and safe operation tailored to each coil type and weight.
  4. Safety-Centric Design: Engineered with operational safety as a priority, incorporating stable movement and secure locking to protect both personnel and assets.

Contact our engineering team today to discuss your specific coil handling challenges and receive a tailored solution proposal.

FPH-300: Automated Hose & Pipe Coil Wrapping Machine

The FPH-300 is an industrial-grade, vertical coil wrapping machine engineered to optimize packaging operations for hose, tubing, and plastic pipe manufacturers and distributors. Core Operational Benefits

This machine transforms coil packaging from a manual, variable-cost process into a streamlined, automated operation. It is specifically designed for small to medium, lightweight coils, ensuring they are packaged securely with uniform film application. The vertical 'coil eye' orientation allows for efficient handling and a compact footprint on your production floor.

Key Features for Industrial Efficiency

  • Material Flexibility: Utilize a wide range of commercial stretch films to match your cost and performance requirements.
  • Rapid Changeover: The reset function allows operators to quickly establish a new baseline packing position, minimizing downtime between different coil sizes or batches.
  • Operational Versatility: Switch between fully automatic cycles for high-volume runs and manual mode for custom jobs or maintenance.
  • Precision Control: Inverter technology provides smooth, adjustable speeds for both the rotating ring and feed rollers, allowing fine-tuning for different film types and coil densities.
  • Optimized Material Use: Precisely control film overlap from 10% to 90% to maximize coverage and load stability while minimizing film waste.
  • Hands-Free Operation: The machine automatically completes its cycle and stops when wrapping is finished, freeing operator time for other tasks.
  • Engineered Safety: A comprehensive safety package includes physical guardrails, limit switches, and controlled acceleration/deceleration of the wrapping ring to ensure a secure working environment.
  • Stable Wrapping Process: Multiple supportive guide rollers prevent coil wobble during rotation, guaranteeing a tight, even wrap every time.
  • Secure Bundling: Adjust the film tension via the integrated breaker bar to achieve the perfect balance of hold strength without damaging sensitive hose or pipe surfaces.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: FPH-300
  • Primary Application: Vertical wrapping of small/medium lightweight hose & plastic pipe coils
  • Packaging Material: Universal compatibility with stretch films & tapes
  • Overlap Adjustment: 10% - 90% (Programmable)
  • Control System: Inverter-driven with adjustable speed
  • Operating Modes: Automatic & Manual
  • Key Safety Features: Guardrails, limiters, soft-start/stop drive
  • Coil Guidance: Multi-roller support system
  • Tension Control: Adjustable film stretch breaker

The FPH-300 Hose Coil Wrapping Machine is a strategic investment for businesses seeking to enhance packaging line productivity, reduce operational costs, and ensure product integrity from production to customer delivery.

Automatic Rotating Ring Stretch Wrapper

Engineered for industrial-scale logistics and manufacturing, the Automatic Rotating Ring Stretch Wrapper is a high-performance solution designed to secure palletized goods with precision and reliability. Engineered for Industrial Performance

This robust wrapper utilizes a rotating ring mechanism to apply stretch film in a consistent spiral pattern around stationary pallets. Controlled by an advanced PLC and HMI system, it allows for precise customization of wrap cycles, tension, and layer count to match specific load requirements. The inclusion of a powered pre-stretch device optimizes film usage, reducing material costs while ensuring high containment force for superior load integrity.

Complete Five-Sided Pallet Protection

Beyond standard wrapping, the integrated top sheet dispenser provides a critical waterproof layer, offering complete five-sided protection against moisture, dust, and handling debris. This feature is essential for goods sensitive to environmental conditions, ensuring they arrive in pristine condition.

Seamless Automation & Integration

Designed as an in-line packaging machine, it features an automatic film clamping and cutting unit for hands-free operation. It can be easily installed into existing conveyor lines, creating a continuous, automated packaging process that eliminates bottlenecks and maximizes efficiency in high-speed environments.

  • Safety: Enclosed Safety Guards & Sensors

The Ideal Solution for Demanding Operations

This Automatic Rotating Ring Stretch Wrapper is the optimal choice for warehouses, distribution centers, and manufacturers seeking to automate their pallet packaging. It delivers consistent results, reduces labor costs, and provides the robust protection needed to minimize damage and loss, ensuring your products are shipment-ready.

It offers the flexibility of a modular computerized strapping head, enabling you to upgrade existing lines with advanced PET strapping technology without the capital expenditure of a complete new system. This makes it an ideal, economical choice for operations prioritizing a phased automation approach.

fullContentHtml:
FHOPE-H Series: High-Efficiency Orbital Board Wrapping Machine

Engineered for industrial-scale packaging, the FHOPE-H Series Orbital Wrapping Machine delivers reliable, automated protection for MDF boards, panels, profiles, and other long-shaped materials. Its robust ring design and customizable configuration streamline your packaging line, reduce labor costs, and ensure consistent load stability for shipping and storage.

Core Technology & Operation

The machine utilizes an orbital (spiral) wrapping principle. The load passes through a rotating ring on a conveyor, while film dispensed from the ring spirals around it. This method is ideal for uniform wrapping of long, rigid products. The control system is adaptable, offering either semi-automatic or fully automatic cycles to integrate seamlessly with your production pace and labor strategy. Conveyor dimensions are not fixed; they are engineered to your specific board size and factory layout requirements.

Key Benefits for Manufacturing & Distribution

  • Maximize Throughput: Automate a repetitive manual process, enabling consistent output and freeing skilled labor for other tasks.
  • Reduce Packaging Costs: Precise tension control and efficient film usage minimize material waste compared to manual wrapping.
  • Enhance Load Integrity: Create secure, unitized loads that resist shifting, moisture, and dust during handling and transportation.
  • Improve Operational Flexibility: Quickly switch between single boards and bundles, and change film rolls in seconds to maintain line continuity.
  • Future-Proof Investment: Customizable conveyor and control options allow the system to adapt to evolving product dimensions and production volumes.

Ideal for Industrial Applications

The FHOPE-H Series is the optimal solution for manufacturers, distributors, and warehouses handling:

  • Medium-Density Fiberboard (MDF) & Particleboard
  • Door Skins, Wall Panels, and Decorative Paneling
  • Extruded Profiles, Trim, and Mouldings
  • Sheet Materials (e.g., acrylic, composite boards)
  • Any long, rigid product requiring uniform protective wrapping

fullContentHtml:
Automated Board Packaging Line for Industrial Panel Production

Our fully integrated Automatic Board Packaging Line provides a complete, turnkey solution for high-volume panel manufacturers. This system is engineered to connect directly to the exit of your board production line, automating the entire post-production process to enhance efficiency, ensure product integrity, and reduce operational costs.

Complete System Integration

The line seamlessly integrates several key automated stations, creating a continuous flow from production to dispatch. It begins with a Panel Vacuum Lifter that gently and securely transfers boards from the production line, feeding them into the subsequent packaging stages without manual handling.

Core System Components & Workflow

1. Automatic Panel Lifter & Stacking Machine

This crucial first module automates the precise stacking of panels, including insulating MDF, EPS, and sandwich panels. It ensures uniform, stable stacks at high speed, forming the organized unit load for all downstream packaging operations, thereby guaranteeing consistency and optimizing floor space.

The stack then progresses through a coordinated sequence: a Panel Strapping Machine applies secure bands for stability, followed by either a Panel Wrapping Machine (for stretch film) or a Panel Shrinking Machine (for a taut, protective sealed cover). The process culminates with an Automatic Palletizer, which neatly places the packaged stacks onto pallets, ready for warehousing or shipment.

Engineered for Your Production Needs

We specialize in designing and specifying packaging lines that align precisely with your output capacity, panel dimensions, and material characteristics. Our solutions are not one-size-fits-all; they are tailored to ensure maximum production and packaging speed, eliminating bottlenecks and protecting your product finish. This high level of automation makes it possible to manage the entire packaging process with dramatically reduced labor, often requiring only a single operator for monitoring and oversight.

Key Industrial Benefits

  • Increased Throughput: Uninterrupted, high-speed packaging synchronized with your production line.
  • Enhanced Product Protection: Automated handling minimizes risk of damage, scratches, or warping.
  • Labor & Cost Efficiency: Drastically reduces manual labor requirements and associated costs.
  • Operational Consistency: Delivers uniform, shipment-ready loads with minimal variance.
  • Scalable Design: Modular architecture allows for future expansion or reconfiguration.

Invest in an automated packaging line that transforms your panel output into a streamlined, efficient, and cost-effective process from production to pallet.

fullContentHtml:
Precision Film Carriage for Horizontal Orbital Wrapping

Engineered for reliability in demanding packaging lines, our industrial film carriage is a critical component for horizontal orbital stretch wrapping machines. It delivers consistent, secure loads for shipping and storage.

Technical Design & Integration

The carriage is designed with a focus on operational integrity. A minimum product length of 900mm is recommended to ensure the machine generates adequate driving force to move palletized loads reliably from the infeed to the outfeed conveyor. This is particularly critical for stabilizing lightweight products.

While modifications can be made for shorter lengths, the 900mm benchmark is established for optimal performance and force transmission, preventing product stagnation during the wrapping cycle.

Configuration & Safety Specifications

When utilizing a standard 300mm film width, the system requires an approximate 450mm gap between infeed and outfeed conveyors. This design incorporates two essential spaces:

  1. Safety Clearance: Maintains a safe operational distance between the film web and conveyor structures.
  2. Installation Zone: Provides the necessary physical space for mounting the film roll and associated hardware.

This configuration ensures safe, uninterrupted operation and facilitates easier maintenance and film roll changes, contributing to higher line efficiency and reduced total cost of operation.

FHOPE Automated Stretch Hood Pallet Wrapping System

Engineered for industrial logistics, the FHOPE Stretch Hood Machine provides a high-efficiency, automated solution for securing palletized goods. This system surpasses conventional spiral wrapping methods, delivering superior load stability, significant cost reduction, and enhanced operational throughput for distribution centers and manufacturing facilities.

Core Advantages for Industrial Operations

The FHOPE system is designed to address key challenges in B2B supply chain packaging. By utilizing a stretch hood application, it creates a tight, protective cover that conforms to the entire pallet profile, safeguarding against dust, moisture, and handling damage during storage and transit.

Technical Features & Specifications

  • Precision Sealing: The air-cooled sealing mechanism guarantees reliable, consistent seals for maximum load integrity.
  • Automated Intelligence: Photo sensors integrated with the PLC enable automatic detection of pallet size and position, initiating a flawless wrapping cycle.
  • Optimized Film Usage: Advanced forming and pulling technology minimizes film waste, directly reducing consumable costs versus traditional wrap methods.
  • Enhanced Load Protection: Delivers a smooth, taut film surface that minimizes friction points and protects product packaging.
  • Labor & Efficiency Gains: Full automation significantly reduces manual labor costs and increases packing station output.

Specifications Overview

  • Technology: Automated Stretch Hood Wrapping
  • Control System: Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) with Sensor Integration
  • Sealing Method: Air-Cooled Sealing System
  • Film Handling: Vacuum Cup Gripper System with Four Proportional Grippers
  • Automation Level: Fully Automatic Pallet Detection and Wrapping Cycle
  • Primary Application: Securing Unitized and Palletized Loads for Warehousing & Transportation

The FHOPE Stretch Hood Machine represents a strategic investment for businesses seeking to improve packaging line efficiency, reduce total cost of operation, and enhance the security of shipped goods. Its robust design and intelligent automation make it ideal for high-volume logistics environments.

180-Degree Hydraulic Die Flipper for Precision Die & Mould Handling

For die and mould manufacturers managing diverse specifications and models, protecting your precision tooling during handling is critical to maintaining production quality and schedule. Professional-grade handling solutions are essential for safe, efficient die position changing and turnover operations.

Engineered for Safe, High-Capacity Mold Flipping

Our industrial 180-degree die flipper provides a robust solution for handling heavy molds and dies. Driven by a reliable hydraulic system, it facilitates precise rotating and tilting operations for tooling weighing from 1 to 60 tons, eliminating manual risks and potential impact damage.

Operational Excellence & Damage Prevention

The equipment is specifically designed to invert molds without impact, safeguarding your valuable dies and moulds from handling damage. All switching operations are managed via an independent control cabinet with an intuitive knob interface, ensuring operator safety and process control.

Streamlined Workflow Integration

The machine indicates a ready-to-run state when powered. Initiate the flipping cycle via the control button for a timed, automated rotation sequence, enhancing workflow consistency and reducing operational downtime in your die shop.

Industrial Heavy-Duty Die & Mould Upender

Engineered for precision and safety in high-capacity B2B manufacturing environments, FHOPE's mould upender provides reliable, controlled rotation and positioning of heavy dies and molds.

Core Features & Engineering Benefits

  • Optimized Drive & Control: An industrial motor with inverter-controlled soft start and stop protects your valuable molds from jarring movements and integrates seamlessly into production lines.
  • Precision Speed Management: Adjust rotation speed via the inverter for precise positioning, reducing cycle times and improving handling accuracy.
  • Dedicated Control System: A standalone electric control box and panel ensure reliable operation and ease of service, minimizing downtime.
  • Uncompromised Safety: Dual electrical and mechanical displacement restrictors, coupled with an instant position lock, create a failsafe environment for personnel and capital equipment.
  • Robust Construction: Built around a steady worm gear reducer and a heavy-duty frame, this upender is designed for long-term, reliable service under full 35-ton loads.
  • Compliance & Customization: CE-certified design meets strict standards. For peak performance, we recommend a custom-engineered work table tailored to your specific mold's dimensions and weight distribution.

B2B Operational Advantages

This free-standing mould upender transforms heavy-load handling by eliminating manual risks and crane dependency. It enhances workshop safety, improves workflow efficiency, and protects high-value tooling from damage during rotation. FHOPE provides a comprehensive range of mechanical and hydraulic mold turning solutions, ensuring we can match the precise technical and capacity requirements of your operation.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Automatic Pipe Bagging Line for Plastic & Metal Tubes

Fhope provides automated, high-speed bagging solutions engineered for the plastic and metal pipe industry. Our automatic pipe bagging line is designed to replace manual, inconsistent packaging processes with a reliable system that ensures precise, secure, and professional packaging for PPR, PVC, and stainless steel tubes, enhancing your production efficiency and product presentation.

Engineered for Manufacturing Efficiency

This system tackles critical B2B pain points, including loose packaging, irregular bundle shapes, and labor-intensive manual bagging. By automating the process from feeding to sealing, it standardizes output, reduces film waste, and minimizes handling, delivering a direct return on investment through increased line speed and consistent pack quality.

Automated Operational Workflow

The bagging line operates on a precise, continuous cycle designed for integration into existing production lines:

  • Automated Feeding: Pipe bundles are automatically fed into the conveyor system, ensuring a consistent supply to the bagging station.
  • Precision Conveying: Bundles are transported and positioned accurately for the bagging process.
  • Film Welding & Bag Formation: The system forms and seals bags from a roll of PE or PP film, creating a durable sleeve.
  • Automatic Insertion & Sealing: The pipe bundle is conveyed into the formed bag, and the open end is sealed, completing a secure, protected package ready for palletizing or shipment.

Strategic Value for Your Packaging Line

Beyond core machinery, Fhope partners with your team through our sales, engineering, and service departments to design and implement the optimal protective packaging system for your specific application and throughput requirements. We focus on creating solutions that are not only innovative and cost-effective but also scalable and supported for the long term.

To learn more about configuring an automatic PVC pipe bag packing machine or a system for garden hoses, PVE pipes, or steel tubes, contact our engineering team for detailed specifications and a tailored solution overview.

Core Features & Benefits for Your Operation

  • Automated Heavy-Load Handling: Engineered for maximum efficiency, the system completes a full pallet change cycle in 20-30 seconds, seamlessly integrating into automated material flow systems.
  • Superior Load Stability: The combination of a top press-down device and dual-side adjustable holders ensures unstable or loose loads maintain their shape and integrity during transfer, preventing product damage.
  • Configurable for Specialized Pallets: Perfect for operations utilizing custom pallets, including plastic or aluminum pallets for disinfected/sensitive areas (e.g., food & beverage, pharmaceuticals), in-house racking pallets, or proprietary pallet designs central to your logistics system.
  • Robust & Reliable Design: With a hydraulic drive system and a 95° rotation capability, the FPFZ-02F is built for continuous, demanding industrial use.

Technical Specifications

Model: FPFZ-02F

Max Load Capacity: 2000 Kg

Cycle Time: 20-30 sec

Control Options: Panel / Remote

Pallet Dimensions (LxW): 1100-1200 x 1000-1200 mm

Load Height Range: 1000-1800 mm

Drive System: Hydraulic

Power Rating: 5.5 KW

Ideal B2B Applications

This heavy-duty pallet changer is a strategic investment for businesses looking to automate the final stage of production or the first stage of dispatch. It is particularly effective for:

  • Transferring finished goods from production pallets to standardized shipping or racking pallets.
  • Integrating with automated packaging and palletizing lines for a hands-off transition to storage or transport.
  • Managing pallet costs by allowing the use of inexpensive one-way pallets for shipping while retaining durable in-house pallets.
  • Maintaining strict hygiene protocols by facilitating easy changes to sanitized pallets in regulated industries.

fullContentHtml:
Streamline Your Aluminum Profile Output with Fully Automated Packaging

FHOPE engineers and builds complete, turnkey packaging solutions specifically for manufacturers of extruded aluminum profiles. Our automated packaging lines transform your post-production handling, replacing slow, labor-intensive manual packing with a reliable, high-speed system that integrates directly into your workflow.

The Challenge in Aluminum Profile Packaging

Manually packaging long, heavy, or delicate extruded profiles is inefficient, inconsistent, and costly. It creates bottlenecks, increases labor expenses, and risks product damage. Our automated line eliminates these issues by standardizing and securing the entire packaging process.

How Our Integrated Packaging Line Works

The system is a synchronized sequence of industrial machines, typically including:

  • Automatic In-feed Conveyor: Receives profiles directly from upstream processes (e.g., saws, inspection tables).
  • Precision Binding/Banding Machine: Secures profiles into stable, uniform bundles.
  • Stretch or Collar Wrapping Machine: Applies protective film for stability, weather resistance, and scratch protection.
  • Tape Sealing/Wrapping Station: Applies reinforcing tape to bundle ends or full length for maximum integrity.
  • Integrated Weighing & Labeling System: Automatically weighs each bundle and prints/applys shipping/compliance labels.
  • Package Gathering & Outfeed: Orients finished bundles for manual or automated palletizing.

Direct Benefits for Your Manufacturing Operation

  • Maximize Throughput: Remove packaging as a bottleneck to match your extrusion line speed.
  • Reduce Operational Costs: Cut direct labor requirements by up to 90% in the packaging area.
  • Ensure Consistent Quality: Every bundle is identically wrapped, sealed, and protected, enhancing your brand's professional image.
  • Improve Worker Safety: Minimize heavy lifting and repetitive manual tasks.
  • Gain Process Data: Track bundle counts, weights, and line performance directly from the HMI.

A Solution Built for Your Specific Needs

We don't offer one-size-fits-all machinery. Each FHOPE Extruded Aluminum Profile Packaging Line is designed based on a detailed analysis of your profile dimensions, production volume, material handling flow, and facility constraints. The result is a robust, dependable system that becomes a seamless and productive extension of your manufacturing plant.

Ready to Automate Your Packaging?

Contact our engineering team to discuss your profile specifications, required throughput, and integration points. We will provide a detailed proposal for a packaging line that delivers a rapid return on investment through unmatched efficiency and reliability.

Bubble Film Orbital Stretch Wrapper with Precision Tension Control

Engineered for the demanding requirements of Australian industrial manufacturing, this orbital stretch wrapper is the definitive solution for securing doors, furniture, and large flat items. Its core innovation lies in an advanced tension control system that ensures bubble film and stretch wrap are applied with optimal tightness, eliminating shifting and damage during transit.

Engineered for B2B Performance & Protection

This machine is designed for seamless integration into high-volume production lines. The robust conveyor system facilitates smooth material handling, while the dual-film capability allows for a protective bubble film layer followed by a secure, tensioned LLDPE stretch film overwrap—all in a single, automated cycle.

Core Feature: Advanced Tension Control

The proprietary tensioning mechanism is the cornerstone of this wrapper's performance. It actively maintains consistent film tension throughout the orbital wrapping process, guaranteeing that the packaging conforms tightly to the product's surface without film breakage or loose wraps, a critical factor for protecting high-value furniture and door products.

Technical Specifications for Integration

Below are the detailed specifications to facilitate seamless planning and integration into your existing packaging workflow.

Packaging Dimensions & System Layout

  • Product Capacity: Length >1000mm, Width 200-1500mm, Height 20-300mm.
  • Infeed/Outfeed Conveyor: 3000mm (L) × 1600mm (W) for efficient line feeding and discharge.
  • Central Processing Conveyor: 1000mm (L) × 1600mm (W).

Film & Operational Parameters

  • Stretch Film (LLDPE): Width 150-300mm, OD 100-200mm, ID 50mm.
  • Bubble Film: Width 1800mm, OD 100-500mm, ID 30-50mm.
  • Operational Requirements: Air supply 5-8 kgf/cm².

This industrial orbital wrapper is built to enhance your packaging line's reliability, reduce material waste through precise tensioning, and provide superior product protection for the Australian market and beyond.

fullContentHtml:
Heavy-Duty Reclining Pallet Inverter System

Engineered for B2B and industrial logistics, our heavy-duty reclining pallet inverter automates the critical task of transferring unstable or high-value loads from damaged to new pallets. This bottom-up exchange method prioritizes load integrity and operator safety.

Core Operational Process

The system executes a precise, multi-stage cycle: it first engages and lifts the load vertically to a 90-degree position. It then performs a secure 180-degree rotation at the top of the arc before lowering the load onto a new pallet, completing the exchange with minimal manual intervention.

Custom Engineering & Integration

We offer two primary clamp designs—Single or Dual Clamping—selected by our engineering team based on your specific load data (Length x Width x Height & Weight).

Every system is designed with your workflow in mind. We analyze your workshop's handling methods to ensure the pallet inverter operates flawlessly with your existing equipment, such as forklifts and lifters.

Deployment & Specifications

This solution is typically delivered as a fully automated and guarded turnkey system, constructed to meet individual user requirements. Moving beyond basic inclining designs, this heavy-duty reclining model offers superior stability and control for demanding industrial applications.

fullContentHtml:
Industrial Bale Wrapping Systems: Securing Asset Value in Waste Streams

In today's regulated and efficiency-driven waste management landscape, bale integrity is non-negotiable. Uncontained or poorly secured bales represent a direct threat to profitability, compliance, and operational safety. Our industrial bale wrapping systems are engineered to transform baled materials—from MSW to RDF—into stable, transportable, and market-ready assets.

The Operational Cost of Bale Failure

Facilities handling recyclables, waste-derived fuels, and biomass cannot afford the liabilities of an unstable bale. Traditional strapping or netting often fails under stress, leading to:

  • Financial Loss: Significant material shedding and degradation during handling, storage, and transit.
  • Compliance Risk: Violations of environmental and Department of Transportation regulations due to roadside litter and spillage.
  • Operational Inefficiency: Chronic site contamination, increased labor for clean-up, and disrupted workflow.
  • Safety Hazards: Unstable loads creating dangers for personnel and equipment.
  • Reduced Market Value: Buyers discount compromised, low-density, or non-compliant bales.

Engineered for Industrial Performance

Our wrapping technology provides a complete containment solution, addressing the core challenges faced by MRFs, waste-to-energy plants, and biomass processors. By applying a consistent, multi-layer film wrap, we create a durable, weather-resistant shield that maintains bale density and composition from the press to the end-user.

Strategic Advantages for Your Operation

Protect Revenue

Minimize material loss to preserve the tonnage and quality of your salable commodity. Deliver intact, specification-grade bales that command optimal pricing.

Ensure Compliance

Mitigate the risk of fines and rejected loads. Securely wrapped bales meet stringent transport and environmental standards for safe, uncontaminated hauling.

Optimize Operations

Reduce downtime for site clean-up, enhance material flow, and improve safety. Achieve reliable, predictable handling from staging through dispatch.

Enhance Sustainability Profile

Demonstrate responsible stewardship by virtually eliminating fugitive material and ensuring waste streams are fully contained for recovery or conversion.

Request a Productivity Analysis

Connect with our engineering team to evaluate how a high-performance bale wrapping system can reduce costs, mitigate risk, and secure the value of your baled waste streams. Calculate your potential ROI based on reduced loss, improved efficiency, and enhanced commodity pricing.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Wire Coil Packaging Systems for Industrial Manufacturing

In the steel and non-ferrous wire industry, efficient end-of-line packaging is critical for productivity and product protection. Wire products—including high-carbon steel, alloy steel, wire rope, stainless steel, and aluminum alloy wire—require robust, tailored handling solutions. Our automated packaging systems are engineered to integrate directly with your production process, ensuring seamless transition from processing to secure, shipment-ready coils.

System Configurations by Packaging Method

1. Automatic Horizontal Wire Coil Winding & Strapping System

This system is designed for direct inline operation. It forms wire into precise horizontal coils from the drawing line or a pay-off source and automatically applies PP strapping, creating a stable, stackable bundle ideal for logistics and storage.

2. Automatic Vertical Wire Coil Re-winding & Strapping System

Optimized for re-winding applications, this vertical configuration efficiently transfers wire from spools or other sources into uniform vertical coils. The integrated strapping unit then secures the coil automatically, ensuring consistency and reducing manual labor.

Core Operational Benefits

The automatic steel wire coiling and strapping machine transforms loose wire into standardized, professionally packaged coils. By automating the winding and strapping process per pre-set lengths, it eliminates bottlenecks, enhances line speed, and guarantees a secure, presentation-quality pack that minimizes damage during transit. The system is built for reliability, capable of connecting directly to your existing production infrastructure for a streamlined, end-to-end workflow.

fullContentHtml:
Fully Automatic Pipe Capping Machine: Engineered for Zero-Defect Production

Industry Challenge

Traditional capping machines impose high costs through stringent cap requirements and operational failures. Standard industry failure rates of 1-5% are common due to sensitivity to cap geometry and flash, leading to production waste, downtime, and inflated component costs.

Our Engineering Breakthrough

After extensive R&D, we developed the industry's first patented opening and closing cap tooling. This fundamental innovation decouples machine performance from cap imperfections, solving the core reliability issue.

Transform Your Capping Line

  • Eliminate Cap Sourcing Constraints: Use standard, cost-effective caps without premium specifications for geometry or flash.
  • Drive Down Operational Cost: Reduce failure-related waste and stoppages from industry-average 1-5% to a proven <0.002%.
  • Future-Proof Your Labor Strategy: A fully automated solution designed to mitigate continuously rising labor costs and ensure production consistency.
  • Invest in Protected Technology: Implement a capping solution with a nationally patent-pending core mechanism, ensuring long-term competitive advantage.

Technical Superiority

The QMGM Automatic Pipe Capping Machine integrates advanced self-diagnostics with highly reliable mechanical processes. It delivers unprecedented stability for high-volume B2B manufacturing environments where uptime and yield are critical to profitability.

Key Specification Summary

Failure Rate: < 0.002%
Cap Compatibility: Standard caps (no special requirements)
Automation: Full
Core Innovation: Patented tooling (Patent Pending)
Development Driver: Automation for labor cost reduction and process reliability

Developed by Shanghai Fhope Machinery Co., Ltd., this machine represents a year of focused innovation aimed at solving tangible production bottlenecks. It is not merely an automation tool but a strategic asset for enhancing manufacturing efficiency, reducing total cost of ownership, and securing production quality in your pipe capping operations.
