fullContentHtml:
Automatic Aluminum Profile Protective Film Applicator

Streamline your post-extrusion packaging line with automated, precision surface protection. This advanced applicator is engineered for aluminum profile manufacturers and fabricators seeking to enhance efficiency, reduce operational costs, and ensure consistent product quality.

The Challenge in Traditional Profile Protection

Following extrusion, protecting aluminum profile surfaces is critical to prevent scratches and damage during handling and transport. Conventional methods often rely on manual film or tape application, typically requiring two operators: one to run the line and feed the profile, and another to measure, cut, and apply the protective material. This process is labor-intensive, variable in quality, and creates a bottleneck.

Automated Efficiency for Modern Production

Our Automatic Film Applicator provides a targeted technical solution, transforming this manual step into a seamless, automated process. The system intelligently measures the profile length, pre-cuts the film with servo-driven accuracy, and applies it uniformly—all within the production flow.

Core Outcome: This automation effectively saves one full-time operator per shift, delivering a direct and rapid return on investment through significant labor cost reduction.

Technical Advancement & Process Integration

This equipment represents a substantial upgrade from older film taping machines. It is engineered for compatibility with a wider range of profile sizes and operates at higher speeds to match modern production demands.

Simplified Operational Process:

  1. Manual Infeed: An operator places the aluminum profile onto the conveyor line to initiate the automated sequence.
  2. Automated Measurement & Cutting: Integrated sensors detect the profile. The servo system precisely measures and pre-cuts the protective film to the exact required length.
  3. Precision Application: The machine automatically applies the pre-cut film smoothly and consistently onto the profile surface.
  4. Output: The protected profile continues down the line for subsequent handling, packing, or palletizing, ready for shipment.

Strategic Benefits for B2B Operations

  • Reduce Overhead: Cut direct labor costs by eliminating a dedicated film-cutting position.
  • Increase Line Throughput: Remove a manual bottleneck for faster overall packaging cycles.
  • Ensure Consistent Quality: Achieve uniform film application on every profile, reducing waste and improving customer presentation.
  • Improve ROI: The automated system offers a clear upgrade path, boosting productivity and competitiveness for extrusion and fabrication businesses.

fullContentHtml:
Automatic Slitting Coil PET Strapping Machine

Engineered for industrial slitting lines, this automatic PET strapping machine delivers precision, durability, and seamless integration for securing steel coils. Its advanced PLC-controlled system ensures reliable, hands-free operation, optimizing your packaging throughput and material handling efficiency.

Core Function & Integration

This machine performs automatic eye-through PET strapping specifically for slitted steel coils. It is designed with a full-automatic centering and positioning device, ensuring perfect strap placement for every coil size. The system is engineered for direct connection to roller conveyors and can be seamlessly integrated into existing production or final packaging lines, creating a continuous, automated workflow.

Modular System Design

The machine consists of three primary operational modules:
1. Automatic PET Belt Reel Feeding Device: Ensures consistent strap supply, minimizing downtime.
2. Automatic Strapping Head: The core component for tensioning, sealing, and cutting the PET strap.
3. Rotating Roller Table: Provides 360-degree rotation of the coil for uniform strap application. The table features a roller conveyor construction with a protective PU surface to prevent damage to sensitive coil finishes.

Technical Specifications & Features

  • Control & Automation: Centralized PLC programming for reliable, repeatable cycles.
  • Rotational Mechanism: Automatic up/down 360-degree rotating table facilitates the application of four securing straps.
  • Strap Management: End-of-strap loop ejector and an easy threading system for rapid coil changes.
  • Safety & Control: Equipped with an electronic brake system and adjustable strapping angle regulation.
  • Material Handling: Automatic up/down rotating rollers provide stable support and positioning for the coil during the strapping process.

This machine is a robust solution for metal service centers and processors seeking to automate coil packaging, improve bundle integrity, and reduce labor costs in high-volume slitting environments.

Industrial Door Panel Shrink Wrapping Machine

Optimize your door manufacturing or distribution line with FHOPE's engineered shrink wrapping solution. Designed for B2B operations, our system enhances product protection, reduces material costs, and improves packaging throughput for door panels.

In industrial supply chains, secure packaging is critical for preserving door panel quality during transit and storage. FHOPE provides robust shrink wrapping machinery that delivers a professional finish while mitigating damage, directly supporting your brand reputation and customer satisfaction.

Model A: Dual-Press Sealing System

Our Model A Shrink Wrapping Machine utilizes a one-sealer, two-press design to create a durable, full-body protective barrier. The process envelops the door panel in shrink film, which is then tensioned via a controlled-heat tunnel, resulting in a tight, dust- and moisture-resistant package.

Technical & Operational Advantages

  • Material Options & Durability: Utilize PE, PVC, or POF films. Standard 80-150 micron film provides excellent protection, with 200 micron film available for enhanced ruggedization.
  • Efficiency Benchmark: Offers significantly faster packaging speeds and lower film consumption compared to traditional horizontal stretch wrapping machines.
  • Configuration Flexibility: Accommodates a wide range of door panel sizes with minimal changeover, maximizing line uptime.
  • Precision Engineering: An integrated precision cutter ensures clean film separation, minimizing waste and ensuring a consistent start point for each cycle.

fullContentHtml:
FPW-550N Coil Wrapping Machine: Precision Packaging for Variable Production Lines

In industrial manufacturing, packaging flexibility is critical. Production lines managing custom client orders require equipment that adapts seamlessly to varying coil dimensions without compromising wrap quality or tension integrity.

The Challenge of Variable Coil Packaging

Traditional coil wrapping machines often struggle with tension control when a large-ring wrapper is used for smaller coils. This results in loose, unstable, or untidy packaging—a significant concern for B2B suppliers in the steel, wire, and cable industries where product protection and presentation are paramount.

FHOPE Engineering Solution: The Drawing-Back Design

The FPW-550N coil wrapping machine integrates our proprietary Film Drawing-Back Device. This advanced tension controller actively maintains optimal film stretch and tension during operation, specifically engineered for using large-ring wrappers on smaller coil profiles.

  • Eliminates Slack & Loose Wraps: The system dynamically adjusts, preventing film sag and ensuring consistent contact.
  • Maximizes Equipment Utility: One machine reliably handles a broad spectrum of coil sizes dictated by custom production plans.
  • Ensures Professional Finish: Delivers a tight, neat, and secure wrap that protects products and enhances brand reputation in industrial supply chains.

Key Outcome for Your Operation

The FPW-550N with Drawing-Back Design transforms your packaging line into a flexible, reliable asset. It guarantees perfect tension control, enabling you to meet diverse client specifications for coil sizes while maintaining the highest standard of packaged product integrity and readiness for shipment or storage.

Engineered for precision and durability in demanding manufacturing environments, the FPCT-05 5-ton mold upender automates the critical process of mold inversion. This machine enhances operational safety, improves production efficiency, and ensures consistent handling of heavy tooling.

Core Operational Benefits

A mold upender is an essential piece of material handling equipment designed to safely flip or rotate heavy molds, dies, and tooling. This controlled inversion is vital for processes such as:

  • Optimized Mold Filling & Sealing: Positions molds for precise pouring, injection, or sealing operations.
  • Enhanced Maintenance & Cleaning: Provides ergonomic access to all mold surfaces for maintenance, cleaning, and inspection.
  • Process Streamlining: Integrates seamlessly into production lines to reduce manual handling, cycle times, and labor costs.

The FPCT-05 is built with industrial-grade components to deliver reliable, high-cycle performance while protecting your valuable capital tooling from damage during handling.

  • Low-Maintenance Design: Engineered for reliability with easy-access components to minimize downtime and total cost of ownership.
  • Adaptable Tooling Interface: Compatible with custom fixtures, clamps, or platens to secure a wide variety of mold shapes and sizes.

Ideal For Industrial Sectors

This 5-ton upender is a strategic asset for composite manufacturing, foundries, plastic injection molding, rubber processing, and large-scale casting operations. It addresses key challenges in material handling, improving throughput, ensuring worker safety, and safeguarding precision tooling.

fullContentHtml:
BOPP Film (Bi-Oriented Polypropylene) for Industrial Packaging

BOPP (Bi-Oriented Polypropylene) film is an engineered polypropylene film oriented in both the machine and transverse directions. This biaxial orientation process creates a material with a superior balance of strength, clarity, and barrier properties, making it a critical component in high-performance flexible packaging solutions.

Manufacturing & Technical Process

Our BOPP films are produced using advanced orientation systems, primarily the tenter frame sequential process or the double bubble method. These processes precisely stretch the polypropylene film, aligning the polymer chains to enhance mechanical and physical characteristics, resulting in a consistently high-quality substrate for packaging.

Primary Industrial Applications

  • Food & Confectionery Packaging: Ideal for snacks, candy, baked goods, and dry foods requiring moisture protection and excellent printability.
  • Industrial Multi-Packs & Unitizing: Used for securing groups of bottles, cans, or other products due to high tensile strength and durability.
  • Label Films: Serves as a high-gloss, durable base for pressure-sensitive and in-mold labels.
  • Laminates & Composite Structures: Functions as a robust outer web or barrier layer in complex laminated packaging.

Material Science & Customization

We supply films based on both homopolymer PP for maximum stiffness and random copolymer PP for improved low-temperature sealability. Our product range includes:

  • Single-Layer and Co-extruded Films: Multi-layer co-extrusion allows for tailored performance, combining seal, barrier, and structural layers in one film.
  • Specialty Coatings: Films can be treated with acrylic or PVDC coatings to significantly enhance gas barrier properties and adhesion for specific inks or adhesives.
  • Full Finish Spectrum: Available in crystal clear, opaque white, and metallized versions to meet branding, light-blocking, and barrier requirements.

We offer a comprehensive range of thicknesses and specifications to meet the precise demands of your packaging line and end-use application. Contact our technical sales team to discuss your project requirements and request material samples.

fullContentHtml:
Bundling Stretch Film for Industrial Packaging Efficiency

Streamline your B2B packaging operations with high-performance bundling stretch film, engineered to secure grouped items efficiently and cost-effectively. This specialized wrap, also known as banding film, provides a superior alternative to traditional tapes and twines for unitizing products.

Strategic Advantages for Supply Chain & Logistics

Bundling stretch film is designed to consolidate smaller items—such as components, pipes, or multiple boxes—into a single, stable unit. This enhances handling safety, optimizes storage density, and accelerates loading processes. By replacing heavier, more expensive fastening methods, it directly reduces material costs and minimizes packaging waste.

Precision Application & Material Benefits

Available in standard widths from 1 to 5 inches, this film offers precise control for various bundle sizes. Its non-adhesive, stretch-based hold ensures products remain free of sticky residue and surface damage. The lightweight, ergonomic rolls facilitate rapid manual application, maintaining high throughput on packaging lines.

Common Industrial Use Cases

  • Construction & Lumber: Bundling wood, moldings, and trim.
  • Plumbing & Electrical: Securing PVC, metal, or conduit pipes.
  • Distribution Centers: Unitizing multiple cartons or boxes into a single shipment unit.
  • Manufacturing: Kitting parts, tools, or cylindrical components.

Our most requested sizes—including 2-inch, 3-inch, and 5-inch widths—cater to diverse operational requirements. We provide a range of bundling stretch film solutions to match specific job applications, ensuring optimal performance for your packaging challenges.

Engineered for demanding B2B and industrial environments, our heavy-capacity steel sheet inverter and upender is designed to safely and precisely rotate loads up to 15 tons through a full 180-degree arc. The machine utilizes a durable, double-acting hydraulic cylinder system to guarantee a smooth, controlled, and even transition during tilting operations, prioritizing both asset protection and operator safety.

Core Features & Engineering Benefits

  • Custom-Configurable Design: Basic machine parameters are engineered to your specific load dimensions, weight, and handling requirements.
  • Industrial C-Frame Structure: Provides superior stability and strength for inverting heavy, bulky objects like steel plates, coils, and large fabricated parts.
  • Powerful Drive & Construction: A high-torque motor combined with a heavily reinforced frame ensures reliable performance under maximum load conditions.
  • Precision Hydraulic Clamping: A quality hydraulic system firmly secures the load throughout rotation, eliminating slippage and ensuring precise positioning.
  • Operational Flexibility: Features adjustable rotation speed and multiple control options (panel or remote) to adapt to various production line rhythms.
  • Comprehensive Safety Architecture: Incorporates mechanical and electrical stop blocks, automatic locking, and power-loss recovery protocols for failsafe operation.

Radial Steel Coil Strapping Machine for Industrial Packaging Lines

Our radial steel coil strapping machine is an essential, high-performance component for automated steel coil packaging lines. Its modular engineering provides a range of configurations to meet diverse strapping requirements and precise operational goals across the metals industry.

Engineered for Mill Operations

Designed to address the rigorous demands of modern steel production, this strapping machine delivers reliable performance in both cold and hot rolling mill applications. It is built to enhance your packaging process through:

  • Maximized Uptime: Matches high production throughputs to keep pace with mill output.
  • Superior Asset Protection: Improves coil packaging integrity for secure storage and transportation.
  • Operational Efficiency: Reduces long-term costs of ownership with durable components and easy-maintenance design.

Core Technology & Functionality

The machine features a precision rotating arm system that maneuvers the strapping head and arch to apply straps at multiple positions around the coil. This innovative radial strapping method delivers secure bundling without requiring modifications to your existing coil handling or rotation equipment.

Broad Compatibility

Accommodating steel strapping widths from 19mm to 32mm, the system is versatile enough to handle a wide spectrum of coil sizes and strapping specifications, ensuring optimal tension and security for various end-use requirements.

B2B Value Proposition

This machine is more than packaging equipment; it is a strategic investment in line efficiency, product safety, and cost control. By automating and securing the final step in your coil processing, it safeguards product quality and reduces logistical risks.

fullContentHtml:
Fully Automatic Pipe Coiler Machine FCL-Y1200

The FCL-Y1200 is an industrial-grade, fully automatic system engineered to streamline the end-of-line process for pipe extrusion. It automates vertical coiling and strapping, delivering significant operational efficiencies and cost savings for high-volume B2B manufacturing environments.

Strategic Applications for Manufacturers

This machine is a critical component for pipe producers seeking to automate their extrusion and warehousing workflow. It transforms linear extruded output into uniform, strapped coils ready for storage or shipment, eliminating manual handling bottlenecks.

  • Labor Optimization: Dramatically reduces workforce requirements. A single operator can efficiently manage the coiling output from 5-10 extruder lines.
  • Process Integration: Designed for seamless integration into automated extrusion systems, creating a continuous production flow from extrusion to warehousing.
  • Proven Production Asset: With over 60 units successfully deployed and tested in active pipe manufacturing facilities, the FCL-Y1200 is a reliable and field-validated solution.
  • Quality & Consistency: Ensures perfectly shaped, uniform coils every time, enhancing product presentation and optimizing storage space.

Technical Specifications & Process

Model: FCL-Y1200
Core Function: Fully Automatic Vertical Pipe Coiling & Strapping
Field Verification: 60+ units in operation

Automated Packing Process Flow

  1. Online Pipe In-Feeding: Direct intake from the extrusion line for continuous operation.
  2. Tensioning & Length Counting: Pipe passes through a tensioner and electronic counter for precise length measurement and control.
  3. Automatic Coiling: The system automatically feeds the pipe to the coiling station, forming it into a preset, uniform coil.
  4. Integrated Strapping: The completed coil is automatically strapped for stability and handling.

Note on Configuration: The specifications above detail the standard configuration. For custom requirements or integration with specific extrusion line setups, please contact our engineering sales team for a tailored solution.

fullContentHtml:
Precision Packaging for Steel Coils of All Sizes

Our automatic horizontal coil packing machine is engineered to solve specific challenges in metal processing lines, particularly the secure and efficient wrapping of small outer diameter (OD) steel coils. The integrated adjustable holding arm is a key innovation, designed to bridge conveyor gaps and ensure stable, consistent packaging where traditional systems falter.

Engineered Solutions for Your Production Line

The core challenge in horizontal coil wrapping—conveyor gaps exceeding 230mm that disrupt small coil handling—is directly addressed by our patented holding arm system. This machine guarantees smooth infeeding, wrapping, and outfeeding for coils with ODs as small as 350mm, eliminating downtime and product damage.

Key Operational Advantages

  • Optimized Output: The holding arm can be automatically bypassed for larger OD coils, reducing cycle time and increasing overall line throughput when processing mixed coil sizes.
  • Perfect Synchronization: Conveyor and holding arm speeds are precisely synchronized. An increase in line speed automatically adjusts the arm's motion, ensuring wrap consistency at any production pace.
  • Enhanced Stability: For small OD coils, the arm provides crucial support through the wrapping station, preventing tipping or misalignment and ensuring a tight, protective film package.

Technical Specifications & Integration

This robust system is built for seamless integration into existing roller conveyor lines. Its programmable logic allows for easy setup and adaptation to your specific coil size range, from compact 350mm OD coils to larger diameters exceeding 800mm. The machine is constructed from heavy-duty materials to withstand the demands of continuous industrial operation.

Request Detailed Information

For technical datasheets, detailed integration guidelines, or to discuss a custom configuration for your coil packaging needs, please contact our engineering team.

Automated Aluminum Profile Stacker for Sandblasting & Finishing Lines

FHOPE's automatic aluminum profile stacker is a precision-engineered material handling solution designed to optimize efficiency and protect product integrity in post-sandblasting operations. This system automates the critical transition from processing to storage, reducing manual handling and increasing line throughput for industrial manufacturing facilities.

System Overview & Operational Benefits

This proprietary automated stacker eliminates bottlenecks after sandblasting. By automatically detecting profile width and intelligently calculating optimal layer composition, it maximizes pallet density and minimizes handling time. The primary benefits for B2B operators include a direct reduction in labor costs, a significant decrease in surface damage from manual transport, and a scalable solution that adapts to varying profile dimensions and production volumes.

Core Technology & Features

Intelligent Layer Analysis

The system's software analyzes profile geometry in real-time to determine the most efficient stacking arrangement, ensuring stable loads and maximizing space utilization.

Gentle, High-Speed Handling

With configurable speed settings for both vertical and horizontal axes, the stacker provides fast cycle times while ensuring delicate, sandblasted surfaces are protected from impact and abrasion.

Robust Load Management

Engineered for industrial endurance, it handles demanding loads up to 250kg, accommodating a wide range of aluminum profile sizes and weights common in fabrication and finishing.

Automatic Slitting Coil Strapping Machine for Industrial Packaging Lines

FHOPE's automatic slitting coil strapping machine is an engineered solution for securing slit steel, aluminum, and copper coils. It automates the binding process on an integrated roller conveyor system, applying consistent, high-tensile strapping with a reliable welding head to ensure coil integrity for storage and transport.

Core System Advantages

The machine combines a roller conveyor, turntable, and centralized control system into one efficient unit. This integration promotes ease of use, reduces operational labor, and provides a cost-effective, long-term packaging solution for metal service centers and processors.

Dual-Material Strapping Flexibility

FHOPE provides versatility to meet specific packaging goals. Our machine is equipped with a specialized strapping head capable of utilizing two different material types. This allows you to select the optimal strapping material based on coil type, required tensile strength, and environmental considerations.

  • Material Selection: Choose between high-strength steel strapping for maximum rigidity or polyester (PET/PP) strapping for corrosion resistance and surface protection, depending on your product's requirements.
  • Unified Platform: The same robust machine platform accommodates both material choices, offering future-proof adaptability without the need for separate systems.

Complete Packaging System

Beyond the core strapping head, the system includes a steel belt reel infeed device for continuous operation. Designed for reliability and low maintenance, this machine is a strategic investment for enhancing the efficiency and security of your coil packaging line.

fullContentHtml:
Horizontal Circumference Coil Strapping Machinery

Our automated circumference coil strapping machine is an essential, precision-engineered solution for securing mother coils in steel and aluminum processing. It performs critical circumferential strapping around the coil's outer diameter (OD) for secure binding and fixation, ensuring stability during transport and storage.

Core Operational Process

The machine is designed for horizontal operation, aligning the coil center with your existing coil car handling line for streamlined integration. The overhead strapping head descends automatically, adjusting to the specific OD of each coil. The strapping cycle initiates immediately upon head contact with the coil surface.

A fixed, reliable strap dispenser feeds the strap through a dedicated path beneath the coil, ensuring consistent placement and tension. The entire strapping station offers positional adjustability to accommodate varying coil widths and different strap belt specifications, providing exceptional operational flexibility.

For facilities requiring maximum throughput, a customized high-speed solution featuring a dual-head guiding system is available to efficiently handle products of diverse dimensions.

Primary B2B Industrial Applications

  • Galvanized Steel Coil Processing Lines
  • Cold Rolled Steel Coil Finishing & Packaging
  • Aluminum Coil Production and Handling
  • Hot Rolled Steel Coil Bundling

Automated Packaging Solutions for Copper & Brass Coil Production

In precision metalworking, protecting high-value copper and brass coils after slitting is critical for preserving product integrity and minimizing financial loss. Post-production, these coils require secure, consistent packaging to ensure damage-free transport to storage or next-stage manufacturing.

Seamless Integration for Uninterrupted Production Flow

FHOPE's automated copper coil packaging line is engineered to bridge the gap between your slitting line and warehouse logistics. This turnkey system automates the entire post-slitting process—conveying, wrapping, and strapping—eliminating manual handling bottlenecks and protecting your product investment.

Engineered for Protection & Efficiency

Our systems are built for industrial environments, ensuring your slitted coils are packaged with uniform tension and secure strapping. This automation directly reduces labor costs, prevents coil edge damage, and maintains a smooth, jam-free workflow from production to dispatch.

Core System Advantages

  • Zero-Gap Automation: Continuous operation from slitting line output to palletizing.
  • Asset Protection: Precision handling designed specifically for soft, non-ferrous metals like copper and brass.
  • Operational Reliability: Robust construction minimizes downtime and maintains throughput.
  • Logistics Ready: Packages coils for stable, secure storage and transportation.

By automating this critical final step, FHOPE's packaging line safeguards your product quality, optimizes your floor space, and delivers a measurable return on investment through reduced waste and higher operational tempo.

fullContentHtml:
Heavy-Duty Automated Packaging System for Large-Diameter Industrial Bearings

FHOPE delivers engineered packaging solutions for large-scale industrial bearings. Our automated system is specifically designed to handle the demanding packaging requirements of wind turbine, slewing ring, and critical supportive bearings, replacing inefficient and inconsistent manual processes.

Core System Advantages

This robust packaging machine ensures tight, secure, and protective wrapping for bearings with outer diameters up to 6500mm. It integrates corrosion prevention directly into the workflow, enhancing component longevity and reliability while maximizing packaging floor efficiency and safety.

Precision Engineering & Key Functionality

1. Mobile Wrapping Station

The system features an adjustable wrapping head that precisely positions itself for optimal coverage. This adaptability allows a single machine to securely package bearings across a broad size spectrum from 1000mm to 6500mm in outer diameter.

2. Simultaneous Three-Layer Packaging

Engineered for efficiency and maximum protection, the machine is equipped to carry three rolls of packaging material. It applies a complete, three-layer barrier in one automated cycle: a primary layer of VCI (Vapor Corrosion Inhibitor) film followed by two reinforcing layers of high-strength stretch film.

3. Integrated Oil Blower System

A dedicated subsystem—comprising a reservoir tank, pump, and specialized spray nozzle—applies a uniform coat of protective oil directly onto the bearing surface during the wrapping process. This integrated step ensures comprehensive corrosion protection is sealed in with the film layers.

Operational & Safety Benefits

  • Eliminates Manual Labor: Fully automates the wrapping of large, heavy bearings, drastically reducing physical strain and labor costs.
  • Ensures Packaging Consistency: Produces uniformly tight and professional packaging, critical for international shipping and long-term storage.
  • Superior Safety Profile: Removes operators from direct handling of heavy components and repetitive motion tasks, significantly lowering workplace injury risk.
  • Optimized for Large Bearings: The complete solution addresses the unique challenges of packaging wind energy, maritime, and heavy machinery bearings.

Optimize Your Copper Processing Workflow with Automated Packaging

The FHOPE Automatic Copper Slitting Coil Strip Packaging Line is an engineered industrial system designed to secure your high-value output after the slitting process. It automates the critical transition from winding to packaging, eliminating manual handling risks and ensuring coil integrity for transportation and warehousing.

Streamlined, Sequential Operation

This line executes a precise, automated sequence to maintain product quality and operational efficiency:

  1. Coil Extraction: The integrated coil car retrieves finished strip coils directly from the slitting line's winding mandrel.
  2. Precise Transfer: Coils are moved and accurately positioned via the programmable turnstile arm.
  3. Orientation: The turnstile rotates to place each coil into the optimal infeeding position for the packaging line.
  4. Individual Processing: An automatic downender lifts and handles each bare strip coil sequentially for the next packaging stage.

B2B Operational Benefits

This system transforms your post-slitting operations by providing a closed-loop, automated process. It minimizes surface damage, reduces labor costs, and enhances throughput consistency. By ensuring coils are securely prepared for logistics, it directly contributes to reduced waste, lower claims, and improved customer satisfaction in your supply chain.

Core Value Proposition:

A reliable, integrated packaging solution that protects your capital-intensive copper product from the end of the slitting line to the point of shipment, maximizing ROI and process reliability.

fullContentHtml:
Orbital Stretch Wrapper Engineered for Short & Compact Packaging

Our industrial orbital stretch wrapper is specifically designed to address the unique challenges of securing short packages with a minimum length of 400mm. This B2B-focused solution ensures reliable, efficient, and consistent wrapping for compact product dimensions common in manufacturing, distribution, and logistics.

Solving Core B2B Challenges in Short Package Wrapping

Standard orbital wrappers often underperform with small or short packages, leading to operational inefficiencies. Our machine targets and resolves these critical issues:

1. Eliminated Conveyor Transfer Instability

Short packages frequently fail to bridge the gap between infeed and outfeed conveyors, causing misalignment and process interruption. Our engineered conveyor integration provides a seamless transfer path, ensuring stable movement and precise positioning for packages as short as 400mm, maintaining continuous workflow.

2. Optimized Film Tension for Compact Loads

Larger wrapping rings create inconsistent tension and poor film containment on small packages. This system features a optimized ring size and film delivery mechanism calibrated for compact footprints, guaranteeing uniform tension, secure load unitization, and reduced film waste.

B2B Operational Benefits

  • Maximized Uptime: Prevents jams and misalignment, ensuring reliable high-volume operation.
  • Superior Load Security: Delivers consistent, tight wraps that protect short products during storage and transit.
  • Reduced Material Cost: Precise film application minimizes stretch film usage.
  • Enhanced Safety: Stable handling reduces manual intervention and associated risks.
  • Seamless Integration: Designed to fit into existing packaging lines with short-product workflows.

This orbital stretch wrapper is the strategic solution for businesses seeking to automate and optimize the packaging of short, compact products with industrial-grade reliability and efficiency.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Wire Rod Coil Finishing Line for Industrial Manufacturing

This fully integrated Automatic Wire Rod Compacting and Strapping Machine is engineered for B2B metal processing and distribution centers. The system transforms loose wire rod coils into secure, uniformly compacted, and strapped units ready for storage or shipment, enhancing handling efficiency and material safety.

Automated Operational Workflow

  1. Coil Loading: Wire rod coil is hoisted onto the compressing station via overhead crane with C-hook.
  2. Automatic Positioning: The system performs automatic position checking and precisely places the coil onto the block roller.
  3. Compression Cycle: The machine automatically compresses the wire rod coil to the specified density and dimensions.
  4. High-Speed Strapping: Post-compaction, the integrated strapping head automatically applies 4 straps (PET or steel) around the coil.
  5. Unloading: The finished, strapped coil is moved out from the compressing station by crane.
  6. Cycle Completion: The process repeats for continuous, high-volume operation.

Core System Components

This complete line is supplied with all necessary components for turnkey operation:

  • Heavy-Duty Compacting Frames
  • Precision Block Rollers
  • Automatic Strapping Heads
  • Centralized Electric Control Cabinet
  • Pneumatic & Hydraulic Installation Packages

B2B Value Proposition

This automated line is designed to eliminate manual labor bottlenecks, ensure consistent bundle quality, and improve workplace safety in industrial environments. By automating the final packaging stage, manufacturers and processors can achieve higher throughput, reduce strapping material waste, and prepare products for efficient logistics handling.

fullContentHtml:
Automated Slit Coil Packaging & Palletizing System

A fully integrated, turnkey solution designed to automate the final packaging and palletizing process for slit steel coils. This system enhances operational safety, increases throughput, and ensures consistent load integrity for storage and shipment in industrial metal handling environments.

Automated Operational Sequence

  1. In-feed & Centering: Coil is conveyed to the in-feed station, automatically centered, and elevated to the optimal pickup height.
  2. Automated Pickup: Integrated lifting mechanism securely engages and transfers the coil.
  3. Weighing & Strapping: Coil is precisely weighed and securely strapped according to preset specifications.
  4. Robotic Palletizing: The system stacks packaged coils onto pallets sequentially with precise positioning.
  5. Pallet Discharge: Finished, stable pallet loads are conveyed to the designated out-feed area.

Core System Modules

A. Centering & Lifting Conveyor Module

  • Powered Roller Conveyor: Provides smooth and controlled coil transfer into the system.
  • Precision Centering Device: Ensures exact coil alignment with integrated error correction for perfect stacking alignment.
  • Motorized Lifting Mechanism: Elevates the coil to the ergonomic pickup point for downstream equipment.
  • Automatic Positioning: Precisely places the coil for reliable and repeatable robotic pickup.

B. Robotic Stacking & Palletizing Module

  • Heavy-Duty Robotic Cell: Engineered for high-cycle, reliable handling of heavy slit coils.
  • Programmable Logic Control: Allows for flexible stacking patterns and seamless integration with plant MES/ERP systems.
  • Integrated Safety Systems: Features comprehensive guarding, light curtains, and emergency stops for complete operator protection.
  • Pallet Management: Automated pallet dispenser and out-feed conveyor for continuous operation.

Strategic Business Benefits

  • Elevated Safety Standards: Removes personnel from hazardous heavy lifting and repetitive manual tasks.
  • Optimized Productivity: Enables continuous, high-speed packaging and palletizing, increasing overall line output.
  • Superior Load Integrity: Ensures uniform, stable pallet loads that minimize damage during transport and storage.
  • Reduced Operational Costs: Lowers long-term labor costs and mitigates risk of workplace injury.
  • Data & Traceability: Integrated weighing provides valuable data for inventory control and shipping documentation.

This automated system represents a strategic investment for metal service centers and processors aiming to modernize their finishing lines, reduce reliance on manual labor, and achieve new levels of efficiency and safety in coil packaging operations.

fullContentHtml:
Fully Automated Hose & Pipe Coil Packaging Line

Engineered for industrial-scale efficiency, our automated packaging line transforms loose hose and pipe into securely packaged, pallet-ready coils. This integrated system eliminates manual handling bottlenecks, ensuring consistent output and superior load stability for shipping and storage.

End-to-End Packaging Process

  • Stage 1: Precision Coiling – The automatic coiling machine forms consistent, tight coils from continuous hose or pipe feed.
  • Stage 2: Automated Conveyance – A synchronized conveyor line transports coils seamlessly between stations.
  • Stage 3: Protective Wrapping – The coil wrapping machine applies stretch film or protective material for surface integrity.
  • Stage 4: Secure Strapping – An automatic strapping machine applies bands to prevent uncoiling during transit.
  • Stage 5: Palletizing (Optional) – An integrated coil stacker and pallet wrapping machine creates stable, unitized loads for forklift handling.

Engineered for B2B Manufacturing

Fhope engineers design for ruggedness and versatility. Our focus is on creating packaging lines that integrate effortlessly with your existing production flow and peripheral equipment. As an industry leader in tube and coil packaging, Fhope equipment operates globally across diverse conditions, handling a vast array of products with proven reliability.

The system is a flexible solution, capable of packaging all kinds of plastic coils. All critical size and speed parameters can be modified according to your specific production needs.

Key System Components

1. Automatic Hose/Pipe Coiling Machine

Forms precise, uniform coils from continuous material feed, setting the foundation for automated downstream packaging.

2. Automatic Coil Packaging Machine

Performs the core wrapping and strapping functions, securing the coil's shape and protecting its surface.

Integrated supportive guide rollers stabilize the coil during wrapping to prevent unspooling and ensure neat bundles.
Engineered for low maintenance and easy operation, minimizing downtime and training requirements.

fullContentHtml:
FPH-200 Horizontal Hose Coil Wrapping Machine

The FPH-200 is a professional-grade, horizontal coil wrapping system engineered to automate and standardize the packaging process for hose coils, plastic pipes, and flexible tubing in industrial and distribution settings. It is designed to deliver reliable, high-speed bundling that reduces material waste and labor costs while improving shipment readiness and product presentation.

Optimized for Industrial Packaging Lines

This machine addresses key B2B packaging challenges by providing a consistent, automated wrap for coiled products. Its horizontal design is ideal for lightweight to medium-weight coils, ensuring they remain secure during handling, storage, and transit. By integrating the FPH-200 into your workflow, you can achieve a significant reduction in manual packaging time and create a more streamlined, cost-effective logistics operation.

Core Features & Operational Benefits

  • Enhanced Line Efficiency: Automates a traditionally manual process, freeing personnel for higher-value tasks and increasing overall throughput.
  • Cost Reduction: Minimizes stretch film waste through precise overlap control and reduces reliance on extensive manual labor.
  • Packaging Consistency: Produces uniform, professional bundles every time, improving brand perception and reducing damage in transit.
  • Operational Flexibility: Switch between automatic for high-volume runs and manual for special batches or testing with ease.
  • Durability & Low Maintenance: Built with industrial components for continuous operation in warehouse and factory environments.

Technical Specifications

  • Model: FPH-200
  • Wrapping Method: Horizontal Spiral
  • Primary Application: Coiled hoses, tubing, and flexible pipes
  • Control Interface: User-friendly panel with inverter controls
  • Key Safety Feature: Soft acceleration/deceleration of the main ring
  • Integration: Designed for simple integration into existing conveyor or packing lines

Ideal For

Manufacturers, distributors, and logistics centers specializing in hydraulic hose, pneumatic tubing, garden hose, electrical conduit, and other coiled products seeking to automate final packaging, reduce costs, and improve shipment consistency.
